Yiki-yangbi-jinama amirntak-enena ayakwa aning-arakbirakba-kiya. ‘Nungkwaj-eka ningkakina,’ yiki-yaminama ngayuwa-wa, ‘ningk-akakiruma k-aningaba-kina-mulangwa warni-mamalya, kembirra k-aningaba-kajungwuna nungkwa-bakiya-ba ningkakina da,’ yiki-yaminama karna. Akwa ngarningka yiki-makinama nungkwurruwa ning-aniki-yama-langwa ngayuwa yalakwa enena-manja angalya nganyangwa-manja ebina ningi-yama-mirra Kabuniyuma-manja, kirr-engkirrkanu-mubaba karna ebina ningi-yama-mirra yakwijina ngayuwa.
Akana nganja ngarra-makinama amandangwa enena. Nu-wilyaba Ni-Birabida, niybina naniki-maki-maka God-langwa ayakwa, kini-yangbina-manja nakina ayakwa ena-langwu-wa warni-mamalya ana-langwa-manja angalya, kembirra abirraja ani-langwa warni-mamalya nar-eka engkirrkuma wurrakina anuwa-wa,” ni-yama Jesus wurri-mirntak-iybinu-wa warni-mamalya.
Biya ni-yama ngarningka, “W-engkirraja enena ayakwa ningi-yangbinama nungkwurruwa-wa. Wi-yaku-werribikina Eliya-langwa. Arakbirakba-kiya-wiya nakin-eka Eliya n-ambilyi-mirra Yijireyila-manja. Akini yada ngalaja nara yiybina yalyukwa kini-larrina ana-langwa-manja angalya. Abiyakarbiya-manja akilarrk-alyukwa nara yiybina yalyukwa. Nara kembirra ngalaja anhinga ka-lingku-warrna. Aburraj-eka miri-miraya nuw-ambilyi-mirra wurri-min-akina angalya warni-mamalya. Imba wurr-ababirna wurri-darringka wurri-ngayi-ngaya yakwijina na-wurrak-ambilyuma akina-manja angalya.
Akana nara anaja God kani-larrka Eliya wurru-wurrakakinu-wa wurri-darringka wurriybina nuw-ambilyi-mirruwa ana-langwa-manja angalya. Nara, imba nani-larrkama God nakina Eliya aminiyngku-wa angalya Jayidinu-wa. Anaja kembirra ni-likana nakina angerrba Jayidinu-wa. Kembirra nanga-mamirika-juwama nakina du-wilyaba di-ngaya yakwijina engemba-manja Jarubuda.
Akwa wi-yaku-werribikina ngarningka n-iyngka-langwu-wa Ni-Birabida Eliju-wa. An-ajukwaba n-ambilyi-mirra nakina arakbirakba-kiya-wiya Yijireyila-manja. Imba akini yada ana-langwa-manja angalya abirraja wurr-ababirn-eka warni-mamalya nuw-arrirrayinuma awurra-kwilyimida amarmarra wurrakina. Akana nara anaja Elija kani-mini-mungkwurdanga warni-makwilya wurri-mirntak-akina-langwa warni-mamalya ani-langwa. Nara, imba nani-mini-mungkwurdanga nani-makwilya Neyumena. Ni-miningka nakina Neyumena imba ani-langwa angalya Jiriya. Wi-yaku-werri-bikin-eka kembirra wun-alakina-kiya-wa Wuni-Birabida-kiya kirrakina da,” ni-yama nakina Jesus wurru-wurrak-ibinu-wa warni-mamalya ebina-manja alikira jinikakwa-manja da.
Abirraja kembirra awinyamba narrak-ardarra wurri-mirntak-akina warni-mamalya nuw-engkirrkani-mulangwa ayakwa Jesus-langwa. Na-werrik-arta-dinuma wurrakina angwurra,
biya na-mirntaku-warma-jungwa, nani-rntarrka nakina Jesus, nani-jadi-juwa alikira-langwa, biya nanu-wilyaka yadikina errekbu-wa kajungwa warniki-lyikarrku-wurri yada nakina abalkaya-langwa angakarjiyinga-langwa angalya arrawu-wa wurrakina da.
Akana anaja Jesus ni-likana wurri-lyimbi-lyimberrku-wilyarra-langwiya nakina, biya nani-lalika wurri-mirntak-akina warni-mamalya arakba nakina da.
Biya kembirra ni-likani-mirra nakina Jesus engembu-wa Kabuniyumu-wa. Akin-eka angalya Kabuniyuma amin-ababirna alikira yiya warni-mamalya Keliliya-manja nuw-ambilyi-mirra. Biya Jabida-manja ni-likani-mirra Jesus jinikakwu-wa, nanu-wilyaka-juwa-mirra nakina wurri-min-akina angalya warni-mamalya God-langwa ayakwa.
Abirraja wurri-mirntak-akina wurr-ababirna-langwa warni-mamalya nuw-engkirrkani-manja Jesus-langwa ayakwa, na-wurraki-yakikbijangayinum-eka wurrakina. Na-wurraki-yakikbijangayinuma wurrakina ni-yangbini-mulangwa Jesus ayakwa engb-iyngbida da, wubirra na-yangbinama ayakwa wurri-bu-bungkawa da.
Akina-manja angalya Kabuniyuma-manja n-ambilyi-mirra anaja nu-wilyaba n-anungkwarba, imba abirraja nuw-awiyabanuma wurru-wilyaba wurr-amukwa wurru-wurrariya anuwa-manja arrawa. An-ajukwaba ni-likanuma jinikakwu-wa nakina n-anungkwarba. Biya yakwijina jinikakwa-manja nu-wartu-wartamina angwurra nakina.
“Karti!” ni-yama. “Yi-lalika! Miyambana-birra ningki-likanuma yirruwa-wa nungkwuwa ningkakina Jesus Ningk-aningi-Nejirida? Ningki-likanuma yangkwurrangwa ningk-aniku-warti yada yirruwa na! Ning-aningm-eka nungkwuwa ngayuwa. Ningkakin-eka ningk-ani-mamalya ningk-iybina God ngini-larrkama yangkwurrangwa da!” ni-yama nakina.
Anaja Jesus ni-yama, “Wurri-yangminja-da! Imba wurri-jadiya arakba enena-wiya nanaka-langwa n-anungkwarba,” ni-yama. Abirraja wurrakina wurr-amukwa nani-kbilyaja nakina n-anungkwarba ajiringka-wa wurru-wurraku-wilyarra warni-mamalya, akana nara kanu-wartanga nakina imba na-jadinga anuwa-langwa.
Abirraja wurr-ababirna-langwa warni-mamalya yakwijina jinikakwa-manja na-mirntaki-yakikbijangayin-eka. Biya na-maki-jayini-mirra wurrakina ayakwa. “A-miyamban-eka ayakwa amirntak-ayana?” na-wurraki-yama wurrakina. “Engbida ayakwa ni-yangbina-mirra naka n-anungkwarba na? Wubirr-eka n-aruma nu-Bungkawa nu-bungkawa-dinama nakina wurr-amukwa-manja. Abirraja kembirra warna nani-min-engkirrkajama wurr-amukwa ani-langwa ayakwa da akwa na-jadanama nanaka-langwa n-anungkwarba da,” na-yama wurrakina.
Biya wurri-mirntak-akina warni-mamalya arakba na-lawurradina abirra-langwu-wa angalya. Biya kembirra na-maki-jayini-mirra wurrakina Jesus-langwa-langwa, akwa narra-maka-mirra anuwa-langwa wurru-kwala-manja warni-mamalya yanda-langwa engka-manja yiya engka-manja angalya Kabuniyuma-manja akwudangwa wurr-ababirn-eka warni-mamalya na-mirntak-engkirrkanuma akina ayakwa ni-yama-mirri-langwa Jesus, akwa na-wurraki-maki-maki-jayinuma ngawa abirr-ajukwaba Jesus-langwa da.
Kembirra an-ajukwaba Jesus ni-lalika-mirra nakina ebina jinikakwa imba ni-likanuma ni-min-akinu-wa alikira n-anungkwarba nani-miykirra Jayumuna. Biya n-awiyabana Jesus alikira-manja akwa nang-akbirranga nakina du-wilyaba didarringka arrawa d-angbilyuwama. Ngalaja Jayumuna-langwa dadij-anikba dakina. Yingi-murrkwu-murrkwuluma yakwijina yingi-mirntak-arta-dini-mirra angwurra dakina. Abirraja ngala-langwa warni-mamalya nani-maka-mirra Jesus-manja ngaluwa-langwa ying-angbilyuwa-dini-mulangwa, kajungwa kining-aningaba-kini yada nakina dakina-manja didarringka.
Anaja Jesus ni-lika yingi-murrkwuli-mirruwa dakina, akwa n-arjiyinga akwudangwa ngaluwa-manja akwa ni-yangbina akwala ayakwa engb-iyngbida. “Nga-lalika arakba,” ni-yama akinu-wa angbilyuwa. Ngalaja kembirra akina-wiya yingu-warrwalya-da arakba da. Arngkawura-wiya ying-adingaba-da ying-arda-dini-mirrada akwa yingi-mirajanga dakina. Biya narringa-mini-daka dakina anhinga arakba da.
Ngalaja kembirra num-awiyaba arakba mamawura. Abirraja kembirra wurr-ababirna warni-mamalya na-mirntaki-likani-mirra Jesus-uwa wurrakina. Narra-wilyakama anuwa-wa abirra-langwa warni-mamalya wurr-angb-angbilyuwa-mirra. Ababirn-eka angbilyuwa amini-miniyngka wurrakina narru-wilyakama. Imba anaja Jesus ni-lawulawa-ja ayarrka ani-langwa, nani-lyingama wurru-wilyu-wilyaba-wiya-manja akwa nanu-wurrak-aningaba-kama wurri-mirntak-akina warni-mamalya wurr-ababirna-langwa amirntak-akina-langwa angbilyuwa da.
Abirr-ajukwaba wurru-wurrariya wurr-amukwa nuw-ambilyuma wurr-ababirna-manja warni-mamalya, akana na-jadanguma narra-lalikama arakba wurrakina. Na-mirntaku-wartu-wartemina wurrakina akwa na-yama Jesus-uwa, “God-langwa Ningk-anukw-anikba ningk-akina na!” Imba Jesus ni-yangbina ayakwa arrbida abirruwa-wa. Nanu-wurraki-yangminja-kama wurrakina, warningma baba Jesus Ni-Majaya nakina, niybina-mirrada God nani-larrka-mirrada enenu-wa angalya da.
M-iyngka-manja mamawura na-ykbadangi-manja akina, anaja Jesus ni-lalika Kabuniyuma imba ni-likana nakina n-akwukawura nara-mirruwa warni-mamalya. Akana abirraja wurri-mirntak-iybina warni-mamalya nuw-abirangkayinuma anuwa-wa arakba. Nuw-ab-ibirangkayinum-eka wurri-mirntak-akina. Biya nan-akbirranga arakba. Nani-ngayindangi-mirra wurrakina nanik-ambilyingi yada abirruwa-manja nakina Jesus.
Akana anaja ni-yama Jesus abirruwa-wa, “Ki-likajam-eka ningena akwalu-wa angalya amini-miniyngku-wa kajungwa ka-makini yada ngayuwa wurri-mirntak-akina-manja warni-mamalya abirr-ajukwaba aningaba ayakwa. Ka-makina-mirra kini-bungkawa-dina-mulangwa God warni-mamalya-manja. Ka-makinama akina ayakwa mana God ngini-larrka-mubaba ngayuwa yangkwurrangwa kajungwa ka-makini yada wurr-ababirna-manja warni-mamalya wurri-mini-miningka kini-bungkawa-dina-mulangwa nakina,” ni-yama Jesus abirruwa-wa da.
Kembirra arakba nani-lalikama Jesus wurri-mirntak-iybina warni-mamalya imba ni-likanuma angerrba angalyu-wa yiya angalyu-wa. Ni-likani-mirra God-langwu-wa alikira jinikakwu-wa biya yakwijina ni-yangbinuma nakina ayakwa God-langwa, nani-maka-mirra warni-mamalya-manja nakina da.
Arngkawura Jesus nakina n-arjijayi-mirra mijiyalya-manja akina-manja angalya a-miykirra Kenejireda. Aruma akungwa nuw-ambilyuma yakwijina akina-manja angalya. Awilyaba-mirra angalya akina imba a-min-ambilyuma a-miykirra, alakina Kenejireda akwa ngawa Keliliya. Abirraja warni-mamalya wurrakina yanjarrikina na-wurraki-likani-mirra Jesus-uwa warnik-engkirrki yada ayakwa God-langwa. Akana wurru-wurra-kwilyimid-eka yakwijina warni-mamalya akwa kembirra na-wurraki-ji-jiriyini-mirra wurrakina.
Anaja Jesus nima-rringka m-ambilyuma-kiya mijiyanga nima-mindirruwa-jungwunuma yakwijina. Abirraja wurri-min-akina mijiyanga narrima-lalikama malakina imba narrim-ajirrangi-mirra ma-mirntak-iybina mikayuwama merra makirnt-irntirrka akwalya.
Imba Jesus ni-rijawudiya nakina mu-wilyaba-manja mijiyanga Jayumuna-langwa-manja, akwa ni-yama anuwa-wa, “Ma-jiriya-langwa angerrba arngki-darrba a-warrngku-ngwarbu-wa akungwa,” ni-yama Jesus Jayumunu-wa. Anaja Jayumuna nima-jira kembirra makina mijiyanga da. Akwa ngalaja nimi-lyikbina arngki-darrba errbaja a-warrngku-ngwarbu-wa da. Anaja kembirra Jesus n-ambarrnga arakba nakina mijiyanga-manja akwa ni-yangbina ayakwa wurri-mirntak-iybinu-wa warni-mamalya nuw-ambilyi-mirruwa ariba-manja. Nan-akakiruma-kama nakina God-langwa ayakwa.
Biya ni-jarrukwa-manja nakina ayakwa Jesus, ni-yama nakina Jayumunu-wa, “Ma-jiriya mema mijiyanga angerrba angwarbu-wa, kajungwa nungkwuwa akwa nungkwa-langwa warnungkwarba yikima-larr-jini yada mema mi-kayuwa, kembirra yiki-mani yada akwalya,” ni-yama.
Anaja Jayumuna ni-yama Jesus-uwa, “Bungkawa, yarn-eka yirr-abi-birangkayini-mirra alyarrngwalyilya akwalyu-wa akana nara yiki-manga yik-akbirrangarna aduwaba. Mama, yiki-mini-ngayindana-manja nungkwuwa ngayuwa, kima-larr-jinama kembirra ma-mirntak-enena mikayuwa da,” ni-yama Jayumuna Jesus-uwa da.
Kembirra narrima-larr-ja ma-mirntak-akina mi-kayuwa arakba da. Ngalaja kembirra a-wurra-kwilyimid-eka akwalya na-mirntak-awiyabana arakba ma-mirntak-akina-manja mi-kayuwa, akana arngki-darrba kimi-yngkarrnginum-eka makina.
Biya kembirra narr-artijuwa ayarrkama wurrakina wurribinu-wa warnungkwarba na-rijawudiyini-mirruwa m-iyngka-manja mijiyanga, mana wurri-mirntak-akina warnungkwarba malakina-kiya-manja mijiyanga na-rijawudiyinuma warni-biyakaja wurrakina baba. Kembirra Jayumuna-mirrya narra-ngayindanguma wurrakina warniki-mamurikaji yada warnik-arrki yada amirntak-iybina akwalya narri-mangi-mirra mikayuwama merra. Abirraja kembirra na-midayina abirruwa-wa da akwa narra-mamirika-juwa narrima-mirntak-arrkarna ma-mirntak-iybina mikayuwama merra da. Biya m-alekbina-kiya mijiyanga narrima-lyangburrkwa-juwa amirntak-iybina akwalya akwa arngki-darrba kimu-ngwartini-mirra akwa kimu-wurrilanguma makina.
Anaja Jayumuna Bida ni-rringka-manja amirntak-akina akwalya akwa nima-rringka-manja malakina mijiyanga-kiya kimu-ngwartinuma arngki-darrba, ni-nginaki-larra nakina yinama alyangma-langwa Jesus n-arjayu-murri-manja. Biya ni-yama, “Jay! Likaja yadada ngayuwa-langwa, Bungkawa, mana baba ningena ningu-wurrariy-eka,” ni-yama nakina Bida Jesus-uwa,
mana ni-yakikbijangu-mubaba ni-rringka-mirri-langwa amirntak-iybina akwalya awurra-kwilyimida. Abirr-ajukwaba wurri-mirntak-iybina warnungkwarba na-rijawudiyinuma yakwijina Jayumuna Bida-langwa-manja mijiyanga na-yakikbijangayinum-eka wurrakina amirntak-iybina-langwa akwalya narri-mangi-mirri-langwa.
Abirn-ajukwaba Jaminja akwa Janjana nani-rijawudiyini-mirra m-iyngka-manja mijiyanga nani-yakikbijanginuma wun-alakina da. Wunalakina wun-anungkwarba-kiya Jebediya-langwa nanukw-anikba-kiya. Jayumuna Bida-langwa warni-biyakaja wunalakina na-yaki-yakayinuma da. Anaja kembirra Jesus ni-yama nakina Jayumunu-wa, “Nara akbarduma, imba aduwaba-langwa ka-wilyakinama nungkwuwa warni-mamalya ngayuwa-wa, wubirra laka aduwaba ningku-wilyakinama akwalya ariba-wa da,” ni-yama Jesus da.
Abirraja kembirra narrma-lirraki-mundirruwa mijiyanga m-alekbina mijiyalya-manja akwa narrima-lalika yakwijina akwa akwala-langwa amirntakijika abirra-langwa, akwa kembirra nani-yuwarna Jesus-uwa arakba wurrakina da.
Arngkawura anaja Jesus n-ambilyi-mirra nakina awilyaba-manja angalya n-ambilyu-murri-manja nu-wilyaba n-anungkwarba niybina n-arrya-yinuma awurra-kwilyimida amarmarra ana-langwa-manja nani-makwilya. Arrbud-eka angbilyuwa akina. Anaja kembirra nani-rringka-manja nakina Jesus, n-abiluwandingama nakina n-anungkwarba n-engmidurrwa-jungwunuma nani-mukwurra ajiringka-wa akwa nani-marrakba-kama nakina Jesus-uwa akwa ni-yama, “Ningki-bungkawa ningku-kwilyibana,” ni-yama. “Ki-ngayindana-manja ningkakina ningk-aningma yiki-mungkwurdanama ning-ani-makwilya,” ni-yama nakina Jesus-uwa.
Anaja kembirra Jesus ni-lawulawa-ja ayarrka ani-langwa akwa nani-minjirrki-lyinga arakba nakina n-anungkwarba. Biya ni-yama, “Yirra-ngayindanama ningena yib-aningaba-kina-mirrada, kembirra nungkwaja ningki-mungkwurda ningk-ani-makwilya k-ambilyama ningkakina da,” ni-yama Jesus. Kembirra arngkawura-wiya ayakwa ni-yangbinu-wiya nakina, akini yada ngawa na-jarrida arakba ngalaja amirntak-iybina amarmarra ana-langwa da.
Biya ni-yama Jesus anuwa-wa, “Nara a-makama wurru-kwala-manja warni-mamalya ningk-aningaba-di-mulangwa, imba jay, likaja ena-wiya dirrbira Ni-Minida-wa n-anungkwarba. Kembirra nakin-eka kani-rringkinama ningkakina, biya kini-yaminama nungkwuwa-wa, ‘Ningk-aningaba-duma arakba,’ kini-yaminama nakina n-anungkwarba Ni-Minida. Nungkwaja kembirra ambaka kinu-kwunama nungkwuwa wurr-ambilyuma wurrajija kajungwa naniki-minu-warti yada nakina, ebina-langwiya ayakwa ni-yangbinu-mulangwiya Mawijija arakbirakba-kiya-wiya. Kembirra abirramba-langwa wurr-angkwilyimida-langwa warni-mamalya kuw-aningmi-dina-mirra nungkwuwa ningk-aningaba-du-murri-langwa akwa ningki-minjirrk-inyungwurra arakba ningkakina da,” ni-yama Jesus nakinu-wa n-anungkwarba da.
Akana anaja ni-yarrk-bali-juwama nakina akina ayakwa ni-yama-mulangwa Jesus. Ngalaja kembirra nuw-errbalinuma akina ayakwa angwurra angalyu-wa yiya angalyu-wa da. Abirraja kembirra wurru-wurra-kwilyimida-langw-eka warni-mamalya na-wurraki-likani-mirra Jesus-uwa. Na-wurraki-likanuma wurrakina kajungwa kuw-engkirrkaji yada ayakwa ani-langwa akwa ngawa kani-mirntak-aningaba-kini yada nakina Jesus wurrakina warni-mamalya wurriybina wurr-angb-angbilyuwa-mirri-mirra angbilyuwa-langwa.
Akana ad-adiniba ngawa ni-likanuma anaja Jesus n-akwukawura nara-mirruwa warni-mamalya, akwa ni-biriyamini-mirra yakwijina God-uwa nakina.
Arngkawura Jesus n-ambilyi-mirra nakina nu-wilyaba-manja n-anungkwarba ana-langwa-manja alikira. N-ambilyi-manja nakina yakwijina ngawa akina-manja alikira, abirraja wurru-kwala warni-mamalya na-likanuma yanjarrikina anuwa-wa. Imba Jesus nan-akakiruma-kama nakina wurrakina-manja warni-mamalya God-langwa-langwa. Abirr-ajukwaba na-likanuma Jesus-uwa wurru-kwala warningi-Judiya warnungkwarba warni-miykirra Wurri-Barija akwa ngawa wurru-kwala warnik-akakirumaka warnungkwarba ayakwa aning-arum-uruma Mawijija-langwa. Wurrakin-eka warnungkwarba na-likani-mirra engka-langwa yiya engka-langwa angalya Judiya-langwa akwa ngarningka Keliliya-langwa. Wurru-kwala abirr-ajukwaba Jirujalema-langwa na-likanuma. Biya nuw-ambarrnga ebina-manja alikira n-ambilyu-murri-manja Jesus nakina. Imba ngalaja Amawurrna Nu-Bungkawa God-langwa Jesus-manja nuw-ambilyi-mirra akina akwa nanaki-yngbidirr-kama. Anaja nan-aningaba-kama kembirra Jesus wurr-angb-angbilyuwama warni-mamalya yakwijina alikira-manja arrawa.
Abirraja wurru-kwala warnungkwarba na-likani-mirra akinu-wa alikira, nani-lyilyanguma nu-wilyaba ni-rrengmirnirna n-anungkwarba. Neni-yngk-ajika-mirra nakina, nanu-wilyakama aki-murrkwu-murrkwulinga-mirra, mana nara baba kin-alilikana yaya, nara kinu-warru-warrina nakina baba. Ni-mirntak-ayuwaya nani-ngangkawura n-ambilyi-mirra nakina. Kembirra ebina-manja alikira nuw-abirangkama angalya wurrakina warnungkwarba kajungwa warnik-awiyebi yada akwa warnik-akimi yada niybina ni-rrengmirnirna akwudangwa Jesus-manja. Nuw-abirangkayinu...wa.
Akana nara karr-akbirranga-rnwa angwurndikirra, nara kuw-awiyabayina arrawu-wa mana wurr-ababirna baba warni-mamalya nuw-ambilyuma yakwijina. Biya kembirra na-wurtanga wurrakina karrawaru-wa errekba-langwiya, nanu-wilyaka-mirra ngawa nani-ngkajikama nakina ni-rrengmirnirna. Biya yakwijina ngawa alikira-manja karrawara narru-ngwurrkbali-juwa wurrakina aningi-karrawara edirri yada. Biya nani-larr-ja merra-mirra niybina n-anungkwarba ni-rrengmirnirna yadikina akina-langwa edirra. Nani-larr-ja, biya ajiringka-manja nuw-ambarrnga ebina aki-murrkwu-murrkwulinga wurru-wurraku-wilyarra warni-mamalya da. Abirnaja kembirra arakba nakina ni-rrengmirnirna akwa Jesus nanu-kwurukwayinuma wun-alakina da.
Imba wurrakin-eka warnungkwarba wurriybina nanu-wilyakama nakina ni-rrengmirnirna Jesus-uwa na-werrik-ambilyi-mirra wurrakina Jesus-manja akwa warningma Jesus kan-aningaba-kina-mulangwa nakina-manja. Anaja Jesus n-aningma mangma abirra-langwa akwa ni-yama nakina niybinu-wa ni-rrengmirnirna, “Nungkwuwa, ababirna-langwa a-wurru-wurrariya ningki-yama-mirrilangwa ningkakina ningki-mini-lyurrkwa-jungwunuma arakba akina. Kembirra anaja God nara nakina engkirrkuma arakba akinu-wa aduwaba da,” ni-yama Jesus anuwa-wa da.
Abirraja warnungkwarba warnik-akakirumaka ayakwa aning-arum-uruma Mawijija-langwa akwa ngawa wurriybina Wurri-Barija warnungkwarba na-lyangkiyama wurrakina, “Ni-miyamban-eka naka n-anungkwarba? Ni-ngayindanama kini-yaminama God wubirra naka na? Anaja God nu-wilyaba akani-mini-yakwabijinama a-wurru-wurrariya ngakwurra-langwa, nara wurru-kwala a-mini-yakwabijuma da,” na-yama wurrakina da.
N-aningma anaja Jesus abirra-langwa mangma, biya ni-yama abirruwa-wa, “Miyambana-birra kirr-engkirrkaja-mirra karna amukwiyad-akinu-wa?
Nungkwaja ningkakina kini-makina dukwa enena ayakwa naka-manja n-anungkwarba, ‘Ngini-mini-yakwabijuwama God a-wurru-wurrariya ningki-yama-mirrilangwa ningkakina.’ Nar-eka ningkakina da! Imba kini-makina dukwa enena engka ayakwa anuwa-wa, ‘Laka! Mirajanga, akwa wu-warr-jiya alika nungkwa-langwa.’ Nar-eka ningkakina da! Ningki-lyang-miri-dinam-eka akwa nara a-yangbuma alakena-kiya ayakwa ningk-abakiya-ba naka-manja n-anungkwarba ningkakina da.
Imba nganj-eka ningena, ningiybina-mirrada ningi-rukwularrinuma enena-manja angalya, anaja God ngini-makama ngayuwa-manja ka-mini-yakwabijina-mulangwa a-wurru-wurrariya karni-mamalya-langwa ngayuwa. Nganja kembirra ka-min-abilyarri-kinama aduwaba alyangmandukwuna akina ayakwa God ngini-makama nakina ngayuwa-manja da,” ni-yama Jesus wurri-mirntak-iybinu-wa warni-mamalya da. Biya kembirra Jesus ni-yangbina arakba nakina akwala ayakwa nakinu-wa n-anungkwarba nirr-engmirnirnu-wa. Ni-yama, “Nungkwaja, mirajanga! Wu-larrngkwu-miya ena aki-murrkwu-murrkwulinga nungkwa-langwa imba likaja lawurradina angalyu-wa,” ni-yama Jesus anuwa-wa da.
Kembirra arngkawura-wiya anaja ni-mirajanga, ni-larrngkwu-manga ebina aki-murrkwu-murrkwulinga ani-langwa. Abirraja wurr-ababirna-langwa warni-mamalya yakwijina nani-rringkama n-arjiyuma arakba. Imba ni-jadinga nakina alikira-langwa errekbu-wa, nu-wilyakama ebina aki-murrkwu-murrkwulinga ana-langwa da. Biya ni-lawurradina arakba angalyu-wa, nani-yang-marngkwa-juwa-mirra God-uwa lukwakwa da.
Abirraja wurr-ababirna-langwa warni-mamalya yakwijina na-mirntaki-yakikbijangayinum-eka akwa na-mirntak-akbardangi-mirra akina-langwa wurrakina. Biya nani-yang-marngkwa-juwa-mirra arakba abirr-ajukwaba God-uwa. Biya na-mirntaki-maki-jayini-mirra ayakwa. Na-yama, “Amandangw-eka, ngarri-rringkama aningaba ngakwurra-langwa-mirra manba aduwaba da,” na-yama na-maki-jayinuma wurri-mirntak-akina warni-mamalya da.
Anaja kembirra nan-aningaba-ka-mulangwa Jesus niybina ni-rrengmirnirna n-anungkwarba akwa nani-mini-yakwabi-juwa-mulangwa a-wurru-wurrariya ani-langwa, ni-jadanga nakina ebina-langwa alikira. Biya ni-likani-manja nakina lukwakwa Jesus, nan-akbirranga nakina nu-wilyaba n-anungkwarba nani-miykirra Libaya. Ni-min-ambilyuma ekirra nakina, Libaya akwa ngawa Meduwa. Imba nakina Libaya nani-minu-wardu-wardanguma warka wurri-bu-bungkawa warningi-Rawuma. Ngalaja a-yukwujiya alikira warka-langwa nuw-arjayi-mirra akina ani-langwa mi-likarrk-bijina mamirukwa. Kembirra nakina Libaya nu-wurra-mirntukwa-mirra angwarnta warni-mamalya-langwa, akini yada ngawa na-likani-manja wurrakina mamirukwa-langwiya. Narri-yarrwarni-manja akina alikira a-yukwujiya, kembirra nani-mini-mangi-mirra angwarnta abirra-langwa kajungwa naniku-kwi yada akina Warning-Rawumu-wa wurri-bu-bungkawa. Ni-likani-manja anaja Jesus miybina-langwiya ngawa mamirukwa, nani-rringka nakina Libaya n-angmakwu-laluma ebina-manja a-yukwujiya alikira arrawa. Biya Jesus ni-yama anuwa-wa, “Kwa, yi-yuwarna ngayuwa-manja,” ni-yama Jesus nakina da.
Anaja kembirra Libaya n-arjiyinga akwa ni-jadinga errekbu-wa. Biya ni-likana arakba nani-yuwarna Jesus-manja. Ni-lalikam-eka ebina warka nu-wardu-wardangi-mirra, kajungwa kan-abirraki-yuwarni yada nakina Jesus-manja da. Biya nani-likana arakba wun-alakina da.
Biya nakin-eka Libaya nanik-aburraki-yuwa nani-kaduwa Jesus-langwa arakba, akwa nani-mini-dakama anhinga Jesus-langwa ana-langwa-manja alikira. Arum-eka anhinga ni-daka-mirra. Kembirra na-walyuwa-manja akina, abirraja Jesus akwa ani-langwa wurru-kwala warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa akwa wurr-ababirn-eka warni-mamalya na-mirntaki-likani-mirra Libaya-langwu-wa alikira wurrakina. Wurru-kwala wurr-ababirna wurri-mirntak-akina warni-mamalya na-wardu-wardanguma abirr-ajukwaba warka angwarnta-manja, wurri-di-dirrbira Libaya adiniba-wiya, nara-wiya kini-likana nakina Jesus-uwa. Imba wurru-kwala wurri-mini-miningka. Biya na-yabukayina arakba wurrakina ebina anhinga da.
Abirraja wurru-kwala warnungkwarba Wurri-Barija akwa ngawa wurru-kwala warnungkwarba warnik-akakirumaka ayakwa aning-arum-uruma Mawijija-langwa warningma wurrakina ni-likani-mulangwa Jesus Libaya-langwu-wa alikira. Biya kembirra na-ngwurr-yangbayinuma wurrakina ayakwa akwa na-yama Jesus-langwu-wa warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa, “Miyambana-birra kirri-yabukayinama anhinga akwa kirri-bekayinama akwubibeka nakina-langwa-manja n-anungkwarba alikira? Kirri-yabukayinama karna akwa wurriybina narr-wurra-mirndukwuna-mirri-mirra angwarnta wurru-kwala-langwa warni-mamalya da. Wurru-wurrariya-manja warni-mamalya kirri-yabukayina-mirra karna da!” na-yama wurrakina da.
Anaja Jesus n-engkirrka-manja nakina abirra-langwa ayakwa, ni-yama abirruwa-wa, “Wurr-angb-angbilyuwa-m-eka warni-mamalya kuw-abirangkina-mirra wurrakina nu-wilyabu-wa n-anungkwarba kajungwa kan-aningaba-kini yada nakina angbilyuwa-langwa wurrakina. Imba abirraja wurr-iyngb-iyngbuda warni-mamalya nar-eka abirangkuma n-amukwiyad-akinu-wa n-anungkwarba wurrakina.
Imba nganja ningi-likanuma yangkwurrangwa kajungwa ka-dirrbira-kini yada ngayuwa wurru-wurrariya warni-mamalya, kajungwa nari yada wurrakina arrya-kajungwuma a-wurru-wurrariya-langwa imba kani-mini-yarrku-warakini yada God-langwu-wa ayakwa wurrakina da. Ka-yamina-manja warni-mamalya, ‘Nara arrya-kajungwuma awurrariya-langwa ngayuwa imba ningena ngawa ning-aningaba,’ kembirra nar-eka ngayuwa a-dirrbira-kuma wurr-amukwiyad-akina warni-mamalya, imba wurru-wurrariya yimbukwa warni-mamalya ka-dirrbira-kinama wulkwa ngayuwa da,” ni-yama nakina Jesus wurri-mirntak-iybinu-wa Wurri-Barija akwa ngawa wurri-mirntak-iybinu-wa warnik-akakirumaka ayakwa aning-arum-uruma Mawijija-langwa da.
Abirraja kembirra wurru-kwala warni-mamalya na-yama wurrakina Jesus-uwa, “Ningk-aningma wurri-mirntak-iybina warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa Janjana-langwa na-yaminjaminama. Ad-adinub-eka miri-miraya na-likajama wurrakina, kajungwa ka-biriyamini yada wurrakina God-uwa. Abirr-ajukwaba warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa Wurri-Barija-langwa na-yamina-mirra wurrakina akina. Akana abirraja warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa nungkwa-langwa nara wurrakina a-yamama akina, imba errbirra nuw-alyibarinama anhinga akwa na-bekayinama akwubibeka wurrakina,” na-yama wurri-mirntak-akina warni-mamalya Jesus-uwa.
Anaja Jesus ni-yama abirruwa-wa, “W-engkirrkiya enena ayakwa. Kini-yardiya-manja nu-wilyaba n-anungkwarba didarringka ani-langwa, kembirra wurr-ababirn-eka warni-mamalya ka-wurra-mirntukwunama wurrakina abirnuwa-manja kajungwa wurr-yakirrerri yada wurru-wurrakawuru-ma wurrakina. Akwa anhinga aningaba ka-yabikayinama. Kembirra nar-eka nungkwuwa a-yangbuma enena ayakwa abirruwa-wa, ‘Nara alyibaruma enena anhinga imba miri-miraya yiki-likajama.’ Nar-eka! Nara nungkwuwa a-yangbuma amukwiyad-akina ayakwa abirruwa-wa, mana wurri-mirntak-akina warni-mamalya narri-ngayindana-mubaba ka-yabikayinama ebina anhinga aningaba, kin-ambilya-manja ambaka niybina nani-mamalya abirra-langwa abirruwa-manja.
Ambaka arija-langwa, dukwa abirraja wurru-kwala wurru-wurrariya warnungkwarba kanu-wilyakinama engku-wa niybina ni-yardanguma dadingiy-anikba. Kembirra akini yada wulkwa abirraja wurri-mirntak-iybina warni-mamalya ani-langwa ka-werrik-awarrya-dinama wurrakina da. Karri-ngayindanam-eka ka-ngwanjinama anhinga-langwa, akwa ka-likajama miri-miraya wurrakina arakba da,” ni-yama Jesus wurri-mirntak-iybinu-wa warni-mamalya. Imba n-engkirrkanuma nakina Jesus ana-langwa-langwa akwa ngawa ana-langwa-langwa warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa da.
Biya kembirra Jesus nani-maka-mirra enena a-yukwujiya alawudawarra dimballa-langwa abirruwa-manja. Ni-yama nakina, “Nara ngarna a-yngkarrnguma ambilyuma-kuma dimballa dadi-kaduwa, kajungwa ngarniku-warrki yada diku-warra di-yukwijiya dimballa dadingaba d-iyngku-wa dimballa dadi-nungkwurakbu-wa. Nara akina a-yamama, nari yada arrya-kuma diybina dimballa dadi-kaduwa. Aki-yamina-manja akina, kembirra diybina dimballa dadi-kaduwa-dangwa kingi-kuwarrinama akwa ngawa d-iminiyngka dakina dadi-nungkwurakba-langwa dimballa arakba da.
“A-didirrbira-wiya, nar-eka ngarrakina a-jirabuma anikaduwa amalyirra anungkwurakbu-wa amakwilya ebina na-rrangkuwanginu-mirruwa arakba. Aki-yamina-manja akina, kembirra ka-rrangkuwangina-manja ebina amalyirra, kuw-akbalbarrinama da ebina amakwilya da, akwa ka-kwularrinama ebina amalyirra ajiringka-wa da.
Nara kembirra a-yamama ngarni-mamalya akina, imba anikaduwa amalyirra ngarri-jirabinama anikaduwa-wa amakwilya butilla da,” ni-yama nakina Jesus wurri-mirntak-iybinu-wa warni-mamalya da.
Biya kembirra enena engka alawudawarra amalyirra-langwa nani-makama Jesus abirruwa-manja. Ni-yama nakina, “Ebina amalyirra ngarra-maka-mulangwa ngayuwa, warni-mamalya narri-la-lalikinama akina kuw-anungkwurakba-dina-mirruwa. Na-waranama a-bekuma anikaduwa-wiya imba anungkwurakba-manja akina na-ybekinama. Kembirra na-ybekini-mulangwa warni-mamalya amalyirra anungkwurakba, na-waranam-eka ebina anikaduwa-langwa. Ka-yamina-mirra wurrakina, ‘Anungkwurakba-dangwa aningaba,’ ka-yamina-mirra,” ni-yama Jesus, nani-makama wurri-mirntak-iybina-manja warni-mamalya. Ni-yangbini-manja nakina alawudawarra dimballa-langwa akwa ngawa amalyirra-langwa ni-yaku-werri-bikinuma nakina Jesus warni-mamalya-langwa. Kani-yuwarna-manja anuwa-manja wurrakina, kembirra nar-eka a-likama wurrakina wurri-marngk-ambilyuma da.
Ngalaja m-amangbala m-ambilyuma mamawura makina ma-miykirra Jabida. Makina-manja mamawura abirraja wurri-mirntak-iybina warni-mamalya warningi-Judiya na-ngwanjini-mirra wurrakina warka-langwa. M-ababirna-langwa Jabida na-yaminjamama wurrakina warningi-Judiya warni-mamalya. Nara ka-wartanga wurrakina warka, imba na-likani-mirra God-langwu-wa alikira jinikakwu-wa. Akwa nani-yang-marngkwa-juwa-mirra yakwijina God. Mu-wilyaba-manja Jabida anaja nakina Jesus akwa ani-langwa warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa na-wurraki-likani-mirra yaya wurrakina. Biya na-wurraki-likanuma wurrakina amarta-langwiya amanhinga-langwiya. Awalyuwa arakba akina a-manhinga. Biya Jesus-langwa warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa narr-arrangbama lukwakwa akwala amadidira akwa ayarrka-mirra na-mambajinuma akina. Kembirra awurrariya amarta narru-wurrangi-mirra imba amadidira aning-iningaba nuw-alyibarinuma da, na-ngwujalangi-mirra wurrakina da.
Abirraja wurru-kwala Wurri-Barija warni-mamalya narra-rringkama wurrakina narr-arrangbama nuw-alyibarinuma akina anhinga. Biya na-yama abirruwa-wa, “Kirri-yamarrkinam-eka karna? Ngakwurra-langwa ayakwa aning-arum-uruma ngarraki-makinama akina, ‘Nara karning-errbirra karni-mamalya a-warduma warka Jabida-manja,’ na-yaminama akina. Imba nungkwurraja karni-mamalya kirru-wartanama karna warka yalakwa Jabida-manja kirrakina da. Kembirra kirru-yarrku-wurranguma arakba karna ebina ayakwa aning-arum-uruma na? Awurrariy-eka enena kirri-yaminama kirrakina da,” na-yama wurrakina Wurri-Barija Jesus-langwu-wa warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa da.
Anaja Jesus ni-yama abirrawa-wa, “Karningma ebina Dayibida ni-yama-mirri-langwa arakbirakba-kiya-wiya, nara-wiya kini-bungkawa-dina nakina. Ni-mirayangi-mirra nakina akwa wurru-kwala warnungkwarba ani-langwa.
Kembirra n-awiyabana nakina Dayibida God-langwa-manja kalliykwa. Biya ni-manga anhinga damba akwa n-alyibarina. Biya nanu-kwa ekuwarra ena-langwu-wa warnungkwarba. Abirr-ajukwaba kembirra nuw-alyibarina da. Mama akwurtukwurta akina, imba nuw-alyibarinuma wurrakina da. Nara warning-errbirra kuw-aly-alyibarina warni-mamalya akina anhinga imba abirraja Wurru-Minida warnungkwarba yimbukwa nuw-aly-alyibarinuma wulkwa da. Akana anaja Dayibida n-alyibarinuma ebina anhinga akwurtukwurta da,” ni-yama Jesus wurri-mirntak-iybina-manja Wurri-Barija warnungkwarba da.
Biya ni-yama ngarningka abirruwa-wa nakina, “Ngayuw-eka ningena, ningiybina-mirrada ningi-rukwularrinuma enena-manja angalya, Ningu-bungkaw-eka ngayuwa Jebuda-langwa ningena da,” ni-yama Jesus da.
Bi...ya ma-miniyngka-manja Jabida ni-likanuma Jesus jinikakwu-wa. N-awiyabanuma nakina alikira-manja arrawa biya nan-akakiruma-kama yakwijina God-langwa ayakwa wurru-kwala-manja warni-mamalya. An-ajukwaba nu-wilyaba n-anungkwarba ni-mini-rrengmirnirna ayarrka n-angmakwu-lali-mirra nakina yakwijina. Nara kinu-warri-juwa nakina ayarrka n-ekbida-langwa-langwa. Aning-angkawura na-mirntak-ayuwayanguma akina.
Ebina-manja ngawa jinikakwa abirraja wurru-kwala warnungkwarba warnik-akakirumaka Mawijija-langwa ayakwa aning-arum-uruma nuw-ambilyi-mirra yakwijina akwa ngawa wurru-kwala Wurri-Barija warni-mamalya abirr-ajukwaba. Nani-rribirringkama wurrakina angwurra ngawa Jesus-uwa. Nuw-andayuma anuwa-wa kani-min-aningaba-kina-mirrikba nakina Jesus ayarrka niybina-langwa n-anungkwarba, mana nani-ngayindanguma wurrakina warniki-lekbi yada Jesus awurrariya-langwa. Kini-ngekbirakina-manja Jesus ebina ayarrka akini yada ngawa Jabida-manja, kembirra kani-lekbajama Jesus-uwa wurrakina. Ka-yaminama anuwa-wa, “Awurrariy-eka akina mana aduwaba Jabida baba ena da,” ka-yaminama wurrakina anuwa-wa da.
Akana n-aningma anaja Jesus mangma abirra-langwa akwa ni-yama nakina niybinu-wa n-anungkwarba, “Kwa, mirajanga, akwa likaja yangkwurrangwa amarru-wa,” ni-yama. Anaja kembirra ni-mirajanga, ni-lika nakina amarru-wa akwa n-arjiyingama Jesus-manja akwudangwa.
Imba kembirra ni-yama nakina Jesus wurri-mirntak-iybinu-wa warni-mamalya yakwijina nuw-angmakayanguma jinikakwa-manja arrawa, “Yirri-makina arakba,” ni-yama. “Ka-yamarrkinama ayakwa aning-arum-uruma Mawijija-langwa ngarniki-yama-langwa ngarna? Aki-yaminama ngakwurruwa aningaba Jabida-manja yinda awurrariya? Imba ak-anibi-kinama ngarna warni-mamalya yinda aka-jungwa-jinama?” ni-yama nakina Jesus abirruwa-wa.
Ni-yangbinuma Jesus amirntak-akina ayakwa biya nani-rringkama nakina wurri-mirntak-iybinu-wa warni-mamalya wurru-wilyu-wilyaba-wiya-wa. Biya ni-yama nakina niybinu-wa n-anungkwarba, “Wu-lawulawa-jiya ayarrka nungkwa-langwa,” ni-yama. Anaja kembirra nakina n-anungkwarba ni-lawulawa-ja arakba ayarrka ana-langwa da. A-rrengmirnirna-mirrada akana na-yngbudi-da arakba da.
Abirraja wurrakina awinyamba narrak-ardarra wurri-mirntak-iybina warnungkwarba warnik-akakirumaka akwa abirr-ajukwaba Wurri-Barija warnungkwarba wurrakina. Na-lyalyimbukwayini-mirra biya, “Aki-yamarrkina-mirra ngarna naka-manja n-anungkwarba?” na-yama wurrakina da.
Akini yada kembirra anaja Jesus nu-wurtanguma angak-arjiyinga-wa angalya n-akwukawura, kajungwa kini-biriyamini yada nakina God-uwa yakwijina. Ni-bi-biriyaminu...wa. Na-larri-mirda arakba. Ni-bi-biriyamina nakina ngawu...wa. Marngkirngkuwilyarra arakba. Ni-yaminjama ngawa nakina yanda-langwa na-ykbadanguma arakba akina.
Buwa-wiya. Kembirra nan-arti-juwa Jesus ani-langwa warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa anuwa-wa. Biya nu-wekbalyinuma nakina wurri-memberrkwa wurr-ambilyuma warnungkwarba. Biya nani-yangbi-juwama nakina warniki-larrki-larrka warnungkwarba wurrakina, mana baba ani-langwa warniki-minu-wardu-warda wurri-mirntak-akina arakba, akwa ambaka-mirra kani-larrkaja-mubaba nakina angerrba yiya angerrba warniki-maki yada wurrakina warni-mamalya-manja God-langwa-langwa.
Warna warni-miykirra Jayumuna, niybina Jesus nani-yangbi-juwama Bida, yiya naniki-marnj-anikba Endiruwa, yiya Jaminja yiya Janjana yiya Biliba yiya Badalamaya
yiya Meduwa yiya Damija yiya Jaminja, niybina nanukw-anikba Albiyija-langwa nakina, akwa ngawa nu-wilyaba n-iyngka Jayumuna. Imba naka n-anungkwarba Jayumuna akwa wurru-kwala warni-mamalya ani-langwa warningi-Judiya nuw-awinyamba-dinum-eka angwurra wurrakina mana warningi-Rawuma warni-mamalya narri-lyinga-mubaba abirra-langwa angalya Judiya. Amin-akina-langwa kembirra na-yangbi-jajungwuni-mirra wurrakina Jelada. Akina ekirra abirra-langwa.
Akwa wun-ambilyuma wun-anungkwarba-kiya abirn-ajukwaba nu-wekbalyinuma Jesus wun-ani-miykirra-kiya Judija. Nu-wilyaba nanukw-anikba Jaminja-langwa nakina imba ningka-langwa Judija nani-miykirra Yijikariyada, niybina kanu-wilyakinama wurru-kwala wurri-bu-bungkawa Jesus-uwa kajungwa kani-mani yada nakina.
Biya kembirra Jesus akwa ngawa wurri-mirntak-iybina warnungkwarba warni-miykirra warniki-larrki-larrka akwa ngawa ani-langwa wurru-kwala warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa na-wurraki-dirrirntuma wurrakina yadikina karrawara-langwa a-ngakbilyuwalyu-wa angalya. Biya nuw-akbirrang-anja yakwijina wurr-ababirn-eka warni-mamalya wurriybina Jesus-langwa warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa abirr-ajukwaba wurrakina. Akwa ngarningka wurr-ababirn-eka warni-mamalya wurri-mini-miningka abirr-ajukwaba na-wurraki-likani-mirra yanjarrikina amini-miniyngka-langwa angalya. Na-wurraki-likani-mirra engka-langwa yiya engka-langwa angalya Judiya-langwa akwa ngawa Jirujalema-langwa. Akwa ngawa Daya-langwa akwa Jayidina-langwa na-mirntaki-likani-mirra wurru-kwala. Alakina-kiya angalya Daya akwa Jayidina alarrki-mijiyalya-manja nuw-ambilyi-mirra alakina.
Na-wurraki-likanum-eka wurrakina engka-langwa yiya engka-langwa angalya na-wurra-mirntukwunuma kajungwa warnik-engkirrki yada Jesus-langwu-wa ayakwa, akwa ngawa nanik-aningaba-ki yada nakina Jesus wurriybina wurr-angb-angbilyuwa-mirra warni-mamalya. Imba n-arjiyinga anaja Jesus yakwijina ebina-manja ngawa angalya a-ngakbilyuwalya-manja. Ni-yangbinuma nakina abirruwa-manja ayakwa akwa ngarningka nan-aningaba-ka-mirra wurrakina angbilyuwa-langwa. Imba abirraja wurru-kwala wurri-mirntak-akina na-werrik-angbilyuwa-dinuma mana wurr-amukwa wurru-wurrariya nuw-ambilyi-mubaba abirruwa-manja. Anaja Jesus kembirra nani-mirntaki-jadijuwama wurrakina wurr-amukwa abirruwa-langwa.
Imba wurr-ababirna-langwa warni-mamalya nanu-wurraki-ngayindanguma kuw-akwudangwu-kajungwuni yada Jesus-uwa kajungwa warniki-lyingi yada nakina-manja wurrakina da, mana nakina God nani-yngbidirr-kama Jesus-manja da. Kembirra nan-aningaba-kama nakina wurri-mirntak-akina warni-mamalya wurr-ababirna-langwa da.
Biya kembirra Jesus nanu-wurraki-rringkama nakina ena-langwu-wa warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa akwa ni-yangbinuma abirruwa-manja amirntak-enena ayakwa nuw-engkirrkani-mirri-manja abirr-ajukwaba wurru-kwala warni-mamalya. Ni-yama Jesus, “Karninga-lyingma-lyingma kirriybina karni-mamalya, aningab-eka ka-ngekbiraka-jungwunama nungkwurra-langwa, mana God nu-bungkawa-dina-mubaba arakba nungkwurruwa-manja nakina.
Imba nungkwurraja kirri-mirayana-mirri-mirra aduwaba karni-mamalya, aningab-eka ka-ngekbiraka-jungwunama nungkwurra-langwa nungkwurr-ajukwaba akina. Ambaka-mirri-mirra yiki-ladanama kirrakina. Imba nungkwurraja kirri-ngwada-yina-mirri-mirra aduwaba karni-mamalya, aningab-eka ka-ngekbiraka-jungwunama nungkwurra-langwa nungkwurr-ajukwaba akina. Ambaka-mirri-mirra yiki-marngkinama kirrakina da.
Mama wurru-kwala warni-mamalya yikabu-wurriykbinama wurrakina, imba anaja God n-aningab-eka nungkwurruwa-manja. Yikabu-wurriykbinama wurrakina, ka-waranama nungkwurruwa, akwa ka-yangbinama wurrakina ayarrk-iyarrk-awarrya ayakwa nungkwurruwa-wa akwa ka-yaminama nungkwurruwa-wa, ‘Karniniyarrya kirrakina karni-mamalya,’ ka-yaminama wurrakina. Ka-yaminam-eka akina mana kirru-werrik-ambilya-mubaba nungkwurruwa karni-mamalya ngayuwa-manja, ningiybina-mirrada ningi-rukwularrinuma enena-manja angalya. Mama akina imba nakin-eka God n-aningab-eka nungkwurruwa-manja.
Abirr-ajukwaba arakbirakba-kiya-wiya abirra-langwa wurri-miri-mirarrngwa warning-arakbirakba-kiya narra-wurriykbama Wurri-Birabidu-wa warni-mamalya wurriybina nani-mini-yangbi-yangbinu-mirruwa ayakwa God-langwa wurrakina. Kembirra aduwaba yikabu-wurriykbina-manja warni-mamalya warning-aduwaba nungkwurruwa-wa, nungkwurraja yiku-werriki-lyalyingma-jungwunama kirrakina. Kinu-ngwurrkbalinama yukwudukwuda nungkwurra-langwa mana God yikanu-kwunama aning-iningaba ani-langwa, akini yada ngawa yiki-likaja-manja kirrakina ena-langwu-wa angalya aningabu-wa.
Imba nungkwurraja kirri-min-ababirna angwarnta yiya amirntakijika, ka-ngekbiraka-jungwunam-eka a-wurru-wurrariya nungkwurra-langwa, mana kirru-wilyakinam-eka akina arakba alarr-ngekbirna aning-iningaba nungkwurra-langwa aduwaba. Kembirra nara akwala a-manguma nungkwurruwa.
Imba nungkwurraja kirri-ladana-mirri-mirra aduwaba karni-mamalya, ka-ngekbiraka-jungwunam-eka a-wurru-wurrariya nungkwurra-langwa nungkwurr-ajukwaba. Ambaka-mirri-mirra yiki-mirayanama kirrakina. Imba nungkwurraja kirri-marngkina-mirri-mirra karni-mamalya anibuwakida amarngka aduwaba, ka-ngekbiraka-jungwunam-eka a-wurru-wurrariya nungkwurra-langwa nungkwurr-ajukwaba. Ambaka-mirri-mirra yiki-jakawaranama da yiku-ngwadayinama kirrakina da.
Imba ka-yangbina-manja wurr-ababirna-langwa warni-mamalya ayakwa aning-iningaba nungkwurra-langwa-langwa, kembirra a-wurru-wurrariy-eka ka-ngekbiraka-jungwunama nungkwurra-langwa. Abirr-ajukwaba arakbirakba-kiya-wiya abirra-langwa wurri-miri-mirarrngwa warning-arakbirakba-kiya na-yaminjama-mirra amukwiyad-akina ayakwa wurri-ykiykalyu-wa Wurru-Birabida warni-mamalya. Wurri-mirntak-akin-eka ngawa Wurru-Birabida nara karra-maki-maka warni-mamalya-manja God-langwa ayakwa, imba abirra-langwa ayakwa amirntak-iybina ekiykalya-wiya na-yangbini-mirra wurri-mirntak-akinu-wa warni-mamalya. Imba abirraja wurr-ababirna warni-mamalya warning-arakbirakba-kiya-wiya na-yangbi-yangbayinuma wurrakina aning-iningaba ayakwa abirra-langwa-langwa. Kembirra aduwaba ka-yangbina-manja warni-mamalya aning-iningaba ayakwa nungkwurra-langwa-langwa, a-wurru-wurrariy-eka ka-ngekbiraka-jungwunama akina nungkwurra-langwa da,” ni-yama Jesus ena-langwu-wa warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa nakina da.
“W-engkirrkiya,” ni-yama ngarningka Jesus ena-langwu-wa warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa. “Enena ayakwa ngarra-makinama nungkwurruwa-manja, kirriybina kirr-engkirrkaja-mirri-manja ngayuwa-wa angwurra aduwaba mana baba nungkwurra-langwa mada nimu-ngwurdangmina-mubaba amandangwa. Nungkwaja ki-lyalyingminam-eka ningkakina warni-mamalya wurriybina kabi-wurrikbina-mirri-mirra nungkwuwa-wa. Ki-yaminam-eka aningaba wurri-mirntak-akina-manja warni-mamalya.
Kabi-ykbajina-manja wurru-kwala warni-mamalya nungkwuwa, kembirra arrkala nungkwamba-langwa kini-yang-kilabajama God-uwa, kajungwa kini-yamini yada nakina aningaba abirra-langwa. Imba wurru-kwala wurri-marngilyarra warni-mamalya kabi-larrkbarjana-manja ningkakina, akwa ka-yangbina-manja wurrakina ayakwa ayarrk-awarrya nungkwuwa-wa, kembirra arrkala nungkwamba-langwa kini-yang-kilabajama God-uwa, kajungwa kani-mamirika-jini yada nakina abirruwa-manja.
Imba nu-wilyaba nani-mamalya kani-larrkbarjiya-manja ningkakina awilyaba-langwa amungkwurra, nara a-ngwanja-juma nakina, imba mama kini-lalikina kani-larrkbarjana nakina nungkwuwa-manja ningki-kuwarra-langwa ningk-ani-mungkwurra. Imba kani-mirrakajiya-manja nu-wilyaba nani-mamalya dimballa nungkwa-langwa diybina dadikawiyaba dadingi-karrawara, nara a-ngwanja-juma nakina nungkwuwa, imba ngarningka kininga-mana diybina dimballa nungkwa-langwa dadikawiyaba dading-arrawa ngal-ajukwaba da.
Imba kabi-yandabaja-manja warning-errbirra warni-mamalya nungkwa-langwa amirntakijika, kembirra nungkwaja ka-kwunama. Imba wurriybina kabi-mirrakajiya-manja amirntakijika nungkwa-langwa, kembirra nara a-larrngki-lawurraka-juma amirntak-akina. Mama nara a-lawurraka-juma amirntak-akina wurrakina.
Imba nungkwaja ki-marngkirra-dinam-eka ningkakina wurru-kwala-manja warni-mamalya, wubirra laka ningkarra-ngayindanama wurrakina ka-marngkirra-dinama abirramba-langwa nungkuwa-manja da.
Laka nara ningkakina a-lyalyingmama wurr-ababirna-manja warni-mamalya imba ningki-lyalyingminama warni-mamalya wulkwa wurriybina na-lyalyingmina-mirri-mirra nungkwuwa-manja? Anaja kembirra God nara nakina a-yamama enena ayakwa nungkwuwa-wa, ‘Yirra-werru-ngwurdanama ngayuwa nungkwuwa-manja.’ Nara nakina a-yamama akina ayakwa nungkwuwa-wa, mana abirr-ajukwaba wurru-wurrariya warni-mamalya na-lyalyingma-jayinama wurrakina. Na-lyalyingminama wurrakina warni-mamalya wurriybina abirramba-langwa na-lyalyingmina-mirri-mirra abirruwa-manja da.
Imba laka nara ningkakina a-marngkirra-duma wurr-ababirna-manja warni-mamalya imba ki-yaminama nungkwuwa aningaba warni-mamalya-manja wulkwa wurriybina na-yamina-mirri-manja nungkwuwa-manja? Anaja kembirra God nara a-yamama enena ayakwa nungkwuwa-wa, ‘Yirra-werru-ngwurdanama ngayuwa nungkwuwa-manja.’ Nar-eka, mana abirr-ajukwaba wurru-wurrariya warni-mamalya na-yamina-mubaba wurrakina aningaba warni-mamalya-manja wurriybina na-yamina-mirri-manja abirramba-langwa aningaba abirruwa-manja.
Dukwa nungkwaja ka-kwunama amirntakijika nungkwa-langwa wurru-kwala-manja warni-mamalya warnik-akwurraji yada akina aduwaya wurrakina warni-mamalya. Akana nara wurr-ababirna-manja warni-mamalya a-kwama nungkwuwa nungkwa-langwa amirntakijika aning-aduwaya, imba wurri-mirntak-iybina-manja wulkwa warni-mamalya wurriybina kabi-mini-lawurraka-jina-mirri-manja wurrakina arija-langwa amirntak-iybina amirntakijika nungkwa-langwa. Anaja kembirra nakina God nara a-yamama enena ayakwa nungkwuwa-wa, ‘Yirra-werru-ngwurdanama ngayuwa nungkwuwa-manja.’ Nar-eka, mana abirr-ajukwaba wurru-wurrariya warni-mamalya na-kwayina-mirri baba aning-aduwaya, kajungwa ambaka-mirra karr-mani yada wurrakina a-di-dirrbira-wiya.
Nungkwaj-eka ki-lyalyingminama wurri-mirntak-iybina warni-mamalya wurriybina kabi-wurrikbina-mirri-mirra nungkwuwa-wa. Ki-yaminam-eka ningkakina aningaba abirruwa-manja. Akwa ka-kwunama amirntakijika nungkwa-langwa aduwaya abirruwa-wa, akwa nara engkirrkuma ningkakina warniki-lawurraka-ja-langwa wurrakina amirntak-iybina amirntakijika nungkwa-langwa. Ki-yamina-manja nungkwuwa akina, kembirra anaja God kini-yaminama aningaba nakina angwurra nungkwuwa-manja, akwa God-langwa ningk-ani-mamalya k-ambilyama ningkakina. Nakin-eka n-aruma ni-mikbiyiya-dangwa God. Kembirra God wubirra ki-yaminama ningkakina, mana ni-marngkirra-dina-mubaba nakina wurru-wurrariya-manja warni-mamalya. Mama nara engkirrkuma wurrakina wurru-kwalu-wa warni-mamalya, mama na-min-engk-iyngkirraja-jungwunama wurrakina, imba ni-marngkirra-dinam-eka amandangwa abirruwa-manja nakina.
Nakin-eka Nungwanyungwa n-errkwulinama amandangwa ngarni-mamalya-manja. Kembirra nungkwurr-ajukwaba yik-errkwulinama kirrakina wurri-mini-miningka-manja warni-mamalya kirrakina da,” ni-yama Jesus ena-langwu-wa warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa da.
Biya ni-yama Jesus ngarningka ena-langwu-wa warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa, “Nar-eka a-lyangku-werri-bika-jungwuma warni-mamalya-langwa warningaba-mirrikba akwa wurru-wurrariya-mirrikba wurrakina. Anaja kembirra God nara a-lyangku-werri-bika-jungwuma nakina nungkwa-langwa-langwa, ningk-aningaba-mirrikba akwa ningku-wurrariya-mirrikba ningkakina. Akwa nara ngarningka a-lekbuma warni-mamalya-manja. Anaja kembirra God nara nakina a-lekbuma nungkwuwa ningkakina. Imba nungkwaja ka-mini-yakwabijinama ningkakina a-wurru-wurrariya wurru-kwala-langwa. Kembirra an-ajukwaba God kani-mini-yakwabijinama nakina a-wurru-wurrariya nungkwa-langwa da.
Imba nungkwaja ka-kwunama aning-iningaba-wiya wurru-kwala-manja warni-mamalya. Anaja kembirra God kanu-kwunama aning-iningaba-wiya nungkwuwa-manja. Nakin-eka God ni-mekba ni-lyangma, akwa kanu-kwu-kwunama aningaba nani-ngangkawura. Kanu-wekbilyanama nungkwuwa-manja akwa nara a-ngwanjuma. Kini-yaminama God wubirra laka nu-wilyaba nani-mamalya ni-jirabinama nakina yini-malyirra yilyakwa nungkwa-langwu-wa bajikala. Nara a-ngwanjuma nakina imba ni-jirabinama yakina kini-lyangburrkwuna-mirruwa yiybina nungkwa-langwa-manja bajikala da. An-ajukwaba nakina God nara a-ngwanjuma imba kanu-wekbilyanama ngawa aning-iningaba-wiya nungkwuwa-manja nani-ngangkawura. Imba nungkwuwa ka-kwuna-manja aningaba wurru-kwala-manja warni-mamalya ningki-mekba-manja ningkakina, kembirra anamba-langwa nakina God kanu-kwunama aningaba nungkuwa-manja da,” ni-yama Jesus nakina da.
Amirntak-akina-bina ayakwa ni-yangbinuma Jesus, nani-makama nakina ana-langwa-manja warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa. Biya kembirra enena alawudawarra nani-makama arakba nakina wurri-mimbi-mimba-langwa akwa warnik-akakirumaka-langwa warni-mamalya. Ni-yama Jesus abirruwa-wa, “Wi-yaku-werribikina wurri-mimbi-mimba-langwa warni-mamalya. Kani-lirraki-ngayindana-manja wun-ambilyuma-kiya wuni-mimba-kiya kani-likaja-manja yaya, nar-eka wunalakina arnta-waraka-jajuma a-wilyaka-jajuma da. Kani-lirraki-larra-maka edirra-wa da.
Abirn-ajukwaba wun-ambilyuma-kiya wun-ani-mamalya-kiya wun-alekbina wuni-ykikamarra-kiya nar-eka akakirumaka-jajuma wunalakina. Imba anaja nu-wilyaba nanik-akakirumaka kanu-wilyakajinama ningka-langwa nani-mamalya ni-yukwijiya, mana n-akakiruma baba nakina angwurra. Anaja ni-yukwijiya-dangwa ni-ngayindi-jungwunuma an-ajukwaba aringkawi yada nakina. Kembirra kin-akakiruma-kajungwunama nakina angwurra. Kin-engkirrkajama angwurra ayakwa ana-langwa-langwa bungkawa. Kin-engk-iyngkirrkajama ngawa m-ababirna-langwa marrnga, kini-yamina-mirruwa nakina ababirna-langwa niybina nu-bungkawa n-akakiruma. Kembirra akini yada ngawa arija-langwa wun-alakina-kiya kani-lirrak-aningmi-dinama wuni-di-dirrbira-kiya da,” ni-yama Jesus ena-langwu-wa warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa da.
Biya ngarningka ni-yangbina nakina Jesus ayakwa, nani-makama angwurra wurri-mirntak-iybinu-wa warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa. Ni-yama, “Nungkwaja ningku-werrik-awarrya-dinama ningkakina ebina-langwa a-yukwujiya ajiringka naniki-marnj-ana-langwa-manja manba. Miyambana-birra ningku-werrik-awarrya-dinama akina-langwa, akana nara engkirrkuma nungkwuwa arumu-wa eka nungkwa-langwa-manja manba?
Nungkwaja nara a-yamama naniki-marnj-anu-wa, ‘Nganiyarrya, nanikama, ngi-miya-langwa akina ajiringka nungkwa-langwa-langwa manba.’ Nara a-yamama akina, mana nara baba ningkakina a-rringkama ebina eka adirrngwarna-dangwa nungkwa-langwa-manja manba. Ka-ngayindanama ningkakina wurru-kwala warni-mamalya ka-yaminama, ‘Ningk-aningab-eka ningkakina,’ akana ningku-wurrariya nungkwuwa. Adiniba-wiya ki-ngkarbajinama eka nungkwa-langwa-langwa manba, kajungwa ki-rringkini yada angwurra ningk-anik-ambijanga-ji yada ebina ajiringka a-yukwujiya manba-langwa naniki-marnj-ana-langwa ningkakina da,” ni-yama nakina Jesus ena-langwu-wa warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa da.
Biya ni-yama nakina Jesus abirruwa-wa ngarningka, “W-engkirrkiya-langwa enena alawudawarra ka-makinama. Ka-makinama alawudawarra eka-langwa nuw-arrangbina-mulangwa a-manhinga a-mamamuwa. Awilyaba eka aning-anhinga aningaba-dangwa nuw-arrangbinama akina a-manhinga a-mamamuwa ngala-langwa anik-aly-alyibara aningaba. Akana ebina-mirrada a-wilyaba-ma eka aningaba nara arrangbama a-manhinga a-mamamuwa awurrariya ebina nara ngakwurruwa alyibaruma. Akwa ngalaja eka awurrariya-dangwa nara arrangbama akina a-manhinga a-mamamuwa aningaba anik-aly-alyibara.
Aki-rringkina-manja ngakwurraja a-manhinga a-mamamuwa eka-manja, ngarningma ngarrakina akina eka aningaba-mirrikba akwa ngawa awurrariya-mirrikba, mana ngarningma baba ngala-langwa a-manhinga a-mamamuwa ebina nuw-arrangbinama. Kembirra akima-ngayindana-manja ngarrakina manyungwunya ak-alyibarini yada, nara a-likama ngarna akwurrirra-wa, imba manyungwunyu-wa aki-likajama akim-arrangbinama da. Akwa ngarningka, aki-ngayindana-manja akwurana ak-alyibarini yada ngarrakina, nara a-likama yimirriru-wa imba akwuranu-wa aki-likajama ak-arrangbinama da.
Amandangwa aningaba eka nuw-arrangbinama akina a-manhinga a-mamamuwa aning-iningaba-wiya, imba awurrariya eka nuw-arrangbinama akina a-manhinga a-mamamuwa a-wurru-wurrariya-wiya. Imba anaja nu-wilyaba n-anungkwarba n-aningaba kini-yaminjamina-manja aningaba-wiya nakina, akin-eka wubirra eka aningaba kini-yaminama nakina, mana nara baba engkirrkuma nakina awurrariya-wa imba kin-engk-iyngkirrkaja-mubaba ngawa aningabu-wa. Imba anaja nu-wurrariya n-anungkwarba kini-yaminjaminama awurrariya-wiya, mana n-engk-iyngkirrkaja-mubaba ngawa awurrariya-wa angwurra nakina. Imba ngalaja ayakwa ngakwurra-langwa ebina ka-jadanama edirra-langwa aki-yangbina-mulangwa ayakwa ngarrakina, adiniba-wiya nuw-ambilyi-mirra akina ngakwurra-langwa-manja mangma yiya yukwudukwuda-manja da,” ni-yama Jesus ena-langwu-wa warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa da.
Biya kembirra ni-yama ngarningka Jesus abirruwa-wa, “Kirri-yaminjaminama ngawa kirrakina ngayuwa-wa, ‘Bungkawa, Bungkawa,’ kirri-yaminjaminama. Miyambana-birra yirri-yangbi-jinama ngayuwa Ningi-bungkawa ningena kirrakina, akana yirri-mini-yarrku-wurranama ayakwa nganyangwa?
Kirru-wilyaba karni-mamalya nara-manja a-mini-yarrku-wurruma akina ayakwa nganyangwa imba yiki-likaja-manja ngayuwa-wa akwa yiki-mini-yarrku-warakina-manja nganyangwa ayakwa, kirri-miyamban-eka kembirra kirrakina karni-mamalya? Ka-makinama ngayuwa.
Kirrakin-eka karni-mamalya wubirr-eka nu-wilyaba n-anungkwarba ni-likira-kama nakina alikira ani-langwa. Nakin-eka ni-mungkadini-mirra adiniba-wiya angwujirira edirra ajiringka-manja. Ni-mungkwu-mungkwadini-mirra nakina yanda-langwa n-akbirrangarnuma akwurraka angwarnta. Biya kembirra ni-likira-ka-mirra arakba nakina alikira ani-langwa ebina-manja ngawa angwarnta akwurraka kajungwa engbidi yada ebina alikira. Bi...ya kembirra ngalaja akungwa na-ditimina adirrngwarna. Biya na-wartanguma angwurra akina akungwa akina-manja alikira, akana nara ka-ykbilyajanga akina. Akwurrak-eka ngawa nuw-arjayi-mirra akina, mana aningaba baba warka nu-wardanguma niybina n-anungkwarba. Aningab-eka engbida alikira ni-likira-ka-mirra nakina da.
Imba kirru-wilyaba karni-mamalya yik-engkirrkaja-manja ayakwa nganyangwa kirrakina, akana yiki-mini-yarrku-wurrana-manja akina ayakwa nganyangwa, kirri-miyamban-eka kembirra kirrakina karni-mamalya? Ka-makinama arakba ngayuwa. Kirrakin-eka karni-mamalya wubirr-eka nu-wilyaba n-iyngka n-anungkwarba ni-likira-kama nakina ani-langwa alikira an-ajukwaba. Akana errbirra ajiringka-manja ngawa ni-likira-kama akina. Nara kini-mungkadina edirra adiniba-wiya nakina akwa nara kini-likira-ka alikira ani-langwa akwurraka-manja angwarnta. Bi...ya kembirra ngalaja akungwa na-ditimina adirrngwarna. Biya na-wartanguma angwurra alikira-manja akwa waranja-bawiya na-ykbilyajanguma akina. Kembirra arngkawura-mirra ngawa na-jarridinuma da,” ni-yama Jesus ena-langwu-wa warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa da.
Anaja Jesus ni-jarrukwama amirntak-iybina ayakwa ni-yangbini-mulangwa wurri-mirntak-iybina-manja warni-mamalya, biya kembirra ni-likana arakba nakina engembu-wa Kabuniyumu-wa.
Yakwijina akina-manja ngawa angalya Kabuniyuma n-ambilyi-mirra anaja nu-wilyaba nu-bungkawa wurr-awinyamba-langwa. Naningi-Rawum-eka nakina. Biya nakina nu-bungkawa nu-bungkawa-dinuma wurr-ababirna-manja warnungkwarba wurr-awinyamba. Abirr-ajukwaba warningi-Rawuma wurrakina. Kembirra nakina nu-bungkawa abirra-langwa nu-werrik-awarrya-dinuma mana baba nu-wilyaba naniki-minu-wardu-warda ani-langwa n-angbilyuwa-dinuma aruma ajungwa akwa ni-lyalyingminu-mubaba nakina-manja akwa arngki-darrba kini-jungwuni-mubaba nakina.
Biya nu-bungkawa nakina n-engkirrkanuma ayakwa wurru-kwala-langwa warni-mamalya na-maki-jayini-mulangwa Jesus-langwa. Biya kembirra ni-yama nakina wurru-kwalu-wa wurr-arum-uruma warnungkwarba warningi-Judiya-wa, “Jay! Wurri-likaja angerrba Jesus-uwa. Wurri-yarrku-wilyakina enena ayakwa anuwa-wa akwa yikini-makina kini-likaji yada nakina waranja-bawiya yangkwurrangwa nganyangwu-wa alikira kajungwa kan-anibi-kini yada naniki-minu-wardu-warda nganyangwa,” ni-yama nakina wurri-mirntak-iybinu-wa wurr-arum-uruma warningi-Judiya-wa.
Abirraja kembirra na-likana arakba wurrakina warnungkwarba wurr-arum-uruma Jesus-uwa. Biya na-yama anuwa-wa, “Nu-wilyaba nu-bungkawa N-aningi-Rawuma ngini-ngayindanama nungkwuwa ki-likajama kin-aningaba-kinama ani-langwa naniki-minu-wardu-warda angbilyuwa-langwa.
Nakin-eka nu-bungkawa n-aningaba nakina akwa ni-lyalyingminama ngakwurruwa Ngarningi-Judiya ngarni-mamalya. Ngarrani-mini-likira-kama arakba alikira God-langwa enena-manja angalya. Amandangwa n-aningab-eka nakina nani-mamalya. Kembirra ngarri-likaja enena-wiya,” na-yama wurri-mirntak-iybina wurr-arum-uruma Jesus-uwa.
Biya na-mirntaki-likanuma arakba wurrakina wurr-arum-uruma akwa ngawa wurr-ababirna warni-mamalya Jesus abirruwa. Nuw-ali-likanu...wa. Ngalaja nuw-akwudangwu-dina arakba alikira niybina-langwa nu-bungkawa N-aningi-Rawuma, akana abirraja wurri-bukwaya wurru-kwala warni-mamalya ani-langwa nani-mini-yarrku-wilyakama ayakwa Jesus-uwa. “Bungkawa, arjiyinga-langwa yakwijina,” na-yama. “Nara arakba a-likama. Yirrani-makama niybina nu-bungkawa wurr-awinyamba-langwa, ‘Jay! Wurri-likaja Jesus-uwa. Yikini-makina nari yada a-likama awiyabuma nakina nganyangwu-wa alikira, mana n-aruma baba nu-bungkawa nakina Jesus, imba ningi-yukwijiy-eka ningena ngayuwa.
Akwa amin-akina-langwa nara ngarningka a-likama nganja anuwa-wa. Imba ani-yangbina wulkwa ayakwa nakina, kajungwa nganyangwa naniki-minu-wardu-warda kin-aningaba-dini yada arakba,’ ni-yama nakina nu-bungkawa N-aningi-Rawuma yirruwa-manja.
Akwa enena engka ayakwa yirrani-makama nakina. ‘Ngayuw-eka ningena ningi-bungkawa,’ ni-yama nakina, ‘akana ningani-min-engkirrkajam-eka nganjukwaba nganyangwu-wa nu-bungkawa. Abirr-ajukwaba wurr-awinyamba nganyangwa wurriybina-manja ningi-bungkawa-dinama ngayuwa nuw-engkirrkajam-eka ayakwa nganyangwa. Ki-yamina-manja ngayuwa warning-errbirra-wa warnungkwarba nganyangwu-wa, Jay! Likaja nungkwuwa angerrba, kembirra waranja-bawiya kini-likajama nakina angerrba. Imba ki-yamina-manja ngayuwa ningku-wa n-anungkwarba, Kwa yangkwurrangwa ngayuwa-wa, kembirra waranja-bawiya kini-likajama ngayuwa-wa nakina. Imba ki-yamina-manja ngayuwa nganyangwu-wa naniki-minu-wardu-warda, Wardana ena warka! Kembirra amandangwa kinu-wardanama nakina da nganyangwa-langwiya ayakwa da,’ ni-yam-eka nakina nu-bungkawa N-aningi-Rawuma yirruwa-manja,” na-yama wurri-mirntak-iybina warni-mamalya ani-langwa Jesus-uwa.
Kembirra anaja Jesus ni-yakikbijanginum-eka nakina amirntak-akina-langwa ayakwa, biya ni-nyaku-warrkwa-jungwa akwa ni-yangbina ayakwa wurri-mirntak-iybina-manja wurr-ababirna warni-mamalya wurriybina nani-yuwarni-mirri-manja anuwa-manja. Ni-yama Jesus abirruwa-wa, “Nara ambaka ngayuwa k-akbirrangarna karning-errbirra karni-mamalya kirriybina yiki-werrik-ambilya-mirri-mirra angwurra ngayuwa-manja. Nara kirru-wilyu-wilyaba karni-mamalya enena-manja angalya Yijireyila-manja a-werrik-ambilyuma angwurra ngayuwa-manja, imba anaja N-aningi-Rawuma nani-mamalya nu-werrik-ambilyama amandangwa ngayuwa-manja angwurra nakina,” ni-yama nakina Jesus wurri-mirntak-iybinu-wa wurru-wurra-kwilyimida warni-mamalya.
Abirraja kembirra wurri-mirntak-iybina warnungkwarba na-mirntaki-lawurradina arakba niybinu-wa nu-bungkawa N-aningi-Rawuma. Biya na-yarda wurrakina ana-langwa-manja alikira. Akwa nani-rringka niybina n-angbilyuwa-dinuma naniki-minu-wardu-warda ani-langwa n-aningaba-duma kemba nakina arakba da.
Anaja kembirra ni-likanuma Jesus engembu-wa Nayina, ani-langwa warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa abirruwa. Abirraja wurru-kwala wurru-wurra-kwilyimida warni-mamalya na-mirntaki-likanuma wurru-wurrakawuru-ma Jesus-manja. Na-wurrak-ali-likanu...wa.
Ngalaja nuw-akwudangwu-dina arakba akina angalya Nayina amin-ababirna alikira yiya warni-mamalya. Kembirra na-yarda arakba Jesus-mirrya akawiyuwiyaba-manja akwudangwa. Akini yada ngawa abirraja wurru-kwala warni-mamalya na-jadanga errekbu-wa. Nanu-wilyakama nu-wilyaba naniki-jungwa n-anungkwarba warniki-rungkwabi yada nakina. Ngalaja dirnt-anikba di-ngaya dakina, akana nara arakba wurri-yukwayuwa ngala-langwa, mana nu-wilyaba-ma yimbukwa nabirr-adikba nakina. Biya yingi-jadanga Nayina-langwa ngaluwa akwa wurru-wurra-kwilyimida warni-mamalya.
Anaja Nu-Bungkawa Jesus nanga-rringka-manja nakina, n-errkwulinuma dakinu-wa di-ngaya. Biya ni-yama ngaluwa-wa, “Nara a-ngwaduma.”
Kembirra n-akwudangwu-kajungwa Jesus nakinu-wa naniki-jungwa n-anungkwarba arakba. Biya n-akimarna nakina ayarrka ani-langwa bada-manja. Abirraja warnungkwarba wurriybina nanu-wilyakama niybina naniki-jungwa nani-mamalya nuw-alkayinga nuw-errminja wurrakina arakba. Kembirra ni-yangbina nakina Jesus ayakwa niybinu-wa ni-jungwu-mirruwa. “Nungkwuwa! Mirajanga!” ni-yama.
Anaja ni-rrak-arjiyinga arakba nakina n-anungkwarba ni-jungwu-mirrada. Biya ni-yangbina nakina ayakwa da. Kembirra Jesus nanga-kwa dirnt-anikba-wa arakba da.
Abirraja wurri-mirntak-akina warni-mamalya na-wurrak-akbard-eka angwurra wurrakina. Biya nani-yang-marngkwa-juwa God-uwa. Akwa na-maki-jayina ayakwa. “Naka n-anungkwarba ni-yangbina-mirra ayakwa God-langwa,” na-yama. “N-arum-eka Ni-Birabida nakina. Anaja God nakina ni-likanuma yangkwurrangwa kajungwa akan-anibi-kina yada ngakwurruwa ani-langwa ngarni-mamalya,” na-mirntaki-yama wurrakina.
Biya ebina-manja aringbirra angalya Judiya na-mirntaki-maki-jayinuma warni-mamalya ebina-langwa Jesus ni-yama-mulangwa nakina. Akwa ngarningka ababirna-manja angalya Judiya-manja akwudangwa, abirr-ajukwaba warni-mamalya na-mirntaki-maki-jayinuma akina-langwa da.
Kembirra arakba warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa Janjana-langwa abirr-ajukwaba nuw-engkirrkanuma amirntak-iybina ababirna-langwa na-yama-mulangwa. Akwa nani-makama Janjana-manja. Anaja kembirra nan-arti-juwama nakina Janjana anuwa-wa wun-ambilyuma-kiya ani-langwa wun-anik-abirraki-yuwa-kiya.
Ni-yama abirnuwa-wa, “Nungkwurnuwa, jay! Wuni-likaja angerrba Nu-Bungkawa Jesus-uwa,” ni-yama, “yiki-mini-yangbini yada enena ayakwa anuwa-wa. Yikini-yama, ‘Ningki-miyambana ningk-ani-mamalya ningkakina?’ yikini-yamina. ‘Yirrani-makama Janjana nu-wilyaba-langwa n-aruma nani-mamalya naniki-lika-langwa yangkwurrangwa. Dukwa nungkwuwa ningkena da. Imba dukwa yik-embirrarinama yarna n-iyngka nani-mamalya yalakwa kini-yardana-mirruwa da. Imba nungkwaja, ningki-miyambana ningk-ani-mamalya ningkena?’ yikini-yamina Jesus-uwa kin-alakina,” ni-yama Janjana wun-alakina-kiya-wa.
Abirnaja nani-likana arakba da. Nan-ali-likanu...wa. Nan-akbirranga arakba Jesus. Biya nani-yama, “Yin-ani-mamalya-kiya Janjana Naniki-mingeki-ngambaja-langwa yin-alakena. Yirrani-makama nakina nu-wilyaba-langwa n-aruma nani-mamalya niybina naniki-lika-langwa enenu-wa angalya. Ningkakin-eka dukwa kembirra yirrani-maka-mulangwa ayakwa Janjana da. Nara-manja nungkwuwa, kembirra yik-embirrarinama yarna ningku-wa nani-mamalya dukwa da. Ni-ngayindanama Janjana kin-aningmi-dinama nungkwuwa-langwa. Yirri-makina kembirra. Ningki-miyambana ningk-ani-mamalya ningkakina?” nani-yama Jesus-uwa wun-alakina-kiya.
Akini yada ngawa anaja Jesus nan-aningaba-kama wurr-ababirna warni-mamalya wurr-angb-angbilyuwa-mirra. Aruma ajungwa narraku-wartanguma wurru-kwala, imba abirraja wurrakina wurru-kwala narra-wilyakama wurru-wurrariya wurr-amukwa abirruwa-manja, imba abirraja wurru-kwala wurri-mimbi-mimba wurrakina. Kembirra nakin-eka Jesus nan-aningaba-kama wurrakina aning-errbirra-langwa angbilyuwa akwa na-mirntak-aningaba-dinuma arakba wurrakina da.
Kembirra ni-yama Jesus wun-alekbina-kiya-wa wun-anik-abirraki-yuwa Janjana-langwa, “Jay! Wuni-lawurradina Janjanu-wa,” ni-yama. “Yikini-makina ababirna-langwa kini-rringka-mulangwa kin-alakina nungkwurna-langwa-mirra manba aduwaba. Akwa yikini-makina ababirna-langwa ayakwa kin-engkirrkani-mulangwa kin-alakina memema-manja mamawura. Wurriybina wurri-mimbi-mimba-mirrada warni-mamalya adiniba-wiya nuw-andiyama arakba. Wurriybina wurri-rrengmi-rrengmirnirna-mirrada warni-mamalya na-likajama y-iningaba arakba yaya. Abirr-ajukwaba wurr-amarmarra-mirrada warni-mamalya a-mungkwurda arakba abirra-langwa amakwilya. Abirr-ajukwaba wurr-amb-ambima-mirrada warni-mamalya nuw-engkirrkajama arakba ayakwa. Abirr-ajukwaba warni-mamalya na-jungwuni-mirrada warniba arakba. Akwa enena engka. Abirraja warning-alyingm-alyingma warni-mamalya nuw-engkirrkajama arakba ayakwa aningaba God-langwa-langwa.
Amandangwa anaja God n-aningab-eka nakina warning-errbirra-manja warni-mamalya wurriybina nara a-mini-kalyikuma nganyangwa-langwa,” ni-yama Jesus wun-alekbina-kiya-wa wun-anik-abirraki-yuwa Janjana-langwa.
Abirnaja nani-lalika arakba Jesus wun-alakina-kiya akwa nani-lawurradina Janjanu-wa. Anaja kembirra Jesus ni-yangbina akwala ayakwa Janjana-langwa-langwa wurri-mirntak-iybina-manja wurru-wurra-kwilyimida warni-mamalya. Ni-yama nakina, “Kirri-likani-manja nungkwurruwa engku-wa alarrk-iyngbiringka-wa angalya nara-mirruwa alikira, ni-miyambanu-w-eka n-anungkwarba kirr-abirangkama kirrakina? Kirri-likanuma dukwa kirr-andayuma n-anungkwarba ni-lyangk-adawa, niybina nima-warrkwa-jinama mangma errbirra? Dukwa n-anungkwarba kirr-abirangkama amarta wubirra, ebina na-warr-jinama arrirra angerrba yiya angerrba?
Dukwa kirr-abirangkama kirrakina n-anungkwarba niybina n-awiyu-wiyabanama du-kwu-kwilyubana dimballa akwa n-aly-alyibarinama aningaba anhinga akwa ni-murrkwu-murrkwulama ma-mirrkbalya-manja mamukwu-mungkwulinga? N-amukwiyad-akin-eka n-anungkwarba kirr-andayuma dukwa da. Nar-eka. N-amukwiyad-akina n-anungkwarba nara errbirra ambilyuma alarrk-iyngburingka-manja angalya imba alikira-manj-eka n-ambilyama, wubirra wurri-bu-bungkawa-langwa-manja alikira nakin-eka da,” ni-yama Jesus wurri-mirntak-iybina-manja warni-mamalya.
“Yirri-maka,” ni-yama ngarningka Jesus wurrakina-manja. “Kirr-abirangkama Ni-Birabida nani-mamalya kirrakina da, niybina nani-maki-makinama God-langwa ayakwa warni-mamalyu-wa na! Yaw-eka, nakina-bina da! Kirri-likanuma kirr-abirangkama Ni-Birabida nani-mamalya akwa kin-akbirrangama arakba nakina. Imba nakin-eka Ni-Birabida naniku-yarrku-wilyaka ayakwa God-langwa ngarningka nakina.
Ka-makinama nganja ningena, kembirra w-engkirrkiya-langwa angwurra amirntak-enenu-wa ayakwa nuw-arrkarri-jungwuni-mirruwa God-langwa-manja jurra. Ngarraki-makinama ayakwa Janjana-langwa-langwa. Ni-yamama God arakbirakba-kiya-wiya, ‘Ngayuw-eka ningena kini-larrkajama nganyangwa naniku-yarrku-wilyaka ayakwa nani-mamalya, kajungwa kani-mini-ngekbirakini yada mamirukwa nungkwa-langwa ningk-aniki-liki yada nungkwuwa. Kini-lyangmanama nakina imba k-ariji-dinama ningkakina arija-langwa,’ ni-yamama God. Kembirra arakba nakina-bina Janjana da, ni-lyangmanguma nakina da,” ni-yama Jesus wurri-mirntak-iybinu-wa warni-mamalya.
“Amandangwa,” ni-yama ngarningka Jesus. “N-aruma ngawa nani-mamalya nakina Janjana da. Arakbirakba-kiya-wiya-langwa yanda-langwa aduwaba nara wurriybina wurru-kwala warni-mamalya wurr-aruma wubirra anuwa. Imba nungkwurraja kirri-yukwijiya-dangwa karni-mamalya, kirr-ang-ingmi-dina-manja God nu-bungkawa-dina-mulangwa nakina, kembirra kirr-arum-eka Janjana-manja angwurra kirrakina. Karningmi-dina-manja God nu-bungkawa-dina-mulangwa nakina, kembirra anaja God kini-yaminama nakina nungkwurra-langwa-langwa, ‘Naka n-anungkwarba n-aruma, amandangwa n-aruma Janjana-manja angwurra,’ kini-yaminama God da,” ni-yama Jesus wurri-mirntak-iybinu-wa wurru-wurra-kwilyimida warni-mamalya da.
Abirraja wurri-mirntak-akina warni-mamalya wurr-ababirna-langwa na-mirntak-engkirrkanuma akina ayakwa Jesus-langwa. Akwa ngawa abirraja wurru-kwala warnungkwarba narra-mini-wardangi-mirri-mirra warka warningi-Rawuma-langwa akwa narra-mini-mirntukwa-mirri-mirra angwarnta warni-mamalya-langwa abirr-ajukwaba nuw-engkirrkanuma akina Jesus-langwa ayakwa wurrakina akwa nani-yang-marngkwa-juwama God-uwa. Wurri-mirntak-akin-eka wurr-ababirna warni-mamalya nuw-engkirrkanuma ebina-wiya adinu...ba-wiya ebina ayakwa Janjana-langwa. Kembirra nani-minu-yarrku-warakama wurrakina God-langwa ayakwa akwa kembirra anaja Janjana nani-mingeki-ngambajuwama wurrakina. Kembirra aduwaba nuw-engkirrkanuma Jesus-langwa ayakwa wurrakina da.
Imba abirraja Wurri-Barija warni-mamalya akwa ngawa warnik-akakirumaka ayakwa aning-arum-uruma Mawijija-langwa nara wurrakina kani-mini-yarrku-waraka God-langwa ayakwa. Kembirra nara Janjana kani-mingeki-ngamba-juwa wurrakina, mana na-mirntaku-warangi-mubaba da.
Anaja kembirra ni-yama Jesus wurri-mirntak-iybinu-wa wurru-wurra-kwilyimida warni-mamalya, “Karni-mamalya kirriybina kirr-ambilyama enena-manja angalya aduwaba, kirri-miyamban-eka karna?
Wurri-yukwayuw-eka wubirra kirrakina da, wurriybina nuw-angmakayanama wurrakina na-mirntaki-likaja-mirri-manja wurr-ababirna warni-mamalya, na-mirntaku-warrkwayina-mirri-manja wurrakina angerrba yiya angerrba. Imba wurru-kwala wurri-yukwayuwa nuw-artanama wurru-kwalu-wa. Na-yaminama, ‘Yarna ngarra-mini-mebinuma aning-iningaba emeba kajungwa ka-yakirrerri-kini yada nungkwurruwa. Akana nara nungkwurraja yiki-lukwayina kirrakina da. Biya kembirra yirri-mebinuma emeba aning-amukwa akwa yirru-ngwadinuma yarna awurrmalya. Akana nara yiku-ngwadayina nungkwurr-amba-langwa kirrakina da,’ na-yaminama wurru-kwala wurri-yukwayuwa wurru-kwalu-wa wurrakina da. Kembirra wurri-yukwayuwa wubirra yiki-yaminama nungkwurraja karna karni-mamalya karning-aduwaba da, mana kirru-waranguma adiniba-wiya Janjana, akwa kirru-waranama ngarningka ngayuwa nganjukwaba aduwaba kirrakina da.”
“Amandangwa,” ni-yama Jesus, “ebina-wiya ni-likani-manja Janjana Nenikumingekingambaja yangkwurrangwa, kini-rringkama nakina mamawura yiya marrnga. Ad-adiniba nara nakina kin-alyibarina anhinga, imba miri-miraya n-amb-ambilyuma nani-yang-marngkwa-juwama God-uwa nakina. Akwa nara amalyirra kini-ybekina nakina akwurana-langwa. Nungkwurraja kini-rringkama nakina, akwa kirri-yamama, ‘Karti! Wurr-amukwa-dangwa naka-manja n-anungkwarba nuw-ambilyama,’ kirri-yamama da.
Kembirra nganja, ningiybina-mirrada ningi-rukwularrinuma enena-manja angalya, ningi-yarduma arakba arija-langwa ngayuwa. Nungkwurraja yirri-rringkinama ngayuwa ning-alyibarinama anhinga yiya ningi-bekinama akwurana-langwa amalyirra. Kembirra kirri-yaminama, ‘Karti! Nak-eka n-anungkwarba nimu-ngwurdangm-eka. N-aly-alyibarinama naka akwa ngawa ni-ybi-ybekinama akwurana-langwa amalyirra naka da. Akwa ngarningka na-mirntaki-yakayinama anuwa akwa warnungkwarba wurriybina narru-wurra-mirntukwunama angwarnta wurru-kwala-langwa akwa ngawa warni-mamalya wurru-wurrariya abirr-ajukwaba da,’ kirri-yaminama da. Amukwiyad-akina ayakwa kirri-yangbi-yangbinama nganyangwa-langwa da. Adiniba-wiya kirru-waranguma Janjana, imba aduwaba kirru-waranama ngayuwa nganjukwaba da.
Abirraja warni-mamalya wurriybina nani-mini-yarrku-warakinama ayakwa God-langwa narra-wilyakajinama wurru-kwala-manja warni-mamalya ayakwa ni-yangbini-mulangwa God a-lyangmi-lyangmandukwuna-wiya amirntak-akina da,” ni-yama Jesus wurri-mirntak-iybinu-wa warni-mamalya da.
Bi...ya anaja nu-wilyaba Ni-Barija nani-mamalya nan-arti-juwama Jesus ena-langwu-wa alikira anhingi yada. Nakina Ni-Barija nani-miykirra Jayumuna. Ni-likana anaja Jesus ena-langwu-wa alikira, n-awiyabana, akwa n-ambarrnga biya n-alyibarina arakba anhinga anuwa-manja yakwijina.
Akina-manja ngawa angalya amin-ababirna alikira ying-ambilyuma ngalaja dakina du-wilyaba didarringka du-wurrariya. Dadi-nungkwurakba ngawa du-wurrariya ying-amb-ambilyuma dakina. Imba dadingma Jesus n-alyibarinuma anhinga Jayumuna-langwa-manja alikira. Kembirra yingi-manga bungabungwa a-kwilyibana ebina yingi-bayindanguma amin-aruma angwarnta ayukwijiya-ma butilla. Aningab-eka amalyirra akina akwa aningaba butilla angwarnta-ma akwily-adada-ma. Yingi-manga akina biya yingu-wilyaka Jayumuna-langwu-wa alikira. Yingi-yarda, biya ying-awiyabana ngal-ajukwaba.
Anaja Jesus n-angm-ingmakwu-laluma nakina imba n-arnta-ndadilyuma. Imba dakina didarringka ying-akwudangwu-kajungwuna anuwa-wa, ying-arjijaya akwabirrangarna ana-langwa-manja alika akwudangwa. Ying-arjijaya, biya yingu-ngwadina dakina didarringka, imba ngala-langwa angwada na-yngkalyi-kama alika Jesus-langwa na-kwularrini-mulangwa ngala-langwa-langwa manba. Biya kembirra arakba ying-abiluwandinga yingi-yngbiringka-kama alika Jesus-langwa ngala-langwa-mirra mamungba. Biya yingi-lawurangka arakba alika ana-langwa da. Akwa amalyirra ebina yingu-wilyakama aningaba yingi-jiraba budilla-langwa Jesus-langwa-manja alika arakba da. Aningab-eka na-kirrwanjuma. Dakin-eka didarringka yingi-yamama akina mana baba yingi-lyalyingminuma Jesus da, akwa yingini-ngayindanguma Jesus n-aningmi yada nakina yingi-lyalyingmini-mulangwa dakina da.
Anaja Ni-Barija n-imin-akina alikira nanga-rringkama ebina yingi-yamama dakina, biya ni-lyangki-yama, “Ni-miyamban-eka naka n-anungkwarba? Ni-Burabuda-manja n-anungkwarba amandangwa naka, kin-aningmi-dinuma kembirra daka-langwa didarringka da! Kin-aningmi-dinuma du-wurrariya di-lyangma daka didarringka diybina yingini-lyinginama da,” ni-lyangki-yama nakina Ni-Barija.
Anaja Jesus ni-yama anuwa-wa, “Jayumuna, yiba-makina-ma a-yukwujiya alawudawarra,” ni-yama. Ni-yama anaja Jayumuna, “Yi-makina kembirra, Bungkawa.” Anaja kembirra nakina Jesus nani-makama enena alawudawarra.
Nu-wilyaba n-anungkwarba ni-minababirna angwarnta nanu-kwama ani-langwa angwarnta wurru-kwalu-wa warni-mamalya wurriybina warning-alyingm-alyingma-wa. Nara errbirra kanu-kwa imba ambaka-mirra abirraja kani-mini-lawurraka-jinama arija-langwa wurrakina. Arngk-ababirna-langwa ni-yaminjamama nakina. Biya nanu-kwa nu-wilyaba n-anungkwarba aning-aduwaya angwarnta aruma, 500 a-jilba-mirrada. Imba nanu-kwa n-iyngka n-anungkwarba 50 da. Bi...ya nimi-jarrida arakba mamawura wun-aniki-lawurraka-ji yada wunalakina wun-anungkwarba-kiya ebina angwarnta.
Akana wun-aning-angwarnta-ma wun-alakina-kiya da. Nara kanu-wilyaka ebina angwarnta wun-aniki-lawurraka-ji yada da. Bi...ya anaja n-emb-imbirrarini-mulangwa nakina n-anungkwarba n-anungkwurakba, nani-maka arakba wun-alakina-kiya-wa, “Mama arakba akina. Nara a-lawurraka-juma ngayuwa-wa, mana kin-aning-angwarnta-ma baba kin-alakina. Ka-mini-yakwabijinama akina-langwa angwarnta,” ni-yama nakina. Ena ngawa. “Yi-makina kembirra ningkakina Jayumuna,” ni-yama Jesus anuwa-wa, “ni-miyamban-eka n-anungkwarba kinu-warrngki-lyalyingminama nakina-manja nani-mamalya imba ni-miyambana kini-lyalyingminama angwurra?” ni-yama Jesus Jayumunu-wa.
Anaja ni-yama Jayumuna, “Ngaya ningi-yaminama niybina n-anungkwarba kini-lawurraka-jini yada aruma angwarnta anuwa-wa kini-lyalyingminama angwurra nakina, mana aruma baba angwarnta nani-mini-yakwabi-juwama nakina da,” ni-yama Jayumuna da. “Nakina-bina da,” ni-yama Jesus.
Biya ni-nyaku-warrkwa-jungwa arakba nakina dibinu-wa didarringka, akwa ni-yama ngarningka Jayumunu-wa, “Nga-rringka daka didarringka,” ni-yama. “Ningena ngayuwa ning-awiyabani-manja enenu-wa alikira nungkwa-langwu-wa, nara yiku-kwa akungwa alika-langwa. Nara nungkwuwa yiki-min-ajirranga alika, imba ngalaja daka didarringka ngi-min-ajirranguma alika nganyangwa ngala-langwa-mirra angwada, akwa yingi-yngbiringka-kama ngala-langwa-mirra mamungba.
Ning-awiyabi-manja ngayuwa nungkwa-langwa-manja alikira, nara nungkwaja yiki-lawurangka ngayuwa. Imba ngalaja daka didarringka arngk-ababirna ngi-mini-lawurangkama alika nganyangwa, yingi-lyalyingmini-mubaba ngayuwa.
Nara nungkwaja yiki-mini-jiraba aliba-langwa amalyirra nganyangwa-manja aringka, kajungwa warningmi yada warni-mamalya ningki-yakirrerri-dini-mulangwa nungkwuwa ningi-yardi-mulangwa ngayuwa nungkwa-langwa-manja alikira. Imba ngalaja daka didarringka yingi-bayindangum-eka amalyirra amin-aruma angwarnta ebina na-yngbajama aningaba biya ngi-mini-jirabama alika-manja.
Dadingma daka du-wurrariya di-lyangma mana ababirn-eka a-wurru-wurrariya yingi-yama-mubaba arakba daka. Imba anaja God nanga-mini-yakwabi-juwama arakba amirntak-akina a-wurru-wurrariya yingi-yama-mulangwa daka da. Kembirra amin-akina-langwa ngal-amba-langwa yingi-lyalyingminama angwurra ngayuwa da. Imba kani-mini-yakwabijina-manja adinakba-kiya God nu-wilyaba nani-mamalya ambawira a-wurru-wurrariya, kembirra nakina-bina kinu-warrngki-lyalyingminama ngayuwa da,” ni-yama Jesus Jayumunu-wa da.
Biya kembirra ni-yama nakina Jesus dibinu-wa didarringka, “Aning-errbirr-eka a-wurru-wurrariya ningki-yama-mulangwa ningkakina ningki-mini-lyurrkwa-jungwunuma arakba ababirna-langwa,” ni-yama Jesus.
Abirraja warni-mamalya wurriybina na-yabikayini-mirri-mirra anhinga Jayumuna-langwa-manja alikira na-lyangki-maka-jungwunuma wurrakina, “Ni-miyamban-eka naka n-anungkwarba nani-mini-lyurrkwunama a-wurru-wurrariya warni-mamalya-langwa? Anaja God yimbukwa nu-wilyaba-ma kini-yangbinama amukwiyad-akina ayakwa ngarni-mamalyu-wa, imba nara naka,” na-lyangki-maka-jungwunuma wurri-mirntak-akina warni-mamalya da.
Anaja Jesus ni-yama kembirra dibinu-wa didarringka, “Ningku-werrik-ambilyi-mulangwa ngayuwa-manja ningkakina, kembirra yirr-anibi-kama ngayuwa ningkakina arakba. Imba jay, likaja arakba y-iningaba-mirra yukwudukwuda,” ni-yama Jesus ngaluwa-wa da. Ngalaja kembirra yingi-likana arakba y-iningaba-mirra yilyurrkwa-mirra yukwudukwuda dakina da.
Bi...ya anaja Jesus ni-likanuma arakba nakina angerrba yiya angerrba engku-wa yiya engku-wa angalya. Ni-likanuma kembirra akwalu-wa angalya amin-ababirnu-wa alikira yiya warni-mamalya akwa akwalu-wa ngarningka angalya amin-ambawuru-wa alikira nakina. Biya amirntak-akina-manja angalya ababirna-langwa nani-makama warning-akwijina warni-mamalya aning-iningaba ayakwa kini-bungkawa-dina-mulangwa God ana-langwa-manja warni-mamalya. Abirr-ajukwaba wurri-mirntak-iybina wurri-memberrkwa wurr-ambilyuma warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa ani-langwa na-wurraki-likanuma anuwa-manja wurrakina da.
Ebina-wiya ngawa nakin-eka Jesus nani-jadi-juwama wurru-wurrariya wurr-amukwa wurru-kwala-langwa wurri-darringka. Imba nan-aningaba-kama wurru-kwala angbilyuwa-langwa nakina. Arngkawura nani-jadi-juwama Jesus wurri-mangbala wurr-ambilyuma wurr-amukwa wurru-wurrariya du-wilyaba-langwa didarringka dadi-miykirra Meri. Abirraja narringa-yangbi-juwama dakina Meri D-adingi-Makidala, mana ngala-langwa angalya Makidala akina baba. Kembirra wurri-mirntak-akin-eka wurri-darringka na-mirntaki-likanuma abirr-ajukwaba Jesus-manja wurrakina.
Ngal-ajukwaba du-wilyaba d-iyngka didarringka yingi-likanuma dadi-miykirra Jawena. Imba anaja ngala-langwa naningiy-adikba nani-miykirra Juja. N-aruma nakina n-anungkwarba niybina nani-minu-wardu-wardanguma warka Nu-Bungkawa-langwa Yerida. Akwa ngawa ngal-ajukwaba yingi-likanuma du-wilyaba d-iyngka didarringka dadi-miykirra Jujena. Wurri-mirntak-akin-eka wurr-ababirna wurri-darringka na-wurraki-likanuma Jesus-manja akwa ana-langwa-manja warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa. Narru-wilyakam-eka anhinga yiya angwarnta abirra-langwa, kajungwa warnik-akwurraji yada wurri-mirntak-akina-manja warnungkwarba, akwa warniku-kwi yada anhinga da.
Abirraja wurr-ababirn-eka warni-mamalya na-wurraki-likanum-eka wurrakina akini yada ngawa Jesus-uwa engka-langwa yiya engka-langwa angalya. Biya kembirra wurru-wurra-kwilyimida warni-mamalya na-wurra-mirntukwunuma arakba Jesus-manja. Anaja nani-makama nakina Jesus enena alawudawarra abirruwa-wa.
Nu-wilyaba n-anungkwarba n-imin-akina angalya ni-lyangku-werri-bika-jungwunuma nakina naniki-lungkwabi-ji yada akina amadidira a-manhinga a-yukwayuwa. Nakina n-anungkwarba n-akimarnuma amadidira a-manhinga emb-imbirrk-aluwa ana-langwa-manja beka, biya ni-likana arakba. Biya ni-likani-manja lukwakwa nakina ana-langwa-manja angalya n-errikbayinuma arakba amirntak-akina amadidira ajiringka-wa. Errbirra ni-mirntak-arrijakama angerrba yiya angerrba, ka-lingku-warrni yada akina anhinga. N-errikbayini-manja lukwakwa amirntak-akina amadidira, ngalaja akwala na-yngki-larrayinuma mamirukwa-manja. Kembirra arngki-darrba-langwiya abirraja warni-mamalya na-likani-manja wurrakina narr-embirrki-ngalyi-lyakama ebina amadidira a-manhinga. Kembirra abirraja wurrajija nuw-angkirrayinuma akwa narr-embirrki-manguma, akwa nuw-alyibarinuma amirntak-iybina emb-imbirrk-amamuwa a-manhinga.
Imba ngalaja amadidira akwala na-yngki-larrayinuma akina a-murnturrk-angwarnta-manja ajiringka. Kembirra na-lingbijangayini-manja amirntak-akina na-lungkw-arta-dinuma akina engbiringka baba ajiringka.
Imba ngalaja akwala na-yngki-larrayinuma akwurrirra-langwa-manja angalya a-wurru-wurraku-wilyarra. Ngalaja kembirra amirntak-akina akwurrirra akwa ngawa ebina a-manhinga amarta na-lingbijanginuma abirringuwa a-lirraki-dirrbira. Kembirra akwurrirra akwa ngawa akina a-manhinga amarta na-lingku-warrayinuma a-di-dirrbira. Akana angwurra akwurrirra na-lingku-warrinuma waranja, akwa kembirra na-mini-mardanguma angalya. Ngalaja kembirra ebina a-manhinga amarta nara ka-lingku-warrna angwurra, akwa nara kuw-arrangba anhinga.
Imba ngalaja akwala amadidira na-yngki-larrayinuma aningabu-wa ajiringka. Kembirra na-lingbijanginuma akwa na-lingku-warrayinuma. Biya kembirra nuw-arrangbama arakba anhinga ababirna akin-eka da. Ena-bu ngawa alawudawarra da. En-eka alawudawarra nakina Jesus nani-makama wurri-mirntak-iybina-manja warni-mamalya. Biya kembirra nani-makama arakba nakina enena engbida aning-arija-langwa ayakwa abirruwa-wa. “Yiki-yaku-werri-bikinama ambaka-langwa akinu-wa alawudawarra ngarra-maka-mirruwa,” ni-yama Jesus. “Imba yik-awiyaba-jina-manja akina nungkwurra-langwu-wa mada, nara kembirra a-jadi-juma mingarrku-warru-wa mada akwa a-lyikbi-juma akina ayakwa imba yiki-yaku-werri-bikaja ngawa ambaka-langwa amirntak-akinu-wa,” ni-yama Jesus nani-makama wurri-mirntak-iybina-manja warni-mamalya da.
Abirraja Jesus-langwa warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa na-mirntaki-yama wurrakina anuwa-wa, “Na-yamarrkinam-eka enena alawudawarra?” na-yama.
Kembirra ni-yama Jesus abirruwa-wa, “Akin-eka ayakwa God-langwa kini-bungkawa-dina-mulangwa nakina nuw-abuwarrka-jungwunuma adiniba-wiya akina. Imba kirrani-mukangbi-juwama anaja God arakba nungkwurruwa-manja. Imba abirraja wurru-kwala warni-mamalya kuw-engkirrkajama ayakwa alawudawarra-mirra. Mama wurrakina kuw-andiyama akana nara wurrakina a-rringkama da, akwa mama kuw-engkirrkajama akana nara akbirranguma wurrakina da,” ni-yama Jesus ena-langwu-wa warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa da.
Biya nani-dirrbira-kama arakba Jesus ena-langwu-wa warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa ebina-langwa alawudawarra. Ni-yama, “Amirntak-iybina a-yukwayuwa a-manhinga amadidira God-langwa wubirra ayakwa ka-yaminama akina.
Imba abirraja wurru-kwala warni-mamalya kuw-engkirrkajama ayakwa God-langwa, akana anaja nakina Namukwa kini-likajama akwa kani-mirrakajinama amirntak-iybina God-langwa ayakwa abirra-langwa-langwa mangma. Kembirra ka-yaminama wurrakina warni-mamalya wubirra amirntak-iybina amadidira a-manhinga na-yngki-larrayinuma mamirukwa-manja. Imba anaja Namukwa kini-yaminama nakina wurrajija wubirra wurriybina narri-manama amirntak-iybina amadidira.
