Kani-mirrakajinama Namukwa ayakwa God-langwa wurri-mirntak-iybina-langwa warni-mamalya kajungwa nari yada aningmi-duma wurrakina ebina ayakwa aningaba akwa nari yada a-werrik-ambilyuma God-manja, akwa nari yada God anibikama wurrakina da.
Abirraja wurru-kwala warni-mamalya kuw-engkirrkajama abirr-ajukwaba God-langwa ayakwa akwa ka-yakirrerri-dinama, karr-manama akina ayakwa abirra-langwu-wa mangma. Akana nara ngalaja ambilyuma akina ayakwa amiyarra abirruwa-manja. Ka-werrik-ambilyama wurrakina aduwaya-wiya God-uwa. Akana Namukwa kani-labaja-manja wurrakina-manja warni-mamalya kembirra nara arakba a-werrik-ambilyuma wurrakina God-manja. Wurrakin-eka kembirra warni-mamalya ka-yaminama wubirra amirntak-iybina amadidira na-yngki-larrayinuma a-murnturrk-angwarnta-manja ajiringka.
Abirraja wurru-kwala warni-mamalya kuw-engkirrkajama ayakwa God-langwa abirr-ajukwaba wurrakina, akana ka-werrik-awarrya-dinam-eka awinyamba-langwa wurrakina akwa kuw-engk-iyngkirrka-jama angwarntu-wa yiya amirntakijiku-wa akwa abadakalyu-wa. Ngalaja amukwiyad-akina ka-likajama angwurra abirra-langwu-wa mangma, akwa ka-jadijinama ayakwa God-langwa abirra-langwa-langwa mada. Wurrakin-eka warni-mamalya ka-yaminama kembirra wubirra amirntak-iybina amadidira na-yngki-larrayinuma akwurrirra-manja akwa na-lingbijangayinuma, biya na-lingku-warrayinuma akwa nuw-arrangbama anhinga, akana nara ka-walyuwa-dina akina.
Abirraja wurru-kwala warni-mamalya kuw-engkirrkajama ayakwa God-langwa akwa karr-manama karr-lyinginama akina warning-amiyarra. Kani-mini-yarrki-yarrku-warakinama wurrakina God-langwa ayakwa wurri-yirrbiyirrba ngawa akwa ka-yaminjaminama aningaba wurrakina warning-angkawura. Ka-yaminama kembirra wurrakina warni-mamalya wubirra amirntak-iybina amadidira na-yngki-larrayinuma aningaba-manja ajiringka akwa na-lingku-warrayinuma yanda-langwa nuw-arrangbama aningaba anhinga akina da,” ni-yama Jesus ena-langwu-wa warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa da.
Biya kembirra Jesus ni-yangbina ngarningka ayakwa ana-langwa-manja warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa akwa wurru-kwala-manja warni-mamalya abirr-ajukwaba. Nani-makama alawudawarra bajananga-langwa. Ni-yama nakina, “Yakuwa yak-abarraka-jina-manja bajananga alikira-manja arrawa, yak-akimirnama akina karrawara, kajungwa karri-rringkini yada warni-mamalya aningaba alarr-adada amungkwurrk-buda. Yak-abarraka-jina-manja akina bajananga yalakena nar-eka abuwarrkama akina. Nara akimama yalakena bajikala karrawara akina-manja bajananga akwa ngarningka nara awiyabajuma akina mamukwu-mungkwulinga-manja arrawa. Imba karrawara yak-akimirnama, kajungwa ka-larrk-abarraka-jini yada angalya akina bajananga. Kembirra abirraja wurru-kwala warni-mamalya kuw-awiyabana-manja arrawu-wa alikira-wa karr-rringkinama akina alarr-adada wurrakina da,” ni-yama Jesus wurri-mirntak-iybina-manja warni-mamalya da.
Biya ni-yama ngarningka nakina Jesus, “Ebina nuw-abuwarrka-jungwunama adiniba-wiya aduwaba kuw-abilyarri-kajungwunama akina arija-langwa.
Kembirra nungkwurraja yik-engkirrkajam-eka ambaka-langwa kirrakina nganyangwu-wa ayakwa aduwaba. Nara a-mini-yarrku-wurruma imba yiki-mini-yarrku-warakinama angwurra ngawa. Karning-errbirr-eka karni-mamalya nara-manja a-mini-yarrku-wurruma nganyangwa ayakwa imba yik-engkirrkaja-manja akina angwurra kirrakina, kembirra yiki-yarrku-warakinama amirntak-iybina ayakwa nungkwurra-langwa-manja mangma ngawa. Kembirra nganja ngayuwa ka-mamirika-jinama nungkwurruwa-manja kajungwa yik-aningmi-dini yada angwurra kirrakina. Imba kirru-wilyaba karni-mamalya yiki-lyangki-yamina-manja kirrakina, ‘Ning-aningma amirntak-akina ayakwa,’ akana nara-manja engkirrkuma angwurra kirrakina, imba yiki-mini-yarrku-wurrana-manja ayakwa nganyangwa, nar-eka ngayuwa a-mamirika-juma kirrakina. Nungkwurraja kembirra yiki-yakwabijinam-eka kirrakina amirntak-iybina ayakwa nganyangwa. Amin-akina-langwa kembirra yik-engkirrkajam-eka ambaka-langwa nganyangwu-wa ayakwa aduwaba kirrakina da,” ni-yama Jesus wurri-mirntak-iybinu-wa warni-mamalya da.
Bi...ya abirraja Jesus-langwa dirnt-anikba akwa ngawa warnu-kwukwu-marnj-ana ani-langwa na-likanuma wurrakina ebinu-wa alikira Jesus n-ambilyi-mirruwa nakina, akana nara kuw-akwudangwu-kajungwuna wurrakina anuwa-wa mana wurr-ababirna baba warni-mamalya nuw-ambilyuma yakwijina arrawa.
Abirraja nani-makama kembirra wurru-kwala warni-mamalya Jesus-manja, “Daka arakba dirnt-ana akwa naniki-marnj-ana-mirrya,” na-yama wurrakina. “Errekba-manja ngawa nuw-alkayanama warna, imba bi-ngayindanama nungkwuwa,” na-yama da.
Anaja Jesus ni-yama wurri-mirntak-akinu-wa warni-mamalya wurr-ababirnu-wa, “Daka di-rntirrka akwa ngawa narrkuw-arrka-mirrya arakba na? Nganja ninginga-yangbi-jinama di-rntirrka dading-errbirra akwa narrkuw-arrka-mirrya wurriybina nara a-yarrku-wurruma God-langwa ayakwa imba nuw-engk-iyngkirrkajama akina,” ni-yama Jesus abirruwa-wa.
Bi...ya arngkawura Jesus ni-likana nakina awurukwu-wa na-kuwabalinu-mirruwa adirrngwarna anuwa akwa ani-langwa warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa. Biya na-wurraki-rijawudiyinuma mijiyanga-manja. Ni-yama Jesus, “Nga-likaja arakba, ngarr-abirrungku-warrkwuna enena akungwa,” ni-yama. Biya narring-arjiya-juwa dimballa wurrakina biya na-likana arakba da.
Ngalaja makina mijiyanga nim-angkidikarrinu...wa. Anaja kembirra Jesus ni-mungkwulinga. Ngalaja kembirra adirrariyaba aruma arrirra narrak-akbirranga, narraku-wartanga arakba wurrakina. Na-warma-jungwunuma arrbud-eka. Ngal-ajukwaba akungwa na-warma-jungwunuma, na-rrangkuwanginuma adirrngwarna, na-ngak-arjayuma akwa nuw-awiyabayinuma memedirra-wa mijiyanga. Nuw-awiyabayinuma akwa na-lyangburrkwa-juwam-eka makina-manja mijiyanga da. Kembirra arngki-darrba ka-ngwartinum-eka wurrakina da.
Kembirra abirraja warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa Jesus-langwa na-lika akwa nani-mirajanga-juwa Jesus-manja. “Bungkawa! Bungkawa!” na-yama. “Adiniba aki-lkuwarrnam-eka ngarna, imba mirajanga!” na-yama. Anaja Jesus ni-mirajanga, biya ni-yangba ayakwa engbida akinu-wa arrirra akwa akungwa-wa. “W-errminja!” ni-yama. Ngalaja kembirra nuw-ardarra ebina arrirra akwa na-lyurrkwu-da arakba akungwa ngal-ajukwaba da.
Biya Jesus ni-yama ena-langwu-wa warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa, “Miyambana-birra nungkwurruwa nara a-werrik-ambilyuma ngayuwa-wa?” ni-yama. Abirraja na-wurraki-yakikbijangayina angwurra wurrakina. Nuw-akbardang-eka. “Nimi-yambana-birra naka n-anungkwarba?” na-yama na-maki-jayinuma wurrakina. “Ni-yangbinama ayakwa arrirra-wa akwa akungwa-wa nakina, biya nanaki-min-engkirrkajama ngal-ajukwaba anuwa-wa da!” na-yama wurrakina warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa Jesus-langwa da.
Kembirra Jesus akwa ngawa ani-langwa warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa narr-abirringku-warrkwama arakba akungwa warniki-liki yada wurrakina abirringku-warru-wa engembu-wa Kiraju-wa. Akin-eka angalya aringbirra a-miykirra Kiraja nuw-ambilyuma abirringku-warra akungwa imba Keliliya abirringki-ladada ngalaja nuw-ambilyuma akina. Biya na-yarda arakba wurrakina Kiraja-manja.
Kembirra ni-rikbijangi-manja Jesus mijiyanga-langwa ariba-wa, anaja nu-wilyaba n-anungkwarba n-ibukwaya ni-likana nanu-kwurukwa anuwa-wa. Nakina n-anungkwarba n-imin-akina angalya Kiraja, imba nanu-wilyakama anuwa-manja wurr-ababirn-eka wurr-amukwa wurru-wurrariya. Warning-arakba-kiy-eka wurri-mirntak-akina wurr-amukwa na-mirntak-ambilyuma anuwa-manja. Arngk-ababirna-langwa nan-engk-engkarrngarnuma nakina-manja. Abirraja kembirra warni-mamalya ani-langwa nan-ararikama nakina ayarrka-manja akwa alika-manja didija-mirra. Akana ni-yngk-iyngkarrngarnuma alakina-kiya ditija. Abirraja wurr-amukwa wurru-wurrariya nani-yaki-yakarnuma arakba engku-wa nara-mirruwa alikira yiya warni-mamalya. Nara dimballa kin-awiyu-wiyabana imba n-ayabirra nakina n-ali-likanuma. Nara kin-ambilya arakba angalya-manja imba n-ambilyi-mirra nakina nara-mirri-manja alikira yiya warni-mamalya. Medirra-manja ngawa ni-mungkwu-mungkwuluma narr-akakimarni-mirri-manja warni-niki-jungwa warni-mamalya. Imba n-akwudangwu-kajungwuni-manja nakina n-anungkwarba Jesus-uwa, anaja Jesus ni-yangbina nakina ayakwa wurri-mirntak-iybinu-wa wurr-amukwa. “Wurri-jadiya!” ni-yama. Akana anaja n-anungkwarba ni-likilalinga akwa n-abiluwandingama alyangmi-lyangma-langwa Jesus-manja. Biya angwurra n-artanga nakina. “Jesus, Ningk-anukw-anikba God-langwa, ki-yamarrkinama nungkwuwa ngayuwa-manja? Nara a-larrkbarjuma ngayuwa imba yi-lalika!” ni-yama.
<range>
<range>
Anaja Jesus ni-yama, “Ningki-miyambana ningk-ani-miykirra?” “Ningen-eka ning-ani-miykirra ngayuwa ‘Ning-ababirna,’” ni-yama anaja, mana wurr-ababirna baba wurr-amukwa wurru-wurrariya na-wurrak-awiyabanuma arrawa anuwa-manja.
Abirraja wurru-wurrariya wurr-amukwa na-yama Jesus-uwa, “Marrakba, nara a-larrkuma yirruwa engku-wa, nara a-dituma yarna awurrariya-manja angalya!” na-yama wurrakina.
Imba akina-manja ngawa angalya akwudangwa ngalaja nuw-ambilyuma ababirn-eka bikibiki. Na-yabi-yabikayinuma anhinga angakarjiyinga-manja angalya karrawara amirntak-akina. Kembirra wurri-mirntak-iybina wurr-amukwa na-yama Jesus-uwa, “Marrakba, yirri-larrkiya a-mirntak-angabu-wa bikibiki,” na-yama wurrakina wurr-amukwa Jesus-uwa. Anaja kembirra Jesus ni-lyangku-wama nakina da.
Abirraja kembirra wurri-mirntak-akina wurr-amukwa na-wurraki-jadinga nakina-langwa n-anungkwarba akwa na-wurraki-likana a-mirntak-ibinu-wa bikibiki. Nuw-awiyaba-ja arakba arrawa bikibiki-manja da. Ngalaja bikibiki nuw-angkirrayina angwurra arakba. Na-wurraki-dirrirnta angadingidirra-wa angalya akwa arakba na-mirntaku-ngwurdirruwa-jungwa akungwa-manja akwa na-jungwayina da.
Abirraja warnungkwarba wurriybina narr-emb-imbirrajuwa-mirri-mirra bikibiki narri-rringka-mirra nuw-angkirrayinuma akungwa-wa akwa na-ngwurdirruwa-jungwunuma akina akungwa-manja akwa na-jungwayinuma. Kembirra nuw-angkirrayina wurrakina akwa narra-maka wurru-kwala-manja warni-mamalya wurriybina nuw-ambilyi-mirri-manja angalya-manja amin-ababirna-mirri-manja alikira akwa ngawa nuw-ambilyi-mirri-manja wurr-ayabijaba amb-imbawura-manja alikira.
Abirraja kembirra wurr-ababirn-eka warni-mamalya na-mirntaki-likanuma ebinu-wa angalya bikibiki na-jungwayini-mirruwa. Biya na-mirntaki-yarda arakba Jesus-manja akwa nan-akbirranga niybina yakwijina n-anungkwarba nan-angm-ingmakayanguma Jesus abirnu-wa. Nakin-eka niybina-mirrada n-anungkwarba n-aningaba-duma akana n-awiyabanuma arakba dimballa nakina akwa n-engkirrkanuma Jesus-langwa ayakwa, mana baba m-aningaba arakba mangma ani-langwa. Abirraja warni-mamalya na-mirntak-akbardanguma.
Imba abirraja wurriybina narr-emb-imbirrajuwama bikibiki, akwa narri-rringka-mirra amirntak-iybina bikibiki na-jungwayinuma akina, narra-maka wurri-mirntak-akina-manja warni-mamalya n-aningaba-di-mulangwa niybina n-anungkwarba. Narra-makama ayakwa Jesus nan-aningaba-ka-mulangwa nakina da.
Kembirra wurr-ababirn-eka wurri-min-akina angalya Warningi-Kiraja warni-mamalya na-yama Jesus-uwa, “Wu-lalika enena angalya yirra-langwa akwa likaja engku-wa,” na-yama, mana baba nuw-akbardanguma angwurra wurri-mirntak-akina warni-mamalya wurr-ababirna-langwa. Kembirra anaja Jesus ni-rijawudiya mijiyanga-manja naniki-liki yada nakina.
Akana anaja nakina n-anungkwarba niybina n-aningaba-duma arakba ni-likana Jesus-uwa akwa nan-ambidirr-ka. “Marrakba,” ni-yama, “yakuwa?” Jesus anaja nani-larrkama angalyu-wa akwa ni-yama anuwa-wa,
“Jay! Likaja nungkwa-langwu-wa angalya akwa wurra-makina wurru-kwala-manja warni-mamalya God ngin-aningaba-ka-mulangwa,” ni-yama Jesus. Anaja nakina n-anungkwarba ni-likana arakba nani-mirntaki-maka Warningi-Kiraja-manja warni-mamalya Jesus nan-aningaba-ka-mulangwa nakina. Ni-likanuma ngawa m-ababirna-manja mamirukwa a-wilyu-wilyaba-wiya-wa alikira akwa yanda-langwa wurr-ababirna-langwa Warningi-Kiraja warni-mamalya warningma arakba ayakwa ani-langwa. Imba anaja Jesus akwa ani-langwa warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa narri-lalika akina angalya akwa na-likana arakba da.
Biya Jesus akwa ani-langwa warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa narr-abirringku-warrkwama ngarningka akungwa akwa na-lawurradinuma Kiraja-langwa angerrba Keliliyu-wa. Abirraja warni-mamalya wurri-min-akina angalya Keliliya nuw-emb-imbirrarinuma ngawa Jesus-uwa warnungkwurakba. Ni-yardi-manja kembirra nakina Jesus, na-lyalyingmayinuma wurrakina nani-rringka-mulangwa.
Anaja n-ibukwaya ni-likana nu-wilyaba n-anungkwarba nani-miykirra Jaraja. Nu-bungkawa nakina jinikakwa-langwa. Biya n-abiluwandinga Jesus-langwa-manja alika akwa nani-marrakba-kama Jesus-uwa akwa ni-yama, “Marrakba, kwa, likaja nganyangwu-wa alikira,” ni-yama,
“mana nganyangwa dadiyaw-arrka ying-angbilyuwa-dini-mubaba ajungwa akwa d-ambawura-mirra baba dakina. M-ememberrkwa m-ambilyuma mamarika yiya yinungkwura ying-ambilyuma dakina akana dadiki-jungwangan-eka arakba,” ni-yama. Anaja kembirra Jesus ni-likana nakina abirnu-wa Jaraja ena-langwu-wa alikira. Abirraja wurr-ababirn-eka warni-mamalya na-mirntaki-likanuma Jesus-manja abirr-ajukwaba akinu-wa alikira. Akwudangwa Jesus-manja na-mirntaki-likanuma wurrakina, na-mirntaki-lyibilyi-danguma wurri-mirntak-akina, nanu-kwurtakama Jesus-manja lukwakwa.
Ngalaja du-wilyaba didarringka yingi-likanuma abirruwa-manja. Angbilyuwa dakina dadi-nungkwurakba. M-ememberrkwa m-ambilyuma mamarika yiya yinungkwura yingi-jungwunuma angbilyuwa dakina, mana baba merra ngala-langwa nimu-kwularrinuma mi-yirrbiyirrba ngawa. Abirraja wurr-ababirna warni-mamalya narringa-mamirika-juwama dakina akina-langwa angbilyuwa akana nara ngalaja king-adingaba-dina dakina.
Biya wurri-mirntak-iybina-manja warni-mamalya yingi-likanuma dakina mamirukwa-langwiya, biya ying-akwudangwu-kajungwa Jesus-uwa akwabirrangarna-langwa, akwa yingini-min-anjalki-lyingama diybina dimballa Jesus-langwa dadi-makirnta-manja ying-anjal-jalangi-mirri-manja. Akwa kembirra arngkawura-wiya ngalaja merra ngala-langwa nimu-ngwanja, nara arakba kimu-kwularrina.
Anaja Jesus ni-yama wurri-mirntak-iybinu-wa warni-mamalya, “Angkabirra bi-lyingama?” ni-yama. Abirraja wurr-ababirna-langwa warni-mamalya nuw-edirremayina. Anaja Bida ni-yama, “Bungkawa, wurr-ababirn-eka warna warni-mamalya nungkwuwa-manja akwudangwa bi-minjirr-arjinama,” ni-yama.
Imba anaja Jesus ni-yama, “Wurru-wilyaba warni-mamalya bi-lyingama. Ning-aningma nganja mana baba akwala amawurrna nganyangwa na-likanuma ngayuwa-langwa wurrakinu-wa,” ni-yama.
Ngalaja diybina didarringka dadingma nara king-abuwarrka-jungwuna. Yingi-mirnta-birr-irridanga di-bukwaya yingi-likana alyangmi-lyangmu-wa, biya ying-abiluwendingama ying-engmidirrwa-jungwunuma dadi-mukwurra ajiringka-manja n-arjayu-murri-manja Jesus. Biya yingi-yangbina ayakwa Jesus-uwa, kajungwa warnik-engkirrki yada abirr-ajukwaba warni-mamalya ayakwa ngala-langwa. Kembirra yingini-maka dakina Jesus-manja yingini-lyinga-mulangwa nakina, mana baba angbilyuwa dakina, akwa ying-adingaba-di-mulangwa arakba dakina arngkawura-wiya yingini-lyinga-manja Jesus.
Anaja ni-yama nakina Jesus ngaluwa-wa, “Nganiyarrya nungkwuwa, nara a-werrik-awarryaduma. Ningku-werrik-ambilyuma ngayuwa-manja ningkakina, kembirra amin-akina-langwa ningk-adingaba-duma arakba. Jay! Likaja y-iningaba-mirra yukwudukwuda,” ni-yama.
Ni-yangbini-manja Jesus ayakwa ngaluwa-wa, anaja n-ibukwaya ni-likana nu-wilyaba n-anungkwarba Jaraja-langwa-langwa alikira. Biya ni-yama Jaraju-wa, “Dadiyaw-ana nungkwa-langwa arakba yingi-jungwuma adiniba. Mama arakba, ni-lalika naka nu-bungkawa, nara a-likama nakina nungkwa-langwu-wa alikira,” ni-yama.
Imba anaja Jesus n-engkirrka akina ayakwa akwa ni-yama Jaraju-wa, “Nara akbarduma, imba aningmi-dina amandangwa dakina king-adingaba-dinama,” ni-yama.
Biya Jesus akwa wurr-ababirna-langwa warni-mamalya na-likana ngawa wurri-yirrbiyirrba Jaraja-langwu-wa alikira, biya na-yarda arakba wurrakina. Biya Jesus nan-awiyabaja Bida yiya Jaminja yiya Janjana yiya Jaraja akwa ngal-ajukwaba dadingiy-anikba Jaraja-langwa alikira-wa arrawu-wa, imba nara wurru-kwala warni-mamalya kan-awiyabajuwa nakina. Ni-yama Jesus wurri-mirntak-iybinu-wa warni-mamalya, “Nara awiyabuma kirru-kwala arrawu-wa imba yalakwa wurr-ambilya errekba-manja-wiya,” ni-yama.
Abirraja wurr-ababirna-langwa warni-mamalya akina-manja angalya na-ngwadayinum-eka na-mirntaki-ringirryadinum-eka wurrakina warni-mamalya diybina-langwa dadiyara. Imba ni-yama Jesus abirruwa-wa, “Nara a-ngwaduma mana nara kingi-jungwuna dading-angkawura dakina, imba yanda yingi-mungkwulingam-eka marrnga daka aduwaya,” ni-yama Jesus da.
Imba abirraja warni-mamalya nanu-wurrmalya-kama nakinu-wa Jesus, mana warningma baba dakina amandangwa yingi-jungwuma.
Akana anaja Jesus n-awiyaba arrawu-wa akwa ni-rntarrka ayarrka ngala-langwa akwa n-artinga ngaluwa-wa. “Mirajanga!” ni-yama.
Ngalaja ngala-langwa amawurrna na-lawurradina ngaluwa-wa, ying-anibi-da arakba dakina da yingi-jungwu-mirrada da. Arngkawura-wiya ngawa yingi-mirajanga da. Imba Jesus nani-maka ngala-langwu-wa warni-mamalya. “Wurringa-kwuna anhinga king-alyibarini yada arakba,” ni-yama nakina da.
Abirnaja nungw-adikba akwa dirnt-adikba nani-yakikbijangayin-eka ying-anibi-di-mulangwa dakina di-yukwijiya. Anaja Jesus ni-yama wun-alakina-kiya-wa, “Nara a-makuma wurru-kwala-manja warni-mamalya ninging-anibi-ka-mulangwa daka ngayuwa,” ni-yama Jesus wun-alakina-kiya-wa nakina da.
Biya kembirra Jesus nanu-wurra-mirntukwama arakba ani-langwa warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa wurri-memberrkwa wurr-ambilyuma akwa nanu-kwama ani-langwa amawurrna kajungwa wurr-iyngbudi yada wurrakina. Ni-yama Jesus abirruwa-wa, “Ngayuwa ka-yngbidirr-kinama kirrakina, kajungwa yika-jadi-jini yada wurr-amukwa warni-mamalya-langwa akwa yika-mirntak-aningaba-kini yada angbilyuwa-langwa warni-mamalya,” ni-yama Jesus abirruwa-wa.
“Kembirra jay!” ni-yama. “Wurri-likaja arakba angerrba. Yika-makina wurr-ababirna-manja warni-mamalya kini-bungkawa-dina-mulangwa God. Akwa ngarningka yik-aningaba-kini yada warning-errbirra wurr-angb-angbilyuwa-mirra warni-mamalya angbilyuwa-langwa.
Wurri-likaja arakba, akana nara a-wilyakama amirntakijika. Arntuwarra nara a-wilyakama yiya kayuwa yiya anhinga akwa angwarnta nara a-wilyakama. Akwa du-wilyaba-ma ngawa dimballa dadingi-karrawara yik-awiyabanama, imba nara a-wilyakama du-kwala.
Biya kembirra yiki-yardiya-manja kirrakina awilyaba-manja angalya, akwa yikab-arti-jina-manja wurru-kwala warni-mamalya akwa yikab-awiyaba-jina-manja kirrakina alikira-wa wurrakina, kembirra yakwijina ngawa yiki-mungkwula marrnga. Awilyaba-manja ngawa alikira yiki-mungkwula yanda-langwa yiki-lalikina-manja akina angalya abirra-langwa.
Imba yiki-yardiya-manja aning-errbirra-manja angalya akwa ka-warana-manja nungkwurruwa wurri-miniybina angalya warni-mamalya, kembirra yiki-lalikinama akina angalya abirra-langwa. Akwa yiki-jadana-manja nungkwurruwa akina-langwa angalya, yiku-wurrana ajiringka ebina kuw-ardirranama nungkwurra-langwa aning-alika. Yiku-wurranama akina kajungwa wurri-mirntak-iybina warni-mamalya warningmi yada wurrakina yika-lalikinama kirrakina karning-angkawura arakba. Yika-wilyaka-jinama nungkwurruwa wurri-mirntak-akina-manja warni-mamalya ka-warana-mulangwa nungkwurruwa wurrakina akwa ka-warana-mulangwa God an-ajukwaba,” ni-yama Jesus ena-langwu-wa warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa.
Abirraja na-mirntaki-likanuma arakba wurrakina engku-wa yiya engku-wa angalya warniki-maki yada wurrakina warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa wurri-mirntak-akina-manja warni-mamalya aningaba ayakwa God-langwa-langwa, akwa warnik-aningaba-ki yada warni-mamalya wurriybina wurr-angb-angbilyuwa-mirrada.
Bi...ya anaja Yerida, niybina nu-bungkawa-dinuma akina-manja angalya Keliliya, n-engkirrkanuma nakina ayakwa warni-mamalya na-lyalyimbukwayinuma wurrakina Jesus-langwa. Wurrakin-eka na-maki-jayinuma amirntak-iybina-langwa ni-yama-mulangwa Jesus akwa ngawa amirntak-iybina-langwa ayakwa ni-yangbini-mulangwa nakina warni-mamalya-manja. Imba nakina Yerida nara kini-mi-miringka ayakwa ebina na-yangbayinuma, mana wurru-kwala baba na-yamama, “Janjana Nenikumingekingambaja n-anibi-duma ni-jungwu-mirrada nakina da.”
Imba abirraja na-yamama wurru-kwala, “Eliy-eka dukwa nakina ni-yarduma yalakwa.” Imba abirraja na-yamama wurru-kwala, “Nu-wilyaba Ni-Birabida niybina ni-jungwu-mirrada arakbirakba-kiya-wiya naka-bina dukwa da n-anibi-duma da.”
Nara kini-mi-miringka anaja Yerida n-engkirrkanu-mulangwa akina ayakwa na-yangbayinuma na-lyalyimbukwayinuma wurrakina. Imba ni-lyangki-yama nakina, “Na-yamarrkinam-eka amirntak-akina ayakwa? Ningani-makama nu-wilyaba-manja n-awinyamba nganyangwa akwa anaja nani-mini-yngkarrngarnuma aringka Janjana-langwa arakba da! Ni-miyambana-langwa n-anungkwarba kembirra na-lyalyimbukwayinama wurrakina?” ni-yama nakina Yerida ni-lyangki-maka-jungwunuma da. Kembirra nani-ngayindanguma angwurra nani-min-abirangkama naniki-rringki yada Jesus ana-langwa-mirra manba da.
Abirraja kembirra na-mirntaki-lawurradina arakba wurri-mirntak-iybina warniki-larrki-larrka warnungkwarba Jesus-langwa anuwa-wa. Biya nani-maka wurrakina Jesus-manja ababirna-langwa na-yama-mulangwa amirntak-akina. Anaja kembirra Jesus nanu-wilyaka wurrakina angerrba engembu-wa Bejeda. Nanu-wilyakama wurri-mirntak-akina wulkwa, imba nara wurru-kwala kanu-wilyaka nakina Jesus.
Abirraja wurru-kwala warni-mamalya nuw-engkirrkama ayakwa nakina Jesus ni-likani-mulangwa angerrba Bejedu-wa akwa nuw-ariji-dinuma anuwa-wa wurrakina arija-langwa. Kembirra wurrakina nan-akbirranga arakba nakina wilyarra. Anaja Jesus nara kini-min-angkirrayina wurrakina imba ni-yangbina ayakwa abirruwa-manja kini-bungkawa-dina-mulangwa God, akwa nani-mirntak-aningaba-ka nakina wurriybina wurr-angb-angbilyuwa-mirra warni-mamalya.
Kembirra na-larrwura-da arakba, nima-me...rr-merrk-balina mamawura. Abirraja wurri-mirntak-iybina warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa wurri-memberrkwa wurr-ambilyuma Jesus-langwa na-likana anuwa-wa. Na-yama, “En-eka angalya aning-alikirama. Kembirra wurra-larrkaja arakba wurri-mirntak-enena warni-mamalya. Abi-likaja arakba kajungwa kuw-alyibarini yada anhinga akwa ka-mungkwuli yada marrnga amirntak-ayina-manja angalya yanjarra,” na-yama.
Anaja Jesus ni-yama abirruwa-wa, “Nungkwurruw-eka-dangwa wurra-kwuna anhinga kuw-alyibarini yada warna warni-mamalya,” ni-yama. Abirraja na-yama, “Yarn-eka yirru-wilyakinama amangbala damba akwa ambilyuma akwalya imba nara akwala ebina da. Nar-eka yarna a-kwama wurri-mirntak-ayina wurru-wurra-kwilyimida warni-mamalya enena anhinga da. Dukwa yirri-mini-ngayindanama nungkwuwa yarna yiki-likajama yiki-bayindanama anhinga wurri-mirntak-ayina-langwa wurru-wurra-kwilyimida warni-mamalya da?” na-yama.
Abirraja wurrakina warni-mamalya yakwijina nuw-ambilyuma wurru-wurra-kwilyimid-eka na-lyimberr-mirdini-mirra, 5,000 warnungkwarba akwa ngawa wurri-darringka akwa wurri-yukwayuwa abirra-langwa abirr-ajukwaba. Anaja kembirra ni-yama Jesus ena-langwu-wa warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa, “Wurr-ambarr-jina ab-angmakayana ajiringka-manja. Abu-wurra-mirntukwuna 50 yalakwa, 50 angakwuba, imba 50 yada-langwa-langwa. Abi-yamina ngawa wurri-mirntak-enena warni-mamalya wurru-wurra-kwilyimida-langwa,” ni-yama Jesus.
Kembirra abirraja warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa ani-langwa narra-maka wurri-mirntak-iybina-manja warni-mamalya ebina-langwiya ayakwa Jesus-langwa. Akwa kembirra abirraja nuw-alambarrnga arakba wurrakina wurr-ababirna-langwa da.
Anaja kembirra Jesus ni-rntirrka ebina amangbala damba akwa ambilyuma akwalya. Akwa nu-ngwundikadinga, angwubina-wa n-andiyaya, akwa nani-yang-marngkwa-juwa God nanu-kwa-mulangwa nakina ebina damba yiya akwalya wurrakina-manja. Biya ni-mirntaki-kuwarranga kembirra ebina a-yukwayuwa-wiya da. Akwa nanu-kwa akina damba yiya akwalya ena-langwu-wa warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa, kajungwa abirramba-langwa warniku-kwi yada akina wurri-mirntak-iybinu-wa warni-mamalya da.
Abirraja na-yabukayina arakba da akwa na-mirntaki-ladinga wurr-ababirna-langwa da. Ngalaja yakwijina adirrngwarna a-ngarmungkwa alabira nuw-ambilyuma akina. Kembirra wurri-mirntak-iybina warni-mamalya narru-wurra-mirntukwama amirntak-iybina a-yukwayuwa anhinga narri-lalika-mulangwa nuw-ayijini-mirrada wurrakina. Abirraja Jesus-langwa warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa narr-akimarnuma amirntak-akina ebina-manja adirrngwarna a-ngarmungkwa alabira akina anhinga. Kembirra a-memberrkwa ambilyuma a-ngarmungkwa alabira adi-dirrngwarna na-lyangburrkwunuma da.
Bi...ya arngkawura anaja Jesus nakina n-akwukawura n-ambilyuma akwa ni-biriyaminuma God-uwa. Abirraja wurri-bukwaya na-likana arakba anuwa-wa ani-langwa warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa. Imba Jesus ni-yama abirruwa-wa, “Na-lyalyimbukwayini-manja warni-mamalya, ningi-miyambana ningena na-yamama wurrakina?” ni-yama.
Abirraja na-yama wurrakina Jesus-uwa, “Wurru-kwala warni-mamalya na-yamama, ‘Nakin-eka Janjana, niybina Naniki-mingeki-ngamba-ja da.’ Imba abirraja wurru-kwala na-yamama wurrakina, ‘Eliy-eka nakina da.’ Abirraja wurru-kwala na-yamama, ‘Nu-wilyab-eka Ni-Birabida n-anungkwarba n-aning-arakba-kiya n-anibi-duma arakba nakina da,’” na-yama.
“Imba nungkwurraja?” ni-yama anaja Jesus abirruwa-wa. “Ningi-miyambana ngayuwa kirri-yaminama?” ni-yama. Anaja Bida ni-lawurraka-ja ayakwa. “Nungkuw-eka ningki-bungkawa ningk-iybina God ni-yangbini-mulangwa nakina arakbirakba-kiya-wiya,” ni-yama. “Ni-yamama nakina God, ‘Ngayuw-eka ningena ning-aniki-larrka nu-wilyaba nani-mamalya kajungwa kan-anibi-kini yada nakina nganyangwa warni-mamalya,’ ni-yamama. Kembirra nungkwuwa-bina ningkakina ningk-ani-mamalya ningk-ani-miykirra Ningki-Majaya da,” ni-yama Bida nakina da.
Anaja ni-yama Jesus ena-langwu-wa warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa, “Nar-eka a-makama warning-errbirra-manja warni-mamalya ebina Bida ni-yangbini-mulangwa ayakwa ngayuwa-langwa.
Ngayuw-eka ningena, ningiybina-mirrada ningi-rukwularrinuma enena-manja angalya, ki-lyandinam-eka angwurra ningena da. Abirraja wurr-arum-uruma ngakwurra-langwa akwa ngawa wurri-Minida wurr-arum-uruma ka-waranam-eka wurrakina ngayuwa. Abirraja warnik-akakirumaka Mawijija-langwa aning-arum-uruma ayakwa abirr-ajukwaba ka-waranam-eka ngayuwa da. Kabu-wartanama ningena akana k-anibi-dinama m-abiyakarbiya-manja mamawura ngayuwa da,” ni-yama Jesus ena-langwu-wa warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa da.
Kembirra Jesus ni-yangbina ngarningka ayakwa ana-langwu-wa warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa wurr-ababirnu-wa. “Kwurruwa-yi! Yiki-ngayindana-manja yiki-yuwarna-manja ngayuwa-manja, yiku-wara-jungwunuma nungkwurr-abakiya. M-ababirna-langwa marrnga, nungkwurruwa yiki-yaminama wubirra yiki-lyilyana eka ka-mambalinu-mirri-manja, akwa yik-abirraki-yuwarna ngayuwa.
Nungkwurruwa-manja yiku-wilyakina-manja nungkwurra-langwa akwananibika, ambaka-mirra amandangwa yiki-lyumadina akina. Akana yiki-lalikina-manja akwananibika nungkwurra-langwa, ngayuwi yada, ambaka-mirra yik-anibi-dinama kirrakina da.

“Imba karning-errbirra karni-mamalya yiki-yaliyana-manja aduwaba ngayuwa-langwa akwa ngawa nganyangwa-langwa ayakwa, kembirra ngay-amba-langwa ka-mini-yaliyanama nganjukwaba nungkwurruwa-langwa. Ngayuwa, ningiybina-mirrada ningi-rukwularrinuma enena-manja angalya, ka-mini-yaliyanama nungkwurruwa-langwa akini yada ngawa ki-lawurradina-manja ngayuwa yangkwurrangwa. Ki-lawurradina-manja ngayuwa yangkwurrangwa ku-kwilya-danama ningena ngaya-bakiya-ba. Akwa ku-kwilya-danama ngarningka Nungw-arrka-langwu-ma alarr-adada. Akwa abirr-ajukwaba warniki-mamirika-ja God-langwa ka-kwilya-danama wurrakina.
“W-engkirraja enena ayakwa ngarra-makinama ningi-larrkbi-larrkbakinama. Karn-eka kirru-kwala karni-mamalya yalakwa nara a-jungwuma kirrakina yanda-langwa yikini-rringkina-manja God kini-bungkawa-dina-manja nakina kirr-ababirna-manja karni-mamalya ababirna-langwa angalya,” ni-yama Jesus wurri-mirntak-iybinu-wa warni-mamalya da.
Bi...ya ngalaja m-amangbala m-ambilyuma mamawura numi-likanuma makina. Biya kembirra Jesus nanu-wilyakama Bida yiya Janjana akwa Jaminja, kembirra na-biki-likanuma na-biku-wurtanguma wurri-bik-alakina angak-arjiyinga-wa angalya, kajungwa kini-biriyamini yada nakina Jesus God-uwa yakwijina. Biya na-biku-wurtanga wurri-bik-alakina karrawaru-wa. Kembirra arakba ni-biriyaminuma Jesus God-uwa.
Imba abirri-bukwurraja Bida yiya Janjana akwa Jaminja narri-bikima-ngayindanguma marrnga. Akwa na-biki-mungkwulinga m-aruma marrnga wurri-bik-alakina. Anaja kembirra nu-biriyaminu-wiya nakina Jesus, ni-miniyngka-dinum-eka nani-mukwurra. Ngalaja diybina dimballa ani-langwa n-awiyabanuma nakina yingu-kwilyarriyinum-eka arakba dakina. Yingu-kwilya-danguma du-kwily-adad-eka wubirra a-mangwurrajija amarrirla-langwa dakina. Abirnaja kembirra wun-ambilyuma-kiya wun-anungkwarba-kiya nani-jadinga adirrariyaba yakwijina. Biya na-biki-lyalyimbukwayinuma arakba yakwijina abirr-bukwurruwa Jesus. Wunalakina wun-anungkwarba-kiya wun-ani-miykirra-kiya nu-wilyaba nu-bungkawa Mawijija nakina imba nu-wilyaba Eliya, Ni-Birabida n-anungkwarba nakina. Arakbirakba-kiya-wiya nani-jungwayini-mirrada wunalakina, akana Jesus-manja arakba yakwijina wun-alakina da. Akwa nanu-kwilyarriyinum-eka abirn-ajukwaba wun-alakina-kiya. Biya na-biki-lyalyimbukwayinuma wurri-bik-alakina naniki-jungwa-langwa Jesus Jirujalema-manja. Naniki-jungwi yada Jesus nakina mana God ni-lyangku-werri-bika-jungwunuma akina arakbirakba-kiya-wiya. Kembirra abirri-bukwurraja Bida yiya Janjana akwa Jaminja na-biki-mirajanga arakba, akwa nani-rringka Jesus na-kwilyarriyinuma nakina. Akwa narra-lirraki-rringka ngarningka wunalakina wun-anungkwarba-kiya Jesus-manja akwudangwa nan-alkayanguma.
<range>
<range>
<range>
Abirnaja wun-aniki-liki yada wunalakina wun-anungkwarba-kiya Jesus-langwa arakba. Anaja ni-yama Bida Jesus-uwa, “Bungkawa,” ni-yama, “aningab-eka ena yirri-bik-ambilyama yarna yalakwa da. Kembirra ka-mini-ngekbirakinam-eka abiyakarbiya amiyarrya, awilyaba nungkwa-langwa, awilyaba Mawijija-langwa imba awilyaba Eliya-langwa da,” ni-yama nakina Bida. Akana errbirra ni-yangbinuma nakina Bida, mana nara baba angwurra kin-engkirrkana akinu-wa ayakwa ani-langwa.
A-wilyaba-wiya ayakwa ni-yangbinu-wiya Bida, ngalaja angwubina na-jadinga narraku-wurraku-wurmbi-ja wurrakina-manja yakwijina karrawara angakarjiyinga-manja angalya. Abirri-bukwurraja na-bik-akbarda wurri-bik-alakina Bida yiya Janjana akwa Jaminja narraku-wurraku-wurmbi-ji-mulangwa akina angwubina abirr-bukwurruwa-manja akwa ngawa Jesus-manja akwa ngawa wun-alakina-manja Mawijija-manja akwa Eliya-manja abirn-ajukwaba akina da.
Biya nuw-engkirrka arakba amayakwa na-yangbinuma angaliba angwubina-langwa. Na-yama ngalaja, “Naka Nanukw-arrka nganyangwa, niybina ningu-wekbalyinuma. W-engkirraja anuwa-wa,” na-yama akina amayakwa.
Kembirra na-yangbini-mulangwa akina amayakwa, abirri-bukwurraja wurri-bik-alekbina Bida yiya Janjana akwa Jaminja nani-rringka Jesus n-akwukawura arakba nakina da. Nara wurriybina wurru-kwala imba Jesus anuwa yimbukwa nani-rringkama n-akwukawura arakba da. Akana nara karra-maka wurri-bik-alakina wurru-kwala-manja warni-mamalya ebina-langwa narri-rringka-mulangwa, imba na-biki-yang-minja-dinuma, nara ayakwa ka-biki-yangbina wurri-bik-alakina ngawa da.
Biya m-iyngka-manja mamawura Jesus akwa wurri-bik-alekbina ani-langwa wurri-bik-abiyakarbiya warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa na-biki-dirrirntuma arakba ebina-langwa angakarjiyinga. Abirraja wurr-ababirn-eka warni-mamalya nuw-akbirrang-anja wurrakina yakwijina arrawa.
Anaja nu-wilyaba n-anungkwarba n-artanga nakina Jesus-uwa akwa ni-yama, “Bungkawa, yi-mini-rringka-langwa naka nanukw-arrka n-ambawura-mirra.
Abirraja wurru-wilyaba wurru-wurrariya wurr-amukwa nani-mi-manama nakina arngk-ababirna-langwa. Na-wartu-wartaminam-eka wurrakina wurr-amukwa akwa nani-mirntaku-warr-jinama nani-madangkwa ni-yukwijiya-langwa angerrba yiya angerrba, kembirra alyukwalya na-jadanama edirra-langwa ana-langwa-langwa. Wurrakin-eka wurr-amukwa nara a-lalikama naka ni-yukwijiya imba nani-lyandi-kinam-eka naka.
Nganja ning-arra-yandabanuma warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa nungkwa-langwa karra-jadi-juwi yada wurrakina wurr-amukwa, akana nara abirraja karra-jadi-juwa da,” ni-yama niybina nungw-anikba Jesus-uwa da.
Anaja ni-yama Jesus wurri-mirntak-iybinu-wa warni-mamalya, “Karukwa, mikwurrak-eka mangma kirrima-wilyakinama ngawa karna karni-mamalya, kembirra nara ambaka a-werrik-ambilyuma kirrakina ngayuwa-manja. Ngayuw-eka ningena ning-errbirandinam-eka nungkwurruwa-wa. Ngambi-yad-eka ka-lalikinama ngayuwa nungkwurruwa karni-mamalya?” ni-yama Jesus. Biya kembirra ni-yama nakina niybinu-wa n-anungkwarba, “Kwa, nu-wilyakina nanukw-ana yangkwurrangwa,” ni-yama.
Abirnaja nani-likana wunalakina Jesus-uwa akana lukwakwa abirraja wurriybina wurr-amukwa nani-kbilyajanga nakina ni-yukwijiya ajiringka-wa, akwa nani-mirntaku-warri-juwa nani-madangkwa ani-langwa angerrba yiya angerrba. Anaja ni-yangbina nakina Jesus ayakwa wurrakinu-wa wurr-amukwa. “Jadiya nakina-langwa ni-yukwijiya,” ni-yama. Ni-yangbinu-wiya nakina Jesus akina ayakwa wurrakinu-wa wurr-amukwa, kembirra anaja n-aningaba-duma arakba nakina ni-yukwijiya. Kembirra Jesus ni-yama nungw-anikba-wa, “Naka arakba nanukw-ana n-aningaba-duma,” ni-yama.
Abirraja wurr-ababirna-langwa warni-mamalya ebina-manja angalya na-yakikbijangayinuma angwurra mana God n-arrbida amandangwa nakina baba da. Na-maki-jayinu-wiya ngawa wurri-mirntak-iybina warni-mamalya ababirna-langwa aning-iningaba ni-yama-mulangwa Jesus, anaja ni-yangbina nakina Jesus ayakwa ena-langwu-wa warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa.
“W-engkirraja ambaka-langwa enenu-wa ayakwa ka-makina-mirruwa ngayuwa nungkwurruwa-wa,” ni-yama. “Yik-awiyaba-jina-manja enena ayakwa mu-wilyabu-wa mada, nara a-jadi-juma mingarrku-warru-wa, imba yiku-wilyakinama akina ngawa. Ngayuw-eka ningena ning-ambilyama ningiybina-mirrada ningi-rukwularrinuma enena-manja angalya, akana abirraja wurru-kwala warnungkwarba kabi-manama, kabu-wilyakinama wurri-bu-bungkawu-wa,” ni-yama Jesus abirruwa-wa.
Akana abirraja warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa Jesus-langwa nara karri-mi-miringka akina ayakwa ani-langwa wurrakina. Akin-eka ayakwa nuw-abuwarrka-jungwunuma kajungwa nari yada a-mi-miringkama wurrakina warnungkwarba. Kembirra nar-eka ka-yama kani-yangki-labana wurrakina, “Na-yamarrkama ebina ayakwa ningki-yangbinuma?” nara ka-yama kani-yangki-labana, mana na-mirntak-akbardanguma angwurra wurrakina baba da.
Biya kembirra wurri-mirntak-akina warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa Jesus-langwa na-mirntaki-merrbayinuma akwa na-yama, “Ngarri-miyambana ngarr-aruma ngarru-kwala-manja angwurra? Imba ngarri-miyambana aki-bungkawa-dinama ngarru-kwala-manja ngarnungkwarba?” na-yama.
Anaja Jesus n-aningma nakina abirra-langwa mangma akwa nan-arti-juwa nu-wilyaba ni-yukwijiya anuwa-wa. Nan-arjiya-juwama nakina anuwa-manja ni-rukwuwarra-langwa,
akwa ni-yama ena-langwu-wa warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa, “Karning-errbirra karni-mamalya yiki-min-engkirrkaja-manja ngayuwa-wa akwa yiki-lyalyingmina-manja naka ni-yukwijiya, kembirra yiki-lyalyingminama kirrakina ngarningka ngayuwa nganjukwaba. Akwa karning-errbirra karni-mamalya yiki-lyalyingmina-manja ngayuwa, kembirra yiki-lyalyingminama ngarningka God an-ajukwaba, niybina ngini-larrkama ngayuwa yangkwurrangwa nungkwurruwa-wa. Kirru-wilyaba karni-mamalya nara-manja a-ngkwaningaba-kajungwuma kirrakina imba yika-minu-wartana-manja wurru-kwala-langwa warka, kembirra anaja nakina God kini-yaminama nungkwurruwa-wa, ‘Ningk-aruma ningk-ani-mamalya,’ kini-yaminama nakina da,” ni-yama nakina Jesus abirruwa-wa.
Anaja kembirra Janjana ni-yama Jesus-uwa, “Bungkawa,” ni-yama, “yini-rringkama yarna nu-wilyaba n-anungkwarba nani-jadi-juwama wurru-wurrariya wurr-amukwa warni-mamalya-langwa. Imba anaja ni-yangbi-juwama nakina ekirra nungkwa-langwa. Kembirra yiny-ngwanja-juma mana nara baba nakina ngakwurra-langwa nani-mamalya,” ni-yama Janjana nakina da.
Imba anaja nakina Jesus ni-yangbina ayakwa Janjanu-wa akwa ngarningka ena-langwu-wa wurru-kwala warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa. “A-a, nara a-ngwanja-juma nakina,” ni-yama. “Nara a-ngwanja-juma mana nakina nani-mamalya, niybina nara a-warma nungkwurruwa-manja, kirrani-mamirika-jinama nungkwurruwa nakina da,” ni-yama Jesus abirruwa-wa da.
Bi...ya ni-lyangku-werri-bika-jungwunuma arakba nakina Jesus kini-likaji yada dirrbira Jirujalemu-wa kajungwa nari yada ambididuma amiyarra nakina. Nim-ambawura-dinuma arakba ngalaja mamawura naniki-lawurrada-langwa Jesus God-langwu-wa angalya abalkayu-wa.
Nani-larrkanuma kembirra Jesus wurru-kwala warnungkwarba awilyabu-wa angalya amin-ambawura-mirruwa alikira. Akin-eka angalya nuw-ambilyuma Jameriya-manja miybina-manja mamirukwa nimi-likanu-murri-manja Jirujalemu-wa makina. Nani-larrkanuma nakina Jesus kajungwa warnik-abirangki yada wurrakina angalya adinakba nanik-ambilyingi yada wilyarra nakina. Abirraja na-lyangmanguma wurrakina adinakba imba Jesus akwa ani-langwa warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa nuw-ariji-dinuma wurri-mirntak-akina arija-langwa da. Bi...ya abirraja na-yarda arakba wurrakina warnungkwarba akina-manja angalya amin-ambawura alikira. Akwa narra-yangki-labana wurrakina warning-akwijina warni-mamalya alikiri yada Jesus-langwi yada akwa ngawa ena-langwi yada warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa kajungwa warnik-ambilyingi yada aduwaya wurrakina yakwijina.
Akana abirraja wurri-min-akina angalya Warning-Jameriya warni-mamalya na-mirntaku-waranguma nara ambilyuma Jesus abirra-langwa-manja angalya. Na-mirntaku-waranguma wurri-mirntak-akina warni-mamalya mana narra-wurriykba-mubaba angwurra warning-errbirra-manja warningi-Judiya warni-mamalya. Akwa ngarningka warningma wurrakina kini-likajama nakina Jesus Jirujalemu-wa kajungwa nanik-ambarrngi yada nakina Akwuringku-warrkwa yakwijina da.
Bi...ya abirraja nuw-akbirrang-anja-manja ngarningka wurriybina warnungkwarba akwa Jesus akwa ani-langwa warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa, nani-makama wurrakina Jesus-manja ebina ayakwa na-warangi-mulangwa Jesus wurri-mirntak-iybina Warning-Jameriya warni-mamalya. Abirnaja kembirra Jaminja akwa Janjana nani-yama Jesus-uwa arakba, “Bungkawa,” nani-yama, “dukwa ningkakina yirri-ngayindanama yarna yikini-yang-kilabajama God-uwa kajungwa kini-larrka-ji yada nakina angwura angwubina-langwa karraki-dakini yada wurri-mirntak-ayana Warning-Jameriya warni-mamalya da?” nani-yama wun-alakina da.
Anaja Jesus ni-yama wun-alakina-kiya-wa wun-anungkwarba-kiya, “Nar-eka a-yangbuma nungkwurnuwa amukwiyad-akina ayakwa kin-alakina da,” ni-yama nakina.
Kembirra nara ka-ngwanjina wurrakina Jesus akwa ngawa ani-langwa warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa akina-manja angalya, imba wurr-arri-jinungkwa ngawa angwurra na-mirntaki-likanuma aminiyngku-wa angalya da.
Biya Jesus akwa ani-langwa warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa na-likani-manja lukwakwa wurrakina nuw-akbirrang-anja nu-wilyaba n-anungkwarba. Anaja ni-yama nakina Jesus-uwa, “Nganjukwaba ki-likajama nungkwuwa-manja,” ni-yama. “Yiba-yibi-yuwarnama ngawa ngayuwa ababirnu-wa angalya ki-likaja-mirruwa nungkwuwa ningkakina da,” ni-yama nakina.
Anaja ni-yama Jesus anuwa-wa, “Kwuja, akin-eka warning-animbaliba-langwa edirra abirra-langwa akwa ngawa wurrajija-langwa miyerriya abirra-langwa abirr-ajukwaba makina. Akana nara ebina angalya nganyangwa da. Ngayuw-eka ningena ning-ambilyama ningiybina-mirrada ningi-rukwularrinuma enena-manja angalya, akana nara ebina angalya nganyangwa kajungwa ning-aniki-mungkwulingi yada ningi-yngkinyungwurra wurri-mirntak-iybina wubirra warning-animbaliba akwa wurrajija wurriybina na-mungkwuli-jayinama wurri-yngkinyungwurra wurrakina da,” ni-yama Jesus niybinu-wa n-anungkwarba nakina da.
Bi...ya nuw-akbirrang-anja Jesus akwa ani-langwa warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa nu-wilyaba ngarningka n-anungkwarba ni-likanuma mamirukwa-langwiya. Biya Jesus ni-yama anuwa-wa, “Kwa, likaja yakuwa, yi-yuwarna ngayuwa-manja,” ni-yama. Anaja n-anungkwarba ni-yama, “Nara ambaka, Bungkawa,” ni-yama. “Ngi-likaja-langwa adiniba-wiya angalyu-wa, mana nungw-arrka nganyangwa ni-jungwuma arakba. Kini-rungkwabinama adiniba-wiya nani-madangkwa ajiringka-manja, kembirra arija-langwa ki-likajama yiba-yuwarnama ngayuwa nungkwuwa-manja,” ni-yama.
Anaja ni-yama Jesus anuwa-wa, “Abirraja warni-mamalya wurriybina nara a-likama God-langwa-manja mamirukwa abirra-rungkwabina warni-niki-jungwa warni-madangkwa abirra-langwa, mana na-likaja-mubaba abirr-ajukwaba warni-niki-jungwa wubirra wurrakina. Imba nungkwaja, jay, likaja arakba, imba ka-makina warni-mamalya-manja, ‘God kini-bungkawa-dini yada nakina kirr-ababirna-manja karni-mamalya ababirna-langwa angalya,’ ki-yaminama nungkwuwa ningkakina da,” ni-yama Jesus anuwa-wa da.
Anaja nu-wilyaba n-iyngka n-anungkwarba ni-yama Jesus-uwa, “Bungkawa,” ni-yama, “ningena ngayuwa yiba-yuwarnama nungkwuwa-manja, imba adiniba-wiya ngi-likiya-langwa angalyu-wa ngayuwa ka-makini yada nganyangwa-manja warni-mamalya yiba-yuwarna-mulangwa ngayuwa nungkwuwa-manja,” ni-yama nakina.
Anaja kembirra Jesus ni-yama anuwa-wa, “Nungkwaja yiki-yuwarna-manja ngayuwa-manja, kembirra nara ningkakina errkerruma. K-errkerrina-manja nungkwuwa, kembirra ki-yaminama ningkakina nu-wilyaba wubirra n-anungkwarba ni-ngadingkarrijinama ajiringka. Kin-errikerrina-manja akwabirrangarnu-wa nakina, nara kembirra dirrbira a-likama, imba angerrba yiya angerrba kini-likajama kini-yangkwuruwudinama nakina da. Nakina wubirra n-anungkwarba ki-yaminama nungkwaja yi-mini-yarrku-warakina-mulangwa aduwaya nganyangwa ayakwa akana yi-lalikina-mulangwa ngayuwa da. Nar-eka God a-bungkawa-duma kirra-mukwiyad-akina-manja karni-mamalya nakina da,” ni-yama Jesus anuwa-wa da.
Bi...ya Nu-Bungkawa Jesus nu-wekbalyinuma nakina wurru-kwala ngarningka warni-mamalya. Ni-lyangku-werri-bika-jungwunuma naniki-liki yada ababirnu-wa angalya nuw-ambilyi-mirruwa alikira yiya warni-mamalya. Nu-wekbalyinuma nakina 70 warni-mamalya kajungwa ka-lyangmani yada wurrakina wurr-amb-ambilyuma-wiya angerrba yiya angerrba amirntak-akinu-wa angalya imba kuw-ariji-dini yada Jesus akwa ani-langwa warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa wurri-memberrkwa wurr-ambilyuma ambaka-mirra wurrakina da.
Ni-yangbina kembirra Jesus amirntak-enena ayakwa lukwuniyawa abirruwa-wa nara-wiya ka-likana engku-wa. “W-engkirrkiya,” ni-yama Jesus. “Adiniba God kini-bungkawa-dinama nakina. Abirraja warni-mamalya warnik-engkirrki yada wurr-ababirna God-langwa ayakwa arakba wurrakina. Kembirra kuw-angkirrkaja-manja nara wurrakina a-warma ani-langwa ayakwa imba kani-min-engkirrkajama anuwa-wa. Akana nungkwurraja kirriybina kini-minu-wardanama God-langwa warka aduwaba kirr-ambawur-eka kirrakina da. Kembirra wuni-yang-kilabaja Nu-Bungkawa God kajungwa kani-larrkaji yada nakina wurr-ababirna warniki-minu-wardu-warda ani-langwa kajungwa kani-makini yada ani-langwa ayakwa wurr-ababirna-manja warni-mamalya nakina da.”
“W-engkirrkiya,” ni-yama ngarningka Jesus. “Kuw-akbirranganja-manja warning-animbaliba ebina a-yukwujiya jiba, anijiyangm-eka awinyamba akina jiba a-yukwujiya, wurr-abarta baba awinyamba wurrakina warning-animbaliba. Imba nganja ngarra-larrkajama nungkwurruwa aduwaba akwa akin-eka wubirra a-yukwujiya jiba yiki-yaminama kirrakina karni-mamalya. Yik-akbirrangayinama kirrakina warni-mamalya wurriybina wurr-abarta awinyamba wurrakina da.”
Biya Jesus ni-yama ngarningka, “Nar-eka a-wilyakama angwarnta yiya beka m-aning-anhinga akwa aning-alika nungkwurruwa-manja, imba errbirra yiki-likaja. Biya yika-rringkina-manja wurru-kwala warni-mamalya mamirukwa-manja, nara ambididuma a-lyalyimbukwajuma lukwakwa imba dirrbira yiki-likaja kirrakina ngawa. Kembirra yikini-yardiya-manja kin-alekbina kin-ambilyuma-kiya kin-ani-mamalya-kiya awilyaba-manja angalya akwa yikin-awiyabana-manja arrawu-wa alikira-wa kin-alakina, adiniba-wiya yikini-yangbina enena ayakwa wurri-min-akinu-wa alikira. Yikini-yama kin-alakina, ‘Yi-lyurrkwa yukwudukwuda wurr-ambilya,’ yikini-yamina abirruwa-wa.
<range>
Imba akina-manja alikira kin-ambilya-manja nu-wilyaba nani-mamalya niybina kani-ngayindanama nakina God kani-mini-lyurrkwa-kinama yukwudukwuda ani-langwa, kembirra anaja God kani-mini-lyurrkwa-kinama amandangwa yukwudukwuda ani-langwa. Imba ka-warana-manja wurri-min-akina alikira warni-mamalya nara-manja a-mini-lyurrkwa-kama God yukwudukwuda abirra-langwa, kembirra ngalaja ebina ayakwa nungkwurna-langwa nara akina a-mini-lyurrkwa-kama yukwudukwuda abirra-langwa. Imba akin-eka ayakwa nungkwurna-langwa kuw-ambilyama ngawa nungkwurnuwa-manja.
Imba yakwijina ngawa ebina-manja alikira yikini-mungkwula kin-alakina. Akwa yikin-alyibarina anhinga abirra-langwa akwa yikini-ybekina akwubibeka yakwijina abirra-langwa. Yiki-yaminjaminama ngawa kirrakina karni-mamalya mana yikabu-kwuna-manja wurrakina warni-mamalya anhinga karniki-minu-wardu-warda karni-mamalya aningaba akina. Nara a-rnjurrkwuma engku-wa yiya engku-wa alikira, imba a-wilyu-wilyaba-wiya-manja yik-ambilyama ngawa da.”
Biya Jesus ni-yama ngarningka, “Yikini-likaja-manja nungkwurnuwa aning-errbirru-wa angalya,” ni-yama, “akana nara-manja a-warma kin-alakina wurri-min-akina angalya warni-mamalya, kembirra yikin-alyibarina ebina anhinga yikabu-kwunama wurrakina,
akwa yik-aningaba-kina wurr-angb-angbilyuwama warni-mamalya abirra-langwa. Yik-aningaba-kina warni-mamalya angbilyuwa-langwa, akwa yikini-yangbina nungkwurnuwa enena ayakwa wurri-mirntak-akina-manja wurr-ababirna-manja warni-mamalya. ‘Aduwaba,’ yikini-yamina, ‘yik-aningmi-dinama kirrakina kini-bungkawa-dina-mulangwa God adiniba nakina da,’ yikini-yamina kin-alakina abirruwa-wa.”
Biya Jesus ni-yama ngarningka, “Yikini-likaja-manja kin-alakina aning-errbirru-wa angalya,” ni-yama, “akana ka-warana-manja kin-alakina wurri-min-akina angalya warni-mamalya, kembirra yikini-rijakbina akina angalya abirra-langwa akwa yikini-yangbina lukwakwa enena ayakwa abirruwa-wa.
Yikini-yamina, ‘Enena ajiringka nungkwurra-langwa-manja angalya ebina nuw-ardirranama yina-langwa-manja alika yikinu-wurranama arakba yin-alakena,’ yikini-yamina. ‘Yinuwa yikinu-wurranama akina kajungwa karningmi yada yinuwa yin-alakena ngarra-lekbajama nungkwurruwa-wa, mana kirru-warangu-mubaba aduwaba ayakwa God-langwa. Imba w-engkirraja angwurra enenu-wa ayakwa nungkwurraja karni-mamalya enena-manja angalya. Aduwab-eka yik-aningmi-dinama kirrakina kini-bungkawa-dina-mulangwa God adiniba nakina!’ yikini-yamina kin-alakina-kiya abirruwa-wa da.
Amandangwa, ngarra-makinama,” ni-yama ngarningka Jesus, “God kani-lekbajam-eka wurri-mirntak-akinu-wa warni-mamalya m-aning-arija-langwa-manja mamawura. Akini yada ngawa kini-lyangku-werribika-jungwunama nakina karni-mamalya-langwa, karningaba-mirrikba akwa kirru-wurrariya-mirrikba. Nakin-eka kani-lekbajama abirr-ajukwaba wurri-mirntak-iybinu-wa warni-mamalya wurru-wurrariya Warningi-Jaduma, kembirra akini yada ngawa ka-lyandinam-eka wurrakina warni-mamalya. Akana kani-lekbajama nakin-eka God angwurra wurri-mirntak-iybina warni-mamalya wurriybina ka-waranama nungkwurra-langwa ayakwa aduwaba, akwa ka-lyandinam-eka angwurra wurrakin-eka da!” ni-yama Jesus, nani-makama wurri-mirntak-iybina-manja warni-mamalya 70 da.
Biya kembirra Jesus ni-yama nakina, “Nungkwurraja karni-mamalya Karningi-Karajina akwa ngawa Karningi-Bejeda yiki-yamarrkinam-eka kirrakina?” ni-yama. “Anaja God yikani-mini-ngekbirakinama a-werrik-awarrya awurrariya nungkwurra-langwi yada. Kirrakin-eka kirri-rringkama arakba engb-iyngbida amirntak-iybina God ni-yama-mulangwa nakina nungkwurra-langwa-manja angalya aduwaba, akana nara yiki-larrngku-wurranga alarrngk-ilarrngk-awarrya kirrakina akwa nara yikini-mini-yarrku-waraka ayakwa God-langwa da.” Biya Jesus ni-yama ngarningka, “Abirraja arakbirakba-kiya-wiya warni-mamalya Warningi-Daya akwa Warningi-Jayidina wurru-wurrariya wurrakina nuw-ambilyuma. Wurru-wurrariya wurri-lyangm-eka. Akana nara wurrakina karri-rringka engb-iyngbida amirntak-iybina ni-yama-mulangwa God nungkwurra-langwa-manja angalya. Karri-rringka-manja wurrakina ebina aningaba engb-iyngbida God-langwa, kembirra karru-wurranguma wurrakina a-wurru-wurrariya imba kani-mini-yarrku-warakama arakba God-langwa ayakwa wurrakina. Waranja-bawiya kuw-awiyabayinuma du-wurru-wurrariya dimballa diybina narringa-ngekbirakama nanukwuta-langwu-ma a-mangwurrajija, akwa kuw-ambarrnuma ajiringka-manja amarnina-manja. Akin-eka ka-yamama wurrakina kajungwa n-aningmi yada God narri-larrngku-wurrangi-mulangwa alarrngk-ilarrngk-awarrya imba nani-mini-yarrku-warakinuma God-langwa ayakwa arakba wurrakina da,” ni-yama nakina.
Biya Jesus ni-yama ngarningka, “M-aning-arija-langwa-manja mamawura anaja God kani-lekbajama amandangwa wurri-mirntak-iybina warni-mamalya Warningi-Daya-manja akwa ngawa Warningi-Jayidina-manja, wurru-wurrariya baba wurrakina. Imba yikani-lekbajama nakina angwurra kirrakina karni-mamalya Karningi-Karajina akwa Karningi-Bejeda kirru-warangi-mulangwa nungkwurr-ajukwaba God-langwa ayakwa aduwaba.
Imba nungkwurraja karni-mamalya Karningi-Kabuniyuma,” ni-yama Jesus. “Kirri-lyangku-werri-bika-jungwunuma God yikanu-wilyakina-mulangwa kirrakina ena-langwu-wa angalya aningaba na! Akana nar-eka da! Nakin-eka yikani-larrkajama kirrakina awurrariya-wa angalya kirru-warangi-mulangwa ani-langwa ayakwa aduwaba da!” ni-yama Jesus.
Biya kembirra ni-yama Jesus nani-makama wurri-mirntak-iybina-manja 70 warni-mamalya, “Amandangwa,” ni-yama, “warning-errbirra warni-mamalya kuw-angkirrkaja-manja ayakwa nungkwurra-langwa, akin-eka wubirra laka kuw-engkirrkajama ayakwa nganyangwa. Imba ka-warana-manja nungkwurruwa wurrakina, akin-eka wubirra laka ka-waranama ngayuwa nganjukwaba. Akwa ka-warana-manja ngayuwa wurrakina warni-mamalya, ka-waranama an-ajukwaba niybina ngini-larrkama ngayuwa yangkwurrangwa da,” ni-yama Jesus abirruwa-wa. Abirraja kembirra na-mirntaki-likanuma arakba wurrakina akwa na-wardanguma ebina warka nanu-kwama Jesus abirruwa da.
Bi...ya kembirra wurri-mirntak-iybina 70 warni-mamalya na-mirntaki-lawurradinuma arakba Jesus-uwa wurrakina. Wurri-yakirrerr-eka wurri-mirntak-akina warni-mamalya. Biya na-mirntaki-yama Jesus-uwa, “Bungkawa,” na-yama, “wurru-wurrariy-eka wurr-amukwa na-jadanguma warni-mamalya-langwa. Yirri-yangbijuwa-manja ekirra nungkwa-langwa wurri-mirntak-iybinu-wa wurr-amukwa, yirrabi-min-engkirrkanuma yirra-langwa ayakwa,” na-mirntaki-yama wurri-mirntak-akina warni-mamalya Jesus-uwa.
Anaja ni-yama Jesus, “Ngayuwa ningena ningani-rribirringkama Namukwa, niybina nu-bungkawa wurru-wurrariya-langwa wurr-amukwa. Biya ningani-rringkama ni-yngki-larruma nakina angwubina-langwa. Waranja-bawiya arrawu-wa ni-larruma nakina, wubirra laka yibilyibilya yiybina ni-ngarning-mindanama li-larrinama waranja-bawiya ajiringka-wa yakina da.
W-engkirrkiya-langwa!” ni-yama Jesus ngarningka abirruwa-wa. “Ngayuwa ngarra-yng-bidirrkama kirrakina karni-mamalya kajungwa karniku-bungkawa-di yada Namukwa-manja akwa ngarningka ana-langwa-manja wurru-wurrariya wurr-amukwa wurr-ababirna-manja. Yiki-likaja-manja kirrakina yikini-ngalyilya-kina-manja yingarna, nara ngalaja anguma nungkwurruwa-manja yakina. Akwa ngarningka yikima-ngalylya-kina-manja merrbira, nara ardarruma makina nungkwurruwa-manja. Amandangwa anaja n-arrbid-eka niybina Namukwa akana nganja ngayuwa ngarra-yng-bidirrkama angwurra kirrakina. Kembirra nara nakina a-mini-ngekbirakuma awurrariya nungkwurra-langwa da.”
Biya kembirra Jesus ni-yama ngarningka abirruwa-wa, “Nungkwurraja aduwaba kirru-werriki-lyalyingma-jungwunama kirrakina kirru-bungkawa-dina-mulangwa wurr-amukwa-manja. Aningaba akina. Imba angwurra yiku-werriki-lyalyingma-jungwunama karna mana God-langwa karni-mamalya kirrakina da. Ngalaja ekirra nungkwurra-langwa nuw-arrkarri-jungwunuma arakba. Akwa anaja God nu-wilyakinama ngawa amirntak-akina ekirra nungkwurra-langwa ana-langwa-manja angalya abalkaya da,” ni-yama Jesus wurri-mirntak-iybinu-wa warni-mamalya da.
Akini yada ngawa ngalaja Amawurrna God-langwa kirriybina angwurra nakina Jesus. Anaja ni-yama God-uwa, “Nganiyarrya Ngangwa, ningku-bungkawadinama abalkaya angwubina-manja ningkakina, akwa ngarningka yalakwa enena-manja angalya ningku-bungkawadinama,” ni-yama Jesus. “Nganja yirra-yang-marngkwa-jinama ningkakina mana ningkarra-wilyaka-juwa-mubaba wurri-mirntak-enena-manja warni-mamalya ningku-bungkawa-dina-mulangwa aduwaba. Nara nungkwaja kani-maka aringkawa-manja warni-mamalya, imba wurri-mirntak-enena-manja wulkwa warni-mamalya ningkarra-makama ningkakina da. Amandangwa yirra-yang-marngkwa-jinama ngayuwa, mana ningki-marngkirra ningkakina akwa ningki-lyangku-werri-bika-jungwunuma akina da,” ni-yama Jesus God-uwa nakina da.
Biya kembirra ni-yangbina Jesus amirntak-enena ayakwa wurr-ababirnu-wa warni-mamalya. Ni-yama nakina, “Nungw-arrk-eka nginu-kwama nakina ababirna-langwa ngayuwa-manja,” ni-yama. “Kirri-miyamban-eka karni-mamalya kirr-akakiruma amandangwa ngayuwa Ning-anukw-anikba? Nara da. Anaja Nungw-arrka anuwa yimbukwa n-akakiruma ngayuwa da. Imba kirri-miyamban-eka karni-mamalya kirr-akakiruma amandangwa Nungw-arrka? Nara da. Ngayuw-eka ningena Ning-anukw-anikba ning-akakiruma nakina da. Imba yika-ngayindana-manja ngayuwa ka-wilyaka-jinama kirrakina-manja, kembirra kirru-kwala karni-mamalya nungkwurr-ajukwaba yik-aningmi-dinama Nungw-arrka,” ni-yama Jesus wurri-mirntak-akinu-wa warni-mamalya wurr-ababirnu-wa da.
Biya kembirra ni-nyaku-warrkwa-jungwa Jesus, ni-yangbina ngarningka amirntak-enena akwala ayakwa ena-langwu-wa warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa nara-mirri-manja kuw-engkirrkana wurru-kwala warni-mamalya. Ni-yama nakina, “God nu-kwilyiban-eka nakina nungkwurruwa-manja,” ni-yama, “mana kirri-rringkama nungkwurra-langwa-mirra manba arum-uruma engb-iyngbida ningi-yama-mulangwa ngayuwa.
Arakbirakba-kiya-wiya abirraja Wurru-Birabida warni-mamalya akwa ngawa wurri-bu-bungkawa warning-arakba-kiya nuw-ambilyi-mirra wurrakina. Narri-ngayindangum-eka karri-rringkama amirntak-iybina kirri-rringkinama karna karni-mamalya aduwaba akwa ngawa kuw-engkirrkanuma ayakwa amirntak-iybina kirr-engkirrkajama karna aduwaba. Amandangwa narri-ngayindanguma, akana nara karri-rringka kuw-engkirrkana wurrakina da,” ni-yama Jesus ena-langwu-wa warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa da.
Bi...ya nuw-angm-ingma-kayangi-manja wurrakina Jesus akwa ngawa wurru-kwala warni-mamalya, na-lyalyimbukwayini-manja wurrakina, anaja nu-wilyaba nanik-akakirumaka ayakwa Mawijija-langwa aning-arum-uruma nuw-aruma-jungwa nakina ayakwi yada. Nani-ngayindanguma naniki-kadiki yada Jesus, kembirra nani-yandabanuma nakina. “Bungkawa,” ni-yama nakina Jesus-uwa, “ki-yamarrkinama ngayuwa nari yada a-jungwuma amawurrna nganyangwa imba ning-aniba k-ambilyi yada ning-aning-angkawura?” ni-yama.
Anaja ni-yama Jesus, “Ki-ridimindana-manja nungkwuwa amirntak-iybina ayakwa Mawijija-langwa aning-arum-uruma, a-miyambana kembirra ayakwa kaki-makinama akina ningk-aniki-yama-langwa nungkwuwa?” ni-yama Jesus anuwa-wa.
Anamba-langwa n-anungkwarba nani-mini-lawurraka-ja ayakwa ebina Mawijija-langwa Jesus-uwa akwa ni-yama, “Ni-yamama nakina Mawijija, ‘Ki-lyalyingminama Nu-Bungkawa nungkwa-langwa God amandangwa. Ki-mirajangina-manja nungkwuwa akwa ngawa ki-mungkwula-manja ki-yaku-werri-bikajama anuwa-wa ningk-aning-angkawura ningkakina,’ ni-yamama nakina. Akwa ngarningka ni-yamama, ‘Ki-lyalyingminama nungkwa-langwa nani-mamalya wubirra laka ningki-lyalyingma-jungwunama nungkwuwa,’ ni-yamama Mawijija,” ni-yama nakina n-anungkwarba Jesus-uwa.
Ni-yama anaja Jesus anuwa-wa, “Akina-bina da. Nungkwuwa amandangwa yu-kwama ayakwa a-dirrbira. Ki-yaminjaminama nungkwuwa akina. Kembirra ngalaja amawurrna nungkwa-langwa nara a-jungwuma, imba aniba kuw-ambilyama aning-angkawura,” ni-yama Jesus.
Imba anaja nakina n-anungkwarba nani-ngayindanguma ngawa naniki-kadiki yada Jesus, kembirra ni-yama, “Wurri-miyambana kembirra warni-mamalya nganyangwa ki-lyalyingminama?” ni-yama nakina n-anungkwarba.
Anaja Jesus nani-maka arakba nakina enena alawudawarra. Nu-wilyaba N-aningi-Judiya n-anungkwarba ni-likanuma nakina Jirujalema-langwa akwa ni-dirrirntuma Jerika-wa. Imba ni-likani-manja nakina mamirukwa-langwiya, abirraja wurru-kwala wurr-engkengmina nan-akbirranga. Biya nanu-wartanga akwa nani-mirraka-juwa dimballa yiya angwarnta akwa amirntakijika ani-langwa, akwa arngki-darrba naniki-jungwangana nani-lalika arakba akwa na-likana da. Imba yakwijina ngawa anaja ni-murrkwu-murrkwuluma nakina ajiringka-manja da.
Bi...ya anaja nu-wilyaba Ni-Minida n-anungkwarba n-ibukwaya ni-likana an-ajukwaba miybina-manja ngawa mamirukwa. Nani-rringka nakina akana nara kani-mamirika-juwa nakina-manja imba nima-likarrku-wakika akwa n-arri-jinungkwa ni-likana ni-dirrirntuma arakba.
Bi...ya anaja nu-wilyaba ngarningka n-anungkwarba, niybina nu-wardu-wardanguma warka God-langwa-manja angalya Jirujalema-manja, n-ibukwaya ngawa ni-likanuma an-ajukwaba miybina-manja ngawa mamirukwa. Biya n-akwudangwu-kajungwa akwa nani-rringka, akana nani-lalika da. An-ajukwaba nara kani-mamirika-juwa nakina-manja n-anungkwarba da, imba nima-likarrku-wakika akwa n-arri-jinungkwa ni-likana ni-dirrirntuma arakba nakina da.
Bi...ya anamba-langwa nu-wilyaba n-anungkwarba ni-likanuma an-ajukwaba makina-manja ngawa mamirukwa. Akana nakin-eka n-anungkwarba N-aningi-Jameriya nani-mamalya nakina. Imba abirraja warningi-Judiya warni-mamalya narra-wirriykbam-eka angwurra Warningi-Jameriya-manja warni-mamalya wurrakina. Biya nan-akbirranga arakba nakina n-anungkwarba niybina arngki-darrba naniki-jungwangana. Biya nani-rringka akana n-errkwula nakina.
Nara kani-lalika imba ni-likana dirrbira anuwa-wa. Biya nani-mini-jirabama m-amalyirra mirrijina akwa ngawa amalyirra akwurana-langwa ebina-manja amarmarra ka-warrwalyi yada. Kembirra nani-mini-lamiranguma dimballa-mirra. Biya kembirra nani-njawudanga arakba ana-langwa-manja dangki akwa nani-likana wunalakina arakba da. Nan-ali-likanu...wa. Biya alikira-manja nani-yarda arakba wunalakina. Akin-eka alikira aki-mungkwu-mungkwulinga wurr-ababirna-langwa warni-mamalya. Biya nakina N-aningi-Jameriya n-anungkwarba nan-embirra-juwama mu-wilyaba marrnga niybina n-anungkwarba naniki-jungwangana yakwijina akina-manja alikira.
Biya wurtarrya-wiya nanu-kwama angwarnta ni-min-akina-manja alikira, kajungwa nanik-akwurraji yada niybina naniki-jungwangana n-anungkwarba. Akwa nani-makama anuwa-wa, “Yi-min-akwurrajina naka,” ni-yama nakina N-aningi-Jameriya n-anungkwarba. “Ningi-likajama ningena, imba wiya, angwarnta. Ngarningka ki-ngayindana-manja nungkwuwa, yiba-kwunama ningena yangkwurrangwa-mirruwa ki-lawurradina-manja ngayuwa,” ni-yama nakina. Biya ni-likana arakba da. Ena-bu ngawa alawudawarra da.
Akin-eka alawudawarra Jesus nani-makama niybinu-wa nani-mamalya naniki-maki-maka ayakwa Mawijija-langwa aning-arum-uruma. Biya kembirra ni-yama Jesus anuwa-wa, “Wurrakina-mirru-wiya-bina da wurr-abiyakarbiya warni-mamalya da,” ni-yama. “Imba wurri-miyambana kembirra warnungkwarba nani-mamirika-juwama nakina n-anungkwarba nanu-wartangu-mulangwa wurrakina wurr-engkengmina, wubirra laka nungkwuwa ningkarra-mamirika-jinama nungkwa-langwa-manja warni-mamalya?” ni-yama nakina Jesus da.
Anaja ni-yama, “Nakina-bina n-anungkwarba niybina n-errkwulinuma naniki-jungwangana n-anungkwarba,” ni-yama. Anaja kembirra Jesus ni-yama anuwa-wa, “Jay! Likaja ki-yamini yada nakina wubirra n-anungkwarba nungkw-ajukwaba,” ni-yama Jesus anuwa-wa da.
Bi...ya Jesus akwa ani-langwa warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa na-yarda arakba awilyaba-manja angalya a-min-ambawura-manja alikira yiya warni-mamalya. A-miykirra angalya Bedaniya. Yakwijina ngalaja ying-ambilyuma du-wilyaba didarringka dadi-miykirra Mada, ngaluwa akwa ngawa ngala-langwa warni-mamalya. Imba Jesus akwa ani-langwa warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa na-likana ngala-langwu-wa alikira. Dakin-eka Mada narring-awiyaba-juwa wurrakina, kajungwa kuw-alyibarini yada anhinga akwa ngawa ka-ybekini yada akwubibeka. Abirraja nuw-awiyabayina arrawa, nuw-ambarrnga akwa na-lyalyimbukwayina wurrakina ayakwa, imba Mada narringa-mini-dakama anhinga abirra-langwa.
Ngalaja dadiya-marnj-adikba Mada-langwa dadi-miykirra Meri. Ying-ambarringa dakina Jesus-manja akwudangwa, biya ying-engkirrkanuma ayakwa ani-langwa. Ying-angm-ingmakwu-laluma ngawa dakinu...wa.
Akana ngalaja Mada d-akwukawura yingu-wardanguma warka aruma. Yingi-lyang-mirukwayinuma, akwa nara king-errminjina. Biya dakina Mada yingu-werrik-awarrya-dina warka-langwa arakba akwa yingi-likana Jesus-uwa. Yingi-yama dakina anuwa-wa, “Bungkawa, ningi-lyang-mirukwayinama ngayuwa, mana dadiya-marnj-arrka nara a-mamirika-juma nganja daka,” yingi-yama. “Awurrariy-eka ena ningu-wardanama ning-akwukawura ngayuwa na? Kembirra nga-makina kajungwa kangi-mamirika-jini yada ngayuwa,” yingi-yama Mada Jesus-uwa.
Anaja Jesus ni-yama ngaluwa-wa, “Amandangwa, ningku-werrik-awarrya-dinam-eka, nganiyarrya, ababirna-langwa, amukwiyad-akina-langwa anhinga-mirrya-langwa.
Akana enena awilyaba aningaba ningki-ngayindanama: k-engkirrkajama ayakwa nganyangwa ningkakina. Ngalaja dakaka dadiya-marnj-ana ying-angmakwu-lalama ying-engkirrkajama ngayuwa-wa. Aningaba kembirra ngala-langwa. Ena yingi-ngayindanama akwa yingi-lyangku-werri-bika-jungwunuma dakina aningabi yada. Kembirra nara nganja a-min-angkirra-juma daka da. Ang-angmakwu-lala ngawa, ang-engkirrkaja ayakwa nganyangwa da,” ni-yama Jesus Mada-wa nakina da.
Arngku-wilyaba Jesus ni-biriyaminuma nakina God-uwa. Kembirra ni-jarrukwa-manja ebina ayakwa, anaja nu-wilyaba nanik-aburraki-yuwa ani-langwa ni-yama anuwa-wa, “Bungkawa,” ni-yama, “yirru-wilyakajina yirraja ayakwa kajungwa yirr-ajukwaba yiki-biriyamini yada God-uwa. Yirru-wilyakajina yirraja wubirra laka Janjana nanu-wilyaka-juwama ana-langwa-manja warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa,” ni-yama nakina Jesus-uwa.
Anaja Jesus ni-yama ena-langwu-wa warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa, “Yiki-biriyamina-manja God-uwa kirrakina, kembirra amirntak-enena ayakwa yiki-yangbinama: ‘Ningkungw-anyungwa,’ yiki-yaminama, ‘yirri-mamirika-jina yirruwa yiki-yangbini yada aningaba-wiya nungkwa-langwa-langwa ningk-ani-miykirra, mana akwurtukwurta baba akina ekirra nungkwa-langwa. Imba bungkawadina-langwa yirruwa-manja nungkwuwa.
Akwa yiku-kwuna anhinga yirraja m-ababirna-langwa mamawura.
Akwa yirri-mini-yakwabijina a-wurru-wurrariya amirntak-iybina yirri-yama-mulangwa, mana yirr-ajukwaba yirra-mini-yakwabijinama a-wurru-wurrariya wurru-kwala-langwa warni-mamalya amirntak-iybina yirrabi-mini-ngekbirakama wurrakina. Akwa yirri-yngbidirr-kina awurrariya-langwa yirruwa,’ yiki-yaminama kirrakina da,” ni-yama nakina Jesus ena-langwu-wa warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa da.
Biya nani-makama nakina enena alawudawarra abirruwa-manja. Nu-wilyaba n-anungkwarba ni-likanuma ena-langwu-wa nani-mamalya marngkirngkuwilyarra anhingi yada. Biya ni-yama nakina anuwa-wa, “Yu-kwa-langwa nganja anhinga,
mana nu-wilyaba nani-mamalya nganyangwa ni-yarduma adiniba engka-langwa. Akana nara ebina anhinga ningena, kemba yu-kwa-langwa,” ni-yama niybina n-anungkwarba ni-min-akinu-wa alikira da.
Kembirra anaja n-imin-akina alikira ni-lawurraka-ja enena ayakwa arrawa-langwa ana-langwa-langwa alikira, “Jay, likaja!” ni-yama. “Nara a-mirajangajuma ngayuwa mana na-diti-jungwu-mubaba akwurraka ena alikira nganyangwa akwa warna wurri-yukwayuwa nganyangwa na-mirntaku-mungkwuli-jajuma arakba. Kemba nara nganja a-mirajanguma a-kwama anhinga ngayuwa nungkwuwa-wa da,” ni-yama nakina. Ni-lawurraka-ja ena ayakwa arrawa-langwa,
akana mama ani-langwa nani-mamalya n-arj-ijayuma errekba-manja ngawa, nar-eka nakina kini-mirajangina nakina da. Anaja n-art-irtanguma ngawa nakina errekba-langwa. Anaja kembirra arakba-langwa ni-mirajanga nakina n-anungkwarba n-imin-akina alikira, mana n-art-irtanguma niybina ani-langwa nani-mamalya baba da. Ni-mirajanga nakina biya nanu-kwa ebina anhinga ni-ngayindanguma. Ena-bu ngawa alawudawarra da.
Jesus nakina nani-makama ebina alawudawarra ana-langwa-manja warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa. Biya ni-yama nakina abirruwa-wa, “W-engkirraja ebinu-wa ayakwa ngarra-maka-mirruwa niybina-langwa n-anungkwarba. Wuni-yandabaja kembirra God-uwa yikanu-kwuni yada nakina ebina kirri-ngayindanama. Kembirra anaja yikanu-kwunama akina. Wurr-andiya angwurra, akwa yik-akbirranginama kirrakina ebina kirr-andiyama. Yiki-ring-bajanama akina-manja akawiyuwiyaba. Kembirra anaja God yikani-minu-ngwurrkbali-jinama akina akawiyuwiyaba da.
Karning-errbirra karni-mamalya yikini-yandabaja-manja anuwa-wa, kembirra God-eka nakina yikanu-kwunama ebina kirri-ngayindanama. Akwa ngarningka yik-andiya-manja karning-errbirra karni-mamalya ebina kirri-ngayindanguma, kembirra yik-akbirranginam-eka kirrakina da. Akwa ngarningka yiki-ringbajana-manja karning-errbirra karni-mamalya akawiyuwiyaba-manja, kembirra God-eka nakina yikani-minu-ngwurrkbali-jinama kirrakina akawiyuwiyaba da.
Imba engkirraja enenu-wa ayakwa, nungkwuwa ningkungwarringba wurri-yukwayuwa-langwa,” ni-yama Jesus. “Kini-yamina-manja nanukw-ana nungkwuwa-wa, ‘Ngangwa, yu-kwa-langwa akwalya,’ kemba kinu-kwunama anuwa-wa yuwurrariya yingarna yiybina nara ngarna alyibaruma na? Nar-eka ningkakina da!
Imba kini-yamina-manja nakina nanukw-ana, ‘Ngangwa, yu-kwa-langwa nganja yini-mamuwa,’ kinu-kwunama kembirra anuwa-wa merribira na? Nara da. Nar-eka ningkakina da!
Karningm-eka karna kirru-ngw-arringba yika-kwuna-mulangwa ababirna-langwa aning-iningaba nungkwurra-langwu-wa wurri-yukwayuwa. Mama kirru-wurrariya, imba karningm-eka kirrakina. Imba anaja God Nungw-anungwa nungkwurra-langwa an-ajukwaba n-aningma angwurra nakina akwa kanu-kwunama Amawurrna akwurtukwurta ani-langwa wurribinu-wa warni-mamalya kani-yandabaja-mirruwa da,” ni-yama Jesus ena-langwu-wa warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa da.
Bi...ya Jesus nani-rringkama nu-wilyaba n-anungkwarba n-aning-ayakwa-ma. Nakin-eka nara kini-yangbina ayakwa mana wurru-wurrariya baba wurr-amukwa nuw-awiyabuma anuwa-manja. Imba nani-jadi-juwama Jesus wurrakina wurr-amukwa anuwa-langwa. Anaja kembirra n-anungkwarba ni-yangbina arakba ayakwa. Abirraja nuw-engkirrkani-manja ayakwa ani-langwa wurr-ababirna warni-mamalya wurriybina nuw-ambilyi-mirri-mirri yakwijina, na-mirntaki-yakikbijangayinum-eka wurrakina.
Wurru-kwala warni-mamalya na-maki-jayinuma wurrakina. Na-mirntaki-yama, “Nakin-eka Namukwa niybina nani-miykirra Biyaljibula, niybina wurramukwa-langwa nu-bungkawa, nani-yngbidirr-kinam-eka nakina-bina Jesus na? Amandangwa Biyaljibula nani-yngbidirr-kinama nakina akwa nani-jadi-jinama Jesus wurru-wurrariya wurr-amukwa warni-mamalya-langwa na?” na-mirntaki-yama wurrakina.
Imba wurru-kwala warni-mamalya narri-ngayindanguma warniki-labi yada Jesus wurrakina. Biya na-yama anuwa-wa, “Wu-ngekbirakina engb-iyngbida ebina nara warni-mamalya a-ngekbirakuma wurrakina, kajungwa yarningmi yada yarna nungkwuwa ningki-likanuma God-langwa ningkakina da,” na-yama wurrakina.
Akana anaja Jesus n-aningma nakina abirra-langwa mangma akwa ni-yama abirruwa-wa, “W-engkirrkiya-langwa,” ni-yama. “Namukwa nara a-mamirika-juma nakina karni-mamalya-manja karniki-yama-langwa aningaba. Yika-jadijiya-manja karni-mamalya wurru-wurrariya wurr-amukwa wurru-kwala-langwa wurrakina, nar-eka kembirra a-yngbidirr-kama Namukwa kirrakina-manja. Nungkwurraja yiku-warti-yina-manja kirru-wurrakawurama karni-mamalya, kirru-kwala yadada imba kirru-kwala angaliba, kemba yiki-yamarrkinama kirrakina? Nara arakba kirru-wurrakawurama ambilyuma kirrakina imba kirru-wurrak-ayabijaba ngawa yik-ambilyama da.
Imba ka-warti-yina-manja abirraja wurru-wurrakawuru-ma wurru-wurrariya wurr-amukwa, kembirra ka-yamarrkinama wurrakina? Nar-eka arakba wurru-wurrakawuru-ma ambilyuma wurrakina imba wurru-wurrak-ayabijaba ngawa kuw-ambilyama abirr-ajukwaba. Imba nungkwurraja kirri-yamama karna karni-mamalya ena ayakwa nganyangwa-langwa, ‘Namukwa nani-yngbidirr-kinama nakina naniki-jadiji yada wurru-wurrariya wurr-amukwa warni-mamalya-langwa,’ kirri-yamama kirrakina. Akana nar-eka.
Ka-jadijiya-manja ngayuwa wurr-amukwa warni-mamalya-langwa ngini-yngbidirr-kina-mulangwa Biyaljibula ngayuwa-manja, kemba yirri-makina arakba, ka-yamarrkinama warnik-ab-ibirraki-yuwa nungkwurra-langwa? Ka-yamarrkinama wurrakina warniki-jadi-ji yada wurru-wurrariya wurr-amukwa warni-mamalya-langwa? Warningma wurrakina nar-eka Biyaljibula a-yngbidirr-kama wurrakina-manja. Kembirra warningma wurrakina ekiykalya ayakwa kirri-yangbinama nganyangwa-langwa kirrakina da.
Nar-eka ningena. Anaja God-eka nakina ngini-yngbidirr-kinama ngayuwa kajungwa ana-langwa-mirra Amawurrna wulkwa ka-jadi-jini yada wurru-wurrariya wurr-amukwa warni-mamalya-langwa ngayuwa da. Kembirra ka-jadijina-manja ngayuwa wurrakina God-langwa-mirra Amawurrna, karningma karna Nu-Bungkawa God nu-bungkawa-dinam-eka enena-manja angalya arakba amandangwa nakina da,” ni-yama Jesus wurri-mirntak-iybinu-wa warni-mamalya da.
Biya enena ngarningka ayakwa nani-makama nakina Jesus. “W-engkirrkiya enenu-wa ayakwa nu-wilyaba-langwa n-anungkwarba n-iyngbida,” ni-yama. “Kin-ambirra-jina-manja nakina n-anungkwarba ani-langwa alikira, ngalaja akina aning-awinyamba amirntakijika ani-langwa kuw-ambilyam-eka akwudangwa anuwa-manja aning-angkawura. Kemba nar-eka a-mirraka-juma abirraja wurru-kwala warni-mamalya ebina amirntakijika yiya anhinga akwa dimballa ani-langwa. Ngalaja engki-nyungwurra ngawa kuw-ambilyama akina.
Imba anaja kini-likaja-manja ena-langwu-wa alikira nakina nu-wilyaba nani-mamalya, niybina n-iyngbida anuwa-manja angwurra, kemba kanu-wartiyinam-eka wunalakina. Biya nakina n-iyngbida-dangwa nani-mamalya kini-likajama angwurra nakina da. Kemba kani-mirraka-jinam-eka amirntakijika yiya anhinga akwa dimballa ani-langwa n-imin-akina-langwa alikira. Akwa kani-mirraka-jinam-eka ngarningka amirntak-iybina amirntakijika aning-awinyamba ani-langwa, ebina nanaki-kalyikama n-imin-akina alikira da. Biya kani-larrmbirranama amirntak-iybina amirntakijika wurr-iyngku-wa yiya wurr-iyngku-wa warni-mamalya,” ni-yama Jesus wurri-mirntak-iybinu-wa warni-mamalya.
Biya ni-yama ngarningka Jesus, “Karning-errbirra karni-mamalya nara-manja a-minu-warduma warka nganyangwa, yik-awinyambakinama kembirra ngayuwa-manja kirrakina. Imba karning-errbirra karni-mamalya nara-manja a-mirntukwajuma kirrakina wurru-kwala warni-mamalya ngayuwa-wa, kirri-min-angkirrayinama kembirra engku-wa wurri-mirntak-iybina wurru-kwala warni-mamalya da,” ni-yama Jesus wurri-mirntak-iybinu-wa warni-mamalya.
Biya ni-yama Jesus, “Ka-jadana-manja wurru-wilyaba wurru-wurrariya wurr-amukwa nu-wilyaba-langwa n-anungkwarba, kembirra ka-likajama wurrakina engku-wa alarrk-iyngbiringka-wa kuw-abirangkinama angalya ka-ngwanjini yada. Nara-manja akbirranguma aningaba angalya abirra-langwi yada, kembirra ka-maki-jajungwunama ka-lyangki-yaminama wurrakina, ‘Ki-lawurradinama arakba ngayuwa ebinu-wa angalya ning-ambilyu-mirruwa adiniba-wiya,’ ka-yaminama wurrakina wurr-amukwa.
Kembirra ka-lawurradinama arakba, biya karr-rringkinama ebina angalya a-mungkwurda alarr-ngekbirna.
Biya kembirra ka-likajama kuw-abirangkinama wurru-kwalu-wa wurr-amukwa, akwa karra-wilyakinama wurri-mangbala wurr-ambilyuma wurr-amukwa akinu-wa angalya. Akana abirraja wurri-mirntak-akina wurr-amukwa wurru-wurrariy-eka, amandangwa wurru-wurrariya warning-adiniba-wiya-manja angwurra. Biya kembirra kuw-awiyabanama wurrakina akwa yakwijina ngawa kuw-ambilya-mirra wurru-wurrakawuru-ma niybina-manja n-anungkwarba warning-angkawura wurrakina. Kembirra nakin-eka n-anungkwarba kin-arrya-dinam-eka angwurra, ka-lawurradina-mulangwa wurriybina warning-adiniba-wiya wurr-amukwa, wurru-kwala wurr-iyngka wurr-amukwa abirruwa. Adiniba-wiya n-arrya-duma nakina akana angwurra ngawa kin-arrya-dinama nakina da,” ni-yama Jesus wurri-mirntak-iybinu-wa warni-mamalya nakina.
Kembirra ni-jarrukwa-manja Jesus amirntak-akina ayakwa, ngalaja du-wilyaba didarringka yakwijina wurri-mirntak-iybina-manja warni-mamalya ying-artinga dakina. Yingi-yama dakina Jesus-uwa, “Di-yakirrerr-eka didarringka diybina ng-arrangbama ngu-ngwunjikama ningkakina,” yingi-yama dakina.
Anaja ni-yama Jesus, “Mungkw-eka dakina, akana amandangwa abirraja wurri-yakirrerra angwurra wurriybina nuw-engkirrkaja-mirri-mirra God-langwa ayakwa akwa nani-mini-yarrki-warakina-mirri-mirra akina ayakwa ana-langwa da!” ni-yama Jesus ngaluwa-wa da.
Abirraja kembirra wurri-mirntak-iybina warni-mamalya nuw-engkirrkani-mirri-mirra Jesus-uwa nuw-ababirn-da-dinuma wurrakina, biya na-wurraki-lyibilyidanguma arakba. Kembirra ni-yama anaja Jesus abirruwa-wa, “Karniniyarrya karni-mamalya karna aduwaba! Kirri-ngayindanama karniki-rringki yada amini-miniyngka engb-iyngbida amirntak-iybina nara a-yamama warni-mamalya, akana nara a-rringkama kirrakina. Ngayuw-eka, ningiybina-mirrada ningi-rukwularrinuma enena-manja angalya, Jawuna wubirra ningi-yaminama ningena. Nakin-eka Jawuna n-ambilyuma ebina-manja akwalya m-abiyakarbiya mamawura akana n-aniba ngawa ni-jadanguma nakina. Amin-akina-langwa kembirra abirraja wurri-mirntak-iybina warni-mamalya wurri-min-akina angalya Niniba nuw-aningmi-dinuma wurrakina God nani-larrkama Jawuna abirruwa-wa da. Akin-eka wubirra yikanu-wilyaka-jinama anaja God kirrakina-manja karni-mamalya ngini-larrka-mulangwa ngayuwa nungkwurruwa-wa imba nara akwala da,” ni-yama Jesus wurri-mirntak-iybinu-wa warni-mamalya.
<range>
Biya kembirra ni-yama nakina abirruwa-wa ngarningka, “Ambaka-mirri-mirra m-aning-arija-langwa-manja mamawura, God nakina kini-lyangku-werribika-jungwunama warni-mamalya-langwa, warningaba-mirrikba akwa wurru-wurrariya-mirrikba. Akini yada ngawa ngalaja king-arjiyama diybina du-bungkawa duminakina angalya Jiba. King-arjiyama dakina akwa yikangi-lekbajama nungkwurruwa-wa karni-mamalya kirriybina kirr-ambilya-mirri-mirra ena-manja angalya aduwaba. Arakbirakba-kiya-wiya yingi-likanuma dakina engka-langwa aminiyngka-langwa angalya kajungwa dadik-engkirrki yada ayakwa Nu-Bungkawa-langwa Jalumuna-langwa. Arrbud-eka ayakwa ni-yangbinuma anaja Jalumuna, aringkawa baba nakina, akwa ying-engkirrkanuma dakina amirntak-akinu-wa ayakwa. Kembirra yikangi-lekbajama nungkwurruwa-wa dakina da. Yikangi-lekbajama dakina mana nu-wilyaba baba nani-mamalya niybina n-aruma-dangwa n-ambilyama nakina yalakwa nungkwurruwa-manja aduwaba. Akana nungkwurraja karni-mamalya nar-eka engkirrkuma ena-langwu-wa ayakwa aduwaba kirrakina da.
Kembirra ngarningka akini yada m-aning-arija-langwa-manja ngawa mamawura abirraja wurri-mirntak-iybina Warningi-Niniba warni-mamalya kuw-arjiyama abirr-ajukwaba kajungwa warniki-lekbi yada nungkwurruwa-wa karni-mamalya. Yikabi-lekbajama wurrakina mana narrima-yku-warrkwa-juwa-mubaba mangma abirra-langwa nuw-engkirrkani-mulangwa ayakwa Jawuna-langwa. Narrima-yku-warrkwa-juwama mangma wurri-mirntak-iybina warni-mamalya, narru-wurranguma a-wurru-wurrariya imba nani-minu-yarrku-warakama wurrakina ayakwa God-langwa arakba. Arrbida ayakwa ni-yangbinuma anaja Jawuna, imba amirntak-enena ayakwa kirr-engkirrkajama karna aduwaba arrbida-dangwa angwurra ena da. Akana nara nungkwurraja engkirrkuma kirrakina da,” ni-yama Jesus wurri-mirntak-iybina-manja warni-mamalya.
Biya enena ayakwa bajananga-langwa nani-makama Jesus wurri-mirntak-iybinu-wa warni-mamalya. Ni-yama nakina, “Yakuwa yalakena yak-abarraka-jina-manja bajananga alikira-manja arrawa, nar-eka abuwarrkama akina. Nar-eka yalakena akimama akina bajikala-manja arrawa imba yak-akimirnama akina karrawara kajungwa karri-rringkini yada wurru-kwala warni-mamalya aningaba alarr-adada.
Nara-manja ebina bajananga alikira-manja arrawa alyarrngwalyilya kembirra nara yalakena a-rringkama angalya. Akwa nara-manja miybina manba yakwa-langwa kembirra nara yalakena a-rringkama angalya. Akwa mu-wurrariya manba yakima-wilyakina-manja kembirra alarri-mirda-manja ngawa yak-ambilyama yalakena. Imba yakima-wilyakina-manja m-aningaba manba kembirra engku-wa yaki-rringkinama yalakena.
Kembirra yiki-rringka-jungwunama karna karni-mamalya kajungwa nari yada a-rringkama awurrariya-wa imba aningabu-wa yiki-rringkini yada kirrakina da.
Kembirra nara-manja a-rringkama awurrariya-wa imba yiki-rringkina-manja aningabu-wa karning-angkawura, kembirra ababirna-langwa nungkwurra-langwa ka-wuldinama ka-ngwurdanama akina aning-angkawura ngawa, wubirra laka kirr-ambilyama alikira-manja ebina na-lyangburrkwuna-mirri-manja alarr-adada akina da,” ni-yama Jesus wurri-mirntak-iybinu-wa warni-mamalya.
Ni-jarrukwa-mulangwa Jesus amirntak-iybina ayakwa, kembirra anaja nu-wilyaba n-anungkwarba, niybina Ni-Barija, ni-yama nakina anuwa-wa, “Yi-likaja arakba nganyangwu-wa angalya anhingi yada,” ni-yama. Biya nani-likana arakba wunalakina Ni-Barija-langwu-wa alikira, akwa wurru-kwala warnungkwarba abirruwa. Biya n-ambarrnga nakina Jesus anhingi yada arakba, akana nara nakina kini-jiraba akungwa adiniba-wiya ana-langwa-manja ayarrka.
Anaja Ni-Barija n-anungkwarba nani-miringkama nakina Jesus-uwa nara kin-ajirranga ani-langwa ayarrka imba n-ambarrnga waranja-bawiya anhingi yada nakina. Biya ni-yakikbijanguma Ni-Barija nakina da.
Anaja kembirra ni-yama nakina Nu-Bungkawa Jesus anuwa-wa, “Kirri-Barija karni-mamalya kirr-ajirranam-eka nungkwurra-langwa ayarrka. Akina kirri-yaminjaminama aning-arum-uruma-langwiya ayakwa nungkwurra-langwa, akana nara kirrakina a-mungkwur•duma mangma yiya yukwudukwuda nungkwurra-langwa. Kirri-mungwurdangma kirrakina karni-mamalya kirriybina kirra-mirraka-jinama ababirna aning-errbirra warni-mamalya-langwa mana mu-wurrariya baba mangma yiya yukwudukwuda kirrima-wilyakinama kirrakina. Amandangwa kirri-yaminama nu-wilyaba wubirra nani-mamalya n-anibuwakida, niybina n-ajirranama ambaka-langwa ani-langwa bajikala errekba-langwiya, akana nara a-jarruma akina arrawa-langwiya,” ni-yama Jesus niybina-manja Ni-Barija n-anungkwarba.
Biya ni-yama ngarningka nakina Jesus, “Karni-nibu-wakida karni-mamalya. Anaja God ni-ngekbirakama nakina ababirna-langwa ebina ngarri-rringkinama aduwaba ngarna, aning-errekba akwa ngawa aning-arrawa ngal-ajukwaba ni-ngekbirakama nakina.
Nungkwurraja kembirra ena yiki-yamina kirrakina karni-mamalya kajungwa yikima-wilyakini yada ma-mungkwurda mangma m-aningaba. Yika-kwuna nungkwurra-langwa amirntakijika wurru-kwalu-wa warni-mamalya warning-alyingm-alyingma-wa. Yiki-marngkirra-dinama abirruwa-manja kirrakina da.
Amandangw-eka awurrariya ka-ngekbiraka-jungwunama nungkwurra-langwa Kirri-Barija-langwa karni-mamalya! Nar-eka kirrakina engkirrkuma karniki-yama-langwa aningaba wurru-kwala-manja. Akwa ngarningka nar-eka engkirrkuma God-uwa, akwa nara a-lyalyingmama anuwa-wa kirrakina karni-mamalya. Imba amarta anik-alyibara a-yukwayuwa, amirntak-iybina ka-kwurarikinama anhinga nungkwurra-langwa, kirri-mirntuwarnama amirntak-akina a-wilyu-wilyaba-wiya, kajungwa yikinu-kwuni yada awilyaba God-uwa imba yiku-wilyakini yada kirrakina amangbala abiyarbuwa nungkwurra-langwi yada. Aningaba akina akana nara a-yakuwabi-juma karniki-yama-langwa aningaba wurru-kwala-manja da akwa ngarningka karniki-lyalyingma-langwa God-uwa kirrakina da.
Amandangw-eka awurrariya ka-ngekbiraka-jungwunama akina nungkwurra-langwa Kirri-Barija-langwa karni-mamalya! Kirru-ngkw-aningaba-kajungwunam-eka. Kirri-likaja-manja kirrakina jinikakwu-wa kirri-mardanama kirrakina angalya aningaba karnik-ambarrngi yada yakwijina. Akwa kirri-likaja-manja kirrakina wurr-ababirnu-wa warni-mamalya kirri-lyalyingminam-eka ayakwa abirra-langwa na-yangbina-mulangwa aning-iningaba-wiya wurrakina ayakwa nungkwurruwa-wa,” ni-yama Jesus niybinu-wa Ni-Barija n-anungkwarba.
“Yaw-eka,” ni-yama ngarningka Jesus. “Awurrariy-eka ka-ngekbiraka-jungwunama nungkwurra-langwa! Kirri-miyamban-eka karni-mamalya karna? Ka-makinama ngayuwa. Kirrakin-eka karni-mamalya awilyaba wubirra angalya ebina-manja narra-rungkwaba-mirri-manja warni-niki-jungwa warni-madangkwa. Akana akin-eka angalya nuw-abuwarrka-jungwunama. Abirraja kemba ka-likaja-manja warni-mamalya yanjarrikina, karri-ngalyilyakinama akina-manja angalya. Warningbal-eka nuw-ambilya-mulangwa arrawa wurri-mirntak-iybina wurri-miyngma warni-madangkwa. Amandangwa akin-eka wubirra angalya kirrakina da, mana warningbala baba wurrakina wurru-kwala warni-mamalya nungkwurra-langwa mangma mu-wurrariya miybina nim-abuwarrka-jungwunama makina da,” ni-yama Jesus niybinu-wa n-anungkwarba Ni-Bariju-wa da.
Anaja kembirra nu-wilyaba nanik-akakirumaka Mawijija-langwa ayakwa aning-arum-uruma ni-yangbinuma nakina ayakwa Jesus-uwa. “Bungkawa,” ni-yama, “ningki-yaminama ningkakina kembirra yirruwa-wa, ‘Karniniyarrya karni-mamalya karna nungkwurr-ajukwaba,’ ningki-yaminama na?” ni-yama nakina nanik-akakirumaka n-anungkwarba.
Anaja ni-yama Jesus nakinu-wa, “Awurrariy-eka ka-ngekbiraka-jungwunama nungkwurra-langwa nungkwurr-ajukwaba akina, mana kirra-makina-mubaba wurru-kwala-manja warni-mamalya warniki-yama-langwa amini-miniyngka, akana nara karna a-mamirika-juma wurrakina-manja kirrakina da.
